Bought these to go with the Buzz costume I bought my 2 yr old for Halloween. As soon as he saw them, he wanted to put them on, and still has yet to take them off! They are definitely a great accessory and are perfect for wearing whenever.

Our son loves Buzz.  Unfortunately 3 months earlier he loved dinosaurs.  The only other buzz wing option is $150-200 and not well reviewed.  That is simply too much money to spend on a toy for a kid who may be on to Star Wars tomorrow.This is a great option.  My suggestion is to buy 2 (or 3) so you have backups.  Our kid puts them on along with his arm laser and runs through the house shooting the cats knocking things over on tables.
My son wore these with his buzz lightyear costume & they looked so cute.  Because they are inflatable, they have a little give.  He is almost 3 years old & tolerated them well.
Kids LOVE it, but the plastic loop holding the elastic bands ripped. Lasted less than 1 month! I keep trying to fix it, but only temp fixes work.
My son loved it!!  So did the kids and parents at the party!!  Excellent product!! Quick turn around, product just as described!!!

This was a great buy. For the price there is no reason not to get it to go with the costume, it really completes the look. The wings seem pretty durable and I expect they will hold up well since my son will only wear this through Halloween and not on a daily basis. I can tell though that if he were to wear it more often that the shoulder straps would probably fall off in no time at all. They are very thin and flimsy. Overall I am very pleased, my son loves it and hasn't taken it off since UPS delivered it this morning!Update: Wings are still intact, even after my very hyper 4 year old wore them for Halloween last year!
summary: Great addition to the Buzz Lightyear costume

reviewText: My son is all about playing different characters right one and this was a great, inexpensive piece to add to his coatume pieces.

The wings look great when you blow them up. There were a little to big for what we needed. The wings were easy to fill but once they were filled the jet pack was to big in the middle. So wearing them long made my sons back sore  the straps were way way to small for my 3 yr old. Makes a Great Wall mount for a toy story theme room.

I now realize the detailed description, at the very end of it, states that the costume itself is sold separately, but I certainly didn't get that until after it arrived. This is ONLY the blow-up jetpack.  :(The main, bullet-pointed description, and the main photo is misleading!
summary: Blow-up jetpack ONLY. NOT full costume.

reviewText: My almost 3 year old loves this!  It was perfect for his Buzz costume for Halloween.  I don't think it will last forever, but it is a great alternative to the jet pack with folding wings....
summary: My almost 3 year old loves this!  It was perfect for his Buzz costume for Halloween...

reviewText: The jet pack had slits in it and could not be inflated. Disappointed and had to find another one quickly.
I purchased this item to complete my son's halloween costume and it was great. Aside from him loving it, it was cheap and arrived quickly.

Bought for my 2 year old son's 2nd Birthday party, it was Toy Story themed. Great price and he LOVED the wings! After hours of running around and playing they did not deflate, would def. recommend for any Buzz Lightyear fan!

The first time I put this on my grandson, it broke. The straps are little pieces of elastic that are not attached very well. I was able to knot them back on, but this only lasted for a few more wearings.It's a great idea but needs some work to make it kid user durable.
This accessory is perfect for my son's Buzz Lightyear costume and is very easy to use, he was very happy.
This product is a blow up, so it is light weight and perfect for a 3 year old. the straps are adjustable and we couldn't be happier. My little lightyear is buzzing all over the house!
got this for my 3 year old and he loved it but the strap broke shortly after and now it is gone.
summary: not bad but straps break easily

reviewText: I bought this for a toddler, so you can imagine how often it gets played with... It's inflatable!!!  That means, in the hands of a toddler, it lasted almost a week after Christmas.  There is a small tear or hole somewhere, so we keep having to blow more air into it.  The elastic "straps" broke the very afternoon of Christmas day!  We had to be creative in order for our son to be able to get some extra time with it.  I don't expect it to last much longer.Just wish we had paid more attention to the fact that it was inflatable when we were shopping.
After 1 used starting to deflate. My son was so sad. Poor quality need to be make with with better quality material.
It fits my son good, but I thought it came with the purple hood as well. My son hasn't wore it/played with it as much as I thought he would.
These wings were perfect for my 2 year old for Halloween. They were soo cute and held up just fine.
didn't make it through halloween.  the straps that go over the arms to keep it on broke off.  3 year old disappointed when they fell off.
My kids love this.  It's pretty easy to inflate and they just put it on and BAMM the fun begins.

It's worth what you pay for it. The center of the pack and the L-shaped frame of the wings inflate. The main surface of the pack is just a layer of plastic. It's a cute backpack, but I did notice the stem to inflate pops out on ours. It's not a big deal, you just have to blow it up again. My son loves it with his costume and it really finishes off the whole Buzz look. If you want something your child can really play with for a long time, then buy the non-inflatable one. This one is fine, but it's not made to last that long.
If your child loves Buzz they will LOOOVE these wings!!! My 4yo loves it!! Wings are "blow up" very happy
the wings kind of fall sideways, and they start to inflate pretty quickly. Also the wing spand is very small if your average size and older than 8 I would not recommend this.
A must have to complete the costume, made well and my kid loves it. Holds air for a few days.

These were great for my son's halloween costume.  Looks fantastic.  They are inflatable - I don't know if you can tell that from the picture.  You have to get them really inflated in order for the wings to stick out straight like they should.  My chief complaint is how the straps (very thin 1/4" elastic) are attached to the jet pack.  It looks like they will break loose any moment.  Mine survived a halloween party and halloween itself, but I don't expect this to stand up to much more.  It did look great with the costume, though!!!
summary: Good for a night, don't expect this to be a life long investment

reviewText: Product is defective.  I received it just in time to take to my grandson in South America for halloween and it is not useable.

My 3 year old son wanted to be Buzz Lightyear for Halloween so we found his costume and when we tried it on him, it just seemed to generic.  I looked online and found this product and when we got it, it really completed the look.  He had so many compliments on his wings.  Very fun for all to see.
My two and a half year old was Buzz for Halloween and we got so many compliments on this jet pack! They were the perfect addition to his costume.

I guess I don't know what I expected for that price, but I was surprised to have to blow it up like a swim toy. My grandson loves it and it seems to be comfortable for him, but I'm afraid it won't make it very long. I don't know this for sure though, I only let him wear it for a little while...we'll see. Arrived quickly, which was nice...still waiting for costume and gloves.
summary: This item is plastic and has to be blown up!

reviewText: I recieved my buzz light year wings promptly and the only bad thing I have to say is that the shoulder straps came off really easily, but to be fair, it's made for a small child, not an adult :)

I purchased this item for my son.  He already had the Buzz Light Year costume and I thought the wings would make a great addition to the costume.  It turns out, the wings completely MADE the costume!  Everyone commented on how cute the costume was.  The wings were the best part of the costume, and at a great price too!

My son couldn't wait to put the wings on with his costume! They absolutely took the costume to the next level. They were made well, very comfortable and I have to say were the funniest thing to see bouncing up and down as he ran around trick or treating! I'd highly recommend purchasing this accessory for the Buzz Lightyear costume!
I got this for Halloween this year BUT, item DOES NOT inflate at alla. Should had read the reviews before buying. Waste of money.
Muito legal essas asas! Meu filho amou e eu fiquei feliz por ele ter se encantado, pois ele ama o Buzz.

this wings were thr perfect complement to my nephews costume! he's 3 and they are big enough for him to feel like the real Buzz, but the most important thing, they are light on his back!btw, be carefull with some edges as they are sharp and might give a little cut.

Bought costume at Target, didn't come with any extras to make the costume fun. Went on a search to find the "jet wings" and the helmet. Was so excited to have found the wings on Amazon for a good price. My grandson loved the costume so much, my son had to put it away until Halloween for fear he would ruin the wings before he could wear them with the rest of the costume on Halloween.

Although the design is true to Buzz and was received with initial enthusiasm and delight, this item doesn't hold air very well and the elastic shoulder straps are awkward causing the wings to sit very high on the back of the neck. Got about 2 afternoons of play and went in the closet (flat).

Our son was so excited to have a set of wings, but these only stay inflated for a few minutes at at time.  We put them under water to determine where the leak was and found THREE separate leaks.  Poor quality.

I got my son these Buzz wings to go with his Buzz Lightyear Halloween costume.He was the best Buzz we saw the whole night! He loves them and is still playing with them.They are pretty durable,hes 3 and rarely takes them off,and they havent been damaged yet.Id recommend them to any Buzz lover!

The jetpack is bigger than i thought. The span of the wings doesnt fit through standard doorways so when my son goes from room to room the wings get bent back and im afraid its only a matter of time before they pop. The straps are adjustable velcro which is good but unfortuantley because of the unfinished edges of it the buzz costume he wears it with has some pulls and pilling from it. But the plastic seems thicker than i expected and he loves it. My son is 2 1/2

Pros: Cute, lightweightCons: Cheaply madeThe elastic and velcro straps that attach the wings to your child are small and caused the jetpack to be very tight to my 3 yr olds body. Because the jetpack is inflatable, it you blow it up all the way, the center between the wings gets very rounded and made the jetpack keep slipping up my sons body and hitting him in the head. He didn't enjoy wearing it very long to say the least.

We bought these wings to go with the Buzz Lightyear deluxe costume, and it really made the costume whole! They are inflatable so some care is needed but we have had them for a year and a half now and my son still uses them for "super hero" play time. Great buy, would recommend to anyone buying the deluxe costume for a great and i believe necessary add on.
My son loves this jet pack. A lot of fun for the money. The elastic straps did, however, pull off from the wings, but a simple safety pin did the trick.

My boys are very much into the superhero stage, and these were perfect!!  They are inflatable back pieces, with white elastic straps similar to a backpack style.  The great thing is no one gets injured from being whacked with the wings of these mid-flight.  (as one who got smacked in the face while my Buzz was off to save the galaxy, I can vouch for that).  Price was great, these are super fun!
My son loves these wings. We got them for Halloween and they are just fun for him to play with now that Halloween is over.

The picture makes the item look a lot better than it is.  The "wings" aren't awful, but only the "pack" has an opening to blow air into.  The wings don't, and they don't look as full as in the picture because of that.
It was bigger than I expected, but my son loved it, it looked proportioned too. I am very happy with this purchase.

We got this to go with our 2.5 year old's Buzz Lightyear costume.  They held air for both carnivals.  No leaks, no popping.  Really cute accessory - made our son the star of the neighborhood carnival.  Everyone complimented his costume.  Strong odor out of the package - I wiped them off and let them air for a day.

Bought this to complete my sons costume. Was a bit scared, being plastic blow up wings, but they still hold up. The only thing, the straps to hold them up tore off after a couple of months, but we somehow still make em work. My son has so much fun with them.

My son is obsessed with anything Toy Story related, esp Buzz Lightyear.  So when I saw these wings I had to get them for him.  I gave them to him for his 3rd b-day and they were a big hit!  He wears them all the time and pretends to fly around the house.  He's going to be Buzz for Halloween so this will be a nice added touch to the costume!  The only thing is you do have to blow up the wings so I'm hoping he won't get a hole in them before Halloween.  They are made with a very durable material though so I don't think I'll have a problem.  The only complaint I have is the way the wings attach to your child.  They attach by thin elastic bands so you have to make sure you have a shirt that covers their arms.  My son had a sleeveless shirt on and the elastic bands cut into his skin under his arms.  Other then that the product is great!
I got this inflatable jet pack to go with my 2 year old's Halloween costume and it worked out great. He LOVES it. It's been 2 months since I purchased it and he's still wearing it around!
These wings were perfect for the buzz lightyear costume!! It went perfect and my son loved them!! The buzz costume wasn't complete without these wings!!

My son liked it as part of his costume, but this is just an inflatable.  Unfortunately we will have to return it.  It doesn't have any obvious leaks, but it doesn't hold air very long.  After an hour or so, it is fully deflated.
We purchased these as an addition to my son's Halloween Costume, but he wears them ALL the time. They're wonderful for me since they defalte and are easy to store.

Got these wings for my 2yr old to be buzz for halloween. He loved them.  I was glad I got these instead of the plastic ones because he ran into everything (including his great grandpa) and didn't damage anything.  The wings give a little bit when they are jammed into walls and such and it didn't damage the wings.  Overall I would recommend these wings to anyone who has the world's #1 Buzz fan living under their roof!!!
Arrived quickly and was as described.  This has allowed our little Buzz to make many trips flying around our house..

Honestly didn't know what to expect from this product, after reading several bad reviews here onAmazon.So, these "wings" arrived folded up in a flat package. I blew them up, and there were no holes or anything so I was relieved. They blew up like water wings. Great product for the price! They really MADE the costume! My three year old got so many complements. Several weeks after Halloween and the wings are still blown up, no holes. Highly recommended for all Buzz Lightyear fans!

This made his costume complete. He was the cutest Buzz ever :) He had several Compliments.He still plays with the wings now that Halloween is over.We also hang them on the wall for decoration in his room. The wings are quite durable for a blow up item.I reccomend for future buzz lightyear pretenders!

My grandson loves buzz light year and when I saw this I just had to get it for him when he saw it his eyes bugged out he just loves it it's light and easy to put on just right for a 3 year old I am very pleased with the product and so is my grandson

My son was so excited to put these on and on the first day, he wore them till bedtime! The only bummer is that the elastic straps broke on the second day (the plastic loop they are attached to is what actually tore, not the elastic itself). Wish I would have known because I would have hid it till Halloween.  Not sure if they will hold up another week to be worn with his costume :)
summary: Son loves the wings, but straps break fast :(

reviewText: My son loved having his wings, though he didn't do well once his wings encountered a rose bush!  ;(  The wings were easily patched up.  These stayed blown up and looked adorable!

My son loves this set of wings/jet pack. He got it for his birthday and still one year later he's flying around the house with them on. We did have an accident and had to repair a puncture in one of them, but now good as new and he's still going 'to infinity and beyond!' Excellent for any young toy story fan!
This product was exactly what we expected. My kid had a great time at halloween using it and I would recomend it!
My sons enjoyed their buzz lightyear wings! They felt like superstars and i will definetily make another purchase soon! Thank you for prompt delivery and sending exactly what i purchased.

Let's start with the good:- My boy loved the wings- They weren't costly- They made the costume- Gave him some aerodynamics lessons (in a fun manner).  Not that he'll remember but I like to think I laid a nice foundation.Continue with the bad:- Cheaply made- Defective out of the box.  The air gasket wouldn't close, some scotch tape fixed it.- Large wingspan (not the manufacturers fault but be aware that things will get knocked around).Overall, I'm glad we bought them for his costume, they looked great in pictures and my boy ran around the house and on Halloween yelling "I'm Buzz Lightyear".
summary: Bought for a Two Year Old

reviewText: the wings make the buzz light year costume complete.  Very happy, would recommend.  Watch out as your little one knocks over things with his new wingspand!
My son loves being able to put on these wings - easy to inflate, have held the air for weeks, and makes for an instant outfit.

great addition to the costume, however, the elastic arm bands broke off from the wings.  it was hard to fix, but managed. and then broke again.  my little guy is bummed he can't wear the wings anymore.  it was great while it lasted.  wouldn't buy again unless they made something more durable.
My son had a lot of fun in this. Bought it to go along a custom we bought at Toys are us. Unfortunately at the end of the night it caught a rose bush and deflated. It was still worth it.

Ordered this Buzz Jet pack one week before Halloween.  Extremely last minute order.  The price I paid was fair.  The only thing is the straps are just elastic.  It was easily broken but it served its purpose for Halloween.  My son absolutely loved it and the product arrived just in time for him to wear it.  Thank you so much!!!
My son loved it! Thanks for everything!Quick shipping and nice product. Wish i had the whole costume and all other toy story members! Fun and cheap!
blow up or not, for under $10 and free shipping, this was a great buy. I blew it up before Halloween and my son runs around pretending he is flying!

I got this for my nephew for Christmas. I was a bit skeptical because sometimes you get what you pay for and this was very inexpensive. I am happy to say that it was perfect. My nephew is 3 and LOVES this. He is thrilled and says he is just like the real Buzz. Even if this doesn't last forever it is worth the price and I would buy more just to keep as spares. It is worth the money and much more. Very satisfied customer!
The jet pack had a hole in the wing when I took it out of the package my son is very upset

Despite warnings that these Buzz wings come with holes even in new products, I knew my 3.5 y.o. son would love these as part of his Halloween costume. The item I received via AMAZON inflated well and is still maintaining air after 3 days. I don't know what would have happened if they were a dud and I had wanted a refund but the risk was worth it as my son zoomed all over town with a huge smile shouting,"To infinity and beyond!"
summary: Prepared for the worst but hoped for the best.

reviewText: ThIs is the second one we have purchased because my son played with his first jet pack until it broke.  It's cheaply made but worth the $10-$15 of enjoyment it brings.
I bought the Buzz inflatable jet back for my 2 year old for halloween.  He loved it! Plus the wings added so much more to his costume.
Inflatable Jet Pack was exactly as described. It was brand new. Very happy as was our daughter, for whom it was purchased as part of her Halloween costume.Thank you

This is a really great option to use instead of purchasing the expensive self expanding wings that they have in the toy store...but ultimately if anyone wants to be Buzz that are older than 6 years of age...the straps will not fit you unless you have the wings deflated (which is no fun.) They are a great size for young ones and definitely make them feel like they can fly to "Infinity and Beyond"!!
summary: Really great for kids but those are the only ones who can enjoy it.

reviewText: It was ok for the money, when I opened the box and saw it I thought I could have gotten this from the dollar store.

I ordered the Buzz Lightyear costume and only upon receipt realized that it did not come with a jet pack or other props.  This jet pack is not cheap as other reviewers have stated.  It is only an inflatable; but my son puts it on almost every day (and has since Halloween) and it has yet to break.  He ends up walking into walls and the wings get stuck on furniture as he is walking, but it has held up.  A must have if your child wants to be BUZZ!!

I ordered the inflatable wings to go with my toddler's halloween costume, it really made the outfit ! Very cute to see my little Buzz Lightyear running threw the house ! The only thing we had to be careful around our puppies sharp teeth since these are inflatable and I was afraid their sharp puppy teeth would puncture them, but overall very cute !
We got it with a hole in the wing. We ordered this item in advance, so by the time he opened the gift, we couldnt return it anymore
summary: My son loved the wings, but we had one problem

reviewText: I found the Buzz Lightyear Costume on Clearance for $5 at Target, what a bargain...well, plus shipping which was about same.  But didn't realize it didn't come with the Jet Pack, which my 2.5 yr old son pointed out was the reason he couldn't say "To Infinity & Beyond".  So we found the Jetpack around the same $5 range, after 2 separate shipping cost, added up to just under $20...but he has been flying all around the house since.  I hope it last for Halloween!  It's Blow up but as good a quality as the pool floats...I'm very pleased with the purchase.
Bought this for my grandson. Beloved it. He payed endless hours and used it for Halloween. Ha held  up great. Would recommend it. Thanks, you made one little boy happy.
My sin loves Buzz light year and this made his Halloween costume a hit! He is still playing with them!

I bought this buzz lightyear blowup pack for my son to go with his buzz lightyear halloween costume. He loves it! He runs around the house like buzz lightyear. They Dont rub on his skin and they are very lightweight. I would buys these again! Great price! Great quality!
My four year old wore this for Halloween and then for his birthday. He never wanted to take them off and the price was nearly half of what any party store wanted for these.

I think this is worth the money.  It completes the costume and gives your child the chance for creative play.  I wouldn't get it if your child was over eight or so but if you have little ones it just completes the outfit.
Got for two year old grandson. At first he didn't want to wear these but when he got into Halloween these were a must to complete his Buzz attire.

My 3 year old has every single Buzz toy there is, I think.  These new wings, purchased as an addition to his Halloween costume, is likely the best yet, although it does annoy him that he can't lower his wings down.  The inflation is good and stays for days, but it is a safety hazzard as my son walks all over the house and turns and then knocks stuff over!  Thank goodness they are just made of plastic.  The only complaint I have is that I wish the back part didn't inflate as much (it sticks really far off his body and makes it impossible to sit with it on) and wish more air went into the wings so they stayed upright better.  The purple part of the wings gets no air or inflation, only the red and white striped part and the ends.  I hope these wings last a long time because my son wants to wear them all day every day, but at least they are a good price if I need to order a new set.
I'm an adult so obviously it was a bit small but it was good for a costume. Not the best quality if you want something durable. It is still in one piece though, after a party.
summary: Good for a one time costume

reviewText: We've had three of these and each one would last at the most 2 months - easily puncture unfortunately.
summary: Great fun while it lasts but it doesn't last long

reviewText: My 3 year old has not taken this thing off in 3 days! I thought it was cheap at first because it was just a blow up jet pack but it was totally worth the price!

reviewerName: Robert O. Holmes Jr. "MD in MD"
reviewText: After 15 minutes my rough and tough boys broke the straps off.  We tried to sew them back on, but essentially was a loss.  They loved it, but it did not last long.
My son loved this item.  It went great with his costume.  He looked adorable.  He still wears them periodically to play around the house.
elastic straps are not the best solution, I had to sew them many times because the stitches make the plastic very weak.

We bought this as a Christmas present for our grandson.  He was Buzz Lightyear for Halloween and is all about everything Buzz. Since he had the costume, we thought he might enjoy dressing up and being Buzz every now and then instead of just once a year (he's 3 years old.)After he opened the present, he wore the wings the rest of the morning.  We were pleased that it was one of the least expensive gifts that we got him and he seemed to enjoy the most.Didn't realize when we bought it that the wings are inflatable,but, with him running around the house they give way and didn't knock anything down, including ornaments on the tree. I'd say well worth the money.

They work okay, stay inflated, but the straps are flimsy elastic straps that wrap around like a backpack and velcro in front. If your child has broad shoulders, they probably won't stay. They wingspan is really wide, my son had to turn sideways to enter and exit buildings. He ran into people with them too. Oh well, they got the job done and he still has them and wears them occasionally. For the price they are probably worth it.
These were so cute and my son loved them.  Unfortunately they didn't last very long.  One of the straps broke before the end of Halloween night.

My 2.5-yr-old loves this thing so much, he wants to wear it all the time.  That's how I discovered that the straps were very poorly constructed.  They came off after just a few days of use, which upset both my son and me.  Not much good if you can't put them on ("like a backpack!" he says).  I'd give it fewer stars if it weren't for the fact that I figured out how to fix it.  White duct tape and a bit of creativity, and, voila!  To infinity, and beyond!  :)
Best option for my son who loves Buzz. Because it's inflatable he doesn't hurt anything when "flying" through the house.

My son received these for christmas, we blew them up right away and he left them on pretty much the rest of the day. They are kind of cheaply made, but he can get them on and off by himself and doesn't seem to care that it's like wearing a floatie device on his back. He's had a blast with them and it was well worth the money. I read the reviews on the actual jet pack and it seems there was lots of issues getting them to stay on the child. This is held on by two stretchy straps and they go over his shoulders like a back pack. Definately worth the amount of fun my 3 year old has had with them.
is a product of excellent quality and durability, I recommend to fill the demands and expectations required by my very good

My 3-year-old son wanted to be Buzz Lightyear for Halloween this year and i thought i would buy him the jet pack as an extra. Since he opened it and put it on he wears it EVERYDAY. It doesn't have much to it but he loves it. It's basically like any pool toy you blow up with elastic straps to put the arms through. Its been pretty durable for having it for a month and him wearing it all the time. Its one of the best $10 purchases I've made in a while!! :)
We used these for our 7 year old's halloween costume for our "Toy Story" booth and they completed his outfit perfectly!

This was not a very expensive toy. The low cost is reason enough to buy it of you've got a Buzz fan in your home. They are inflatable, so it's only as durable as your child is gentle. It's decent sized and seems to hold its shape well. The straps that attach to the arms are a little cheap and could be easily broken, though. For the cost, it's a fun toy.
summary: For a Cheap Toy, It's Good

reviewText: My son insisted on having these wings to go along with his buzz lightyear costume.  I thought that $12.95 seemed a bit high for inflatable wings, but it's a Disney product, hence the markup.  Unfortuantely, I had to use a piece of tape to hold down the piece that you blow air into, as it kept popping out. Very disappointing.

HOLY COW was my boy happy to see this.  This doesn't have any lights or anything, but he LOVED it.  It was hard getting it off of him, but thankfully we did and I think he's forgotten about it now.  lol

We purchased these wings to go with our son's Halloween costume.  They worked for Halloween but a couple weeks later he ended up breaking the little elastic piece off the product that held it onto his arms.  It was an unfixable break as it tore off the piece on the actual wing that the elastic went through.
summary: Fun for a Short Time Span

reviewText: The wings are just blown up like a pool toy. I thought they were going to be made of pillow type material. They look great with the costume but I am not sure how long they are going to last without getting a hole in them. It is not worth the $9.00 extra on top of the price of the costume itself. It should not be more than $5.00 at the most. Don't get it.

Nothing too fancy to say about this accessory.  It is inflatable which runs the risk of get punctured and it ties one with a couple of thin velcro straps which are a little flimsy.  The product though seems like it is of good quality and it really brings the Buzz costume together.  If you bought the deluxe costume, spend a little extra on this - my son loved so it was worth it.

OK, so any Buzz Lightyear costume HAS TO HAVE THIS!! Very cute! But get your gas masks ready and some advil. This thing stinks like nothing I've smelled before. I received this today and immediately took it out of the package to air out. I've worked with industrial plastics and this should require PPE and OASHA air quality testing. It sat opened and unfolded (but not yet inflated) for 4 hours. TO air out, because I know these things can have an odor. Its now been inflated for an hour and MY WHOLE HOUSE SMELLS LIKE VINYL!!! I am not kidding. My head is pounding and I think I have the munchies.We have a Halloween Party to go to on Friday night. Today is Monday, if I do not deem this safe for my 3 year old by then it will go into the trash.But it is holding air and is super cute. Will update this review again if it gets worn.

This product is a good idea, but the inflatable wings would not hold air.  The air plug would not stay put once it was fully inflated.  I also didn't realize it was inflatable-I suppose I didn't read the description well enough, but I was disappointed with the product overall.
The shoulder elastic is sewn into the inflatable wings with just a few stitches. It didn't take long to rip. But we made it through Halloween.
Really good and goes very well with the main costume. We did find that the straps were quite tight though. One of them broke after a few wears but other than that it's great
summary: Straps a little tight but good overall

reviewText: We were VERY excited to get our buzz wings so my son was heartbroken when they snapped after 20 minutes of wearing them. These are such cheap plastic, when we opened them the color had rubbed off when folded/ packed into weird spots. Then the plastic broke where the elastic band attaches so there's no way to wear them or fix them.

My kids love to wear this and have a blast pretending to be Buzz Lightyear. The biggest drawback is the elastic that secures it to the inflatable rips off of it very easily and we had to staple it back on.
summary: At least the kids like it.

reviewText: I'm super glad that I ordered this product for my son's Buzz Lightyear Costume. It totally makes the costume unique and stand out. My son just loves it!

I bought this for my sons Buzz Lightyear costume...he loves wearing it and continues to wear it all the time. You do have to blow it up but for 2 year old I think it was sufficient. Although it was a little wide when he tried to walk through doors but at the end of the day my son loved it therefore I give it 5 stars. It definitely completed the costume and I received so many compliments!
Fits my size 6 son, pretty sturdy and holds up to lots of use. And the price is right as well!

Blowing it up was a booger, and the elastic straps were super thin, but it did the job! Looked great and hung in there til the season was over. I then let the kids play with it and darn if that strap didn't finally give up.

It was a great add on to my 4 year old's Buzz costume. He was able to play with it for a few weeks, but then it got a hole in it and will no longer inflate. Great for halloween, but not necessarily durable enough to last long with regular play time.
summary: Great for halloween. My son loved it! Easy to put on too.

reviewText: I bought my 3 year old son the Buzz Lightyear costume (jumpsuit only) at Target.  I had looked at this costume previously online and saw similar ones with the jetpack, and thought it was exactly what the costume needed.  They were the perfect addition to the costume.  Very easy to inflate too! My son LOVED the jet pack! He wanted to wear them all night and he put them on again first thing the next morning.
summary: Very cute addition to the Buzz Lightyear Costume!

reviewText: Bought this for my 2 1/2 year old son for Halloween. Fits great and the straps did not fall off his shoulder. At the end of the night, my husband put the wings on our Schnauzer dog and English Mastiff...fit them too! Next year, one of our dogs will be Buzz Lightyear!

I purchased these super cool jet pack at Amazon for at least $5 less than other websites.My 2 year old loves them! And so does Daddy and myself.I would buy them again, for Halloween everyone else was so impressed because they truly complete the outfit, I overheard a couple of other "Buzz' parents" saying "Why didn't we get those!?" [jet pack]... pat in the back for this Mama!They are a little smelly when first opened from the package, but it dissipates after a few days, good quality toy, highly recommend it.

Suer cool wings. Easy to inflate. Super light material. The only wrong with this product are the elastic arm straps are too short. If your kid is husky maybe you need to put and extra elastic straps for his comfort.
Overall, this costume is ok--the material's not too heavy nor too thin.  However, the hood seems a bit small.  It could do better with a roomier hood.
Great value for the price. My son is 3 and it made his Halloween. Everyone that saw the wings was impressed. The only problem was he kept wanting to fly, maybe next year.

My son was Buzz Lightyear for Halloween 5 years ago.  We blew the wings up as soon as they arrived, and they have been blown up every sense.  They have withstood years of play by my son and his younger sister and brother.
It looked so much cuter in photos then on the child - very thin material, easy to put on a new born but if ur child is 8 months old buy him for a 2 year old cause it is pretty tight.
My son loves them, but they are inflatable and the center ends up too fluffy. We had to partially deflate them so he could wear them comfortably.

Great base to build a costume from. Add some accessories and your good to go. It's the same cheap fabric they make 90% of store bought costumes out of but you get what you pay for. It looks like It can fit a broad range of sizes- I'm a 4 and this was supposed to be a 10-12 and was fine since it ties in the back. I would have given it a higher score, but it looks like it was placed in the toy category- and I couldn't exactly rate it high on "educational value" :)
my son love his wings until go sleep with his wings, It is very colorful and durable, very nice I will recomen it.
I was not really happy with the quality of the material its verrrry cheap. Its not as nice as the picture shows.
this is a halloween costome that I got for my grandson.  He enjoyed it and looked good in it.  First halloween should always have a punkin costume

I bought this costume under the impression that it would be adjustable since it's a one-size product but when I received it, it was enormous!  I'm about 5'8 and roughly 140lbs and I could've fit two of me in the costume.  Luckily, I was able to trim the extra fabric, just bringing it in on both sides and since it's a stretchy velvet, I didn't have to worry about being too precise.  I'm pleased with the outcome but really, it's not one size fits all so be prepared to make adjustments if you purchase this product.  Not bad for the price though.
It is very Cute and it  fit nicely- I got alot of compliments on it and wore it to 2 parties

This costume was fun to wear to school. Durability is not so good; should be able to get a few wearings out of it if careful. The "one-size" is roughly equal to an 8 or small/medium. Because it zips in the back, the size can be an issue.
My daughter got rave reviews on Halloween and also had fun wearing it for crazy hair day at school.  The dress was a flattering style and fit well.

I received my costume promptly and was excited to try it on. I'm a 6'2 woman and the women's costumes never seem to hang right on me. I was delighted to find that is actually fit me somewhat decently. The waist is pretty high on me so it's more like an empire waist, but the picture kind of shows that. I think this dress would work well for many sizes because of the elastic waist and the overall loose fit. There is a huge slit on the side of the dress so I'll need to wear a black skirt underneath. I couldn't tell from the picture how the headpiece was going to look. It's just a snake mask that has an elastic rubberband on the back so it fits easily over the head. With a little dark makeup and a messy head of hair, this costume should be a hit.
summary: Fun costume...can't wait to give people the 'stare'

reviewText: Just what my daughter wanted for Halloween.  It would give it 5 stars but the snake arm band is pretty cheesy.
Material seems flimsy & the headpiece is so sharp on the forehead  that I have to find a way to make it comfortable to wear for several hours
This came to me quickly and in GREAT condition!  I love it and can't wait to wear it for Halloween!
We used this costume for our 12 year old daughter's Medusa costume.  It is perfect and really classy.  Not like the other "sexy" inappropriate Greek costumes on the market.
summary: Perfect costume for a good price

reviewText: Arrived all smashed and folded. Hot. Uncomfortable. Had to cut much larger holes in the eyes. Could see through the nose holes easier at first. Smells like plastic material. Homers eyes look stoned. Overall crappy, but essential if your going to be homer for halloween. I like stories.
Overall, great experience with Costume Kingdom. Got the Homer mask, and it came exactly as pictured and in timely fashion! Great transaction!
uhh yeah, I had high hopes for this mask but it was just too small for my head.  Not recommended for those of us who have big noggins.  Maybe one has to be old and shriveled to truly wear the mask.

being homer is a great idea for holloween. me and my co-worker dressed up like homer and marge last holloween and we blew everyone else away.the only downside of this mask is: it is VERY hard to wear: the thick vinyl not only makes you sweaty, but also has a strong smell. in addition, the holes/vents on the mask were so few and small that i had to cut out additional ones in order to breathe. i couldn't wear the mask for more than 5 minutes at a time.
summary: good mask but very hard to breath while wearing it

reviewText: This mask is incredibly hot to wear - too hot to wear at a party, for sure.In addition, the wrinkles caused by shipping did not come out, despite treating the mask with a hair dryer per the instructions.
summary: Too warm, wrinkles from shipping don't come out

reviewText: I loved this mask.  Wore it with the shirt I also got from Amazon, a long sleeve yellow shirt, and some blue dress pants I found from GoodWill.  This mask is SUPER HOT though.  It is hard to keep on for more than a few minutes.  I also had a hard time lining up the slits in the eyes so I could see out.  It also arrived with a fairly severe crease down the middle, so I ran a hot hair dryer over it and got it to look good.  Now I just have to stuff it with newspapers and put in a box till next time.  I love the mask though.  It was the hit of Halloween.
summary: Love it, but it is hot

reviewText: I both this for my son thats 5 month old and He looks very cute it's very soft and the mask fits great it's great for halloween....
It shipped quickly and fit my grandson perfectly. I would recommend this to anyone. Very cute outfit even if he didn't wear the face mask
Son loved it, too bad it fell apart after two washings
Quality is what you would expect for a cheap kids costume but sizing said 12-18months but when I got the product it's pkg says 18 months and is big! I am returning it.

My son was 8 months old and wearing 12-month clothes when he wore it for Halloween.  The costume is really cute, but not very durable.  The first time he wore it (for 2 hours) was fine.  He got some food on it so I had to wash it.  When it came out of the wash, part of the felt on the collar had ripped (although I washed on gentle cycle) and the unfinished seams in the sleeves were starting to unravel.  After the third wearing, the unfinished seams in the legs were unraveling too.  The crotch also started to pull at the seams, probably from my son crawling around.  Also, I was never able to get the mask to go on.  If you look carefully at the picture, the mask isn't actually attached.  I think they faked it as there's no way you can get this on a child that can reach and grab.  I debated putting the mask on him when he was sleeping, just to get a picture, but ended up not using it. So, for $15, you can get at least one wearing out of it and some nice pictures as long as you're not too hung up on the mask.  I was disappointed in the quality of the costume.  The seams weren't even finished and it's not that hard to do.
poor quality. the front neckline started to tear as he wore it for least than a full day (my 10 months).
You can only expect one season out of it, unless you have younger kids the same size next season.

This costume is so adorable! My son is 4 months old, he looks better than the picture of the kid on the package! The mask is funky because you have to find a way to rig the string to the mask, but it is adorable!!!!! Great buy, good price for it as well! I say jump on it!

The other reviewers were right on.  The costume is cute and fit my 19 lb daughter; she wore it over her clothes and it still fit just fine. The downside is that doesn't seem very durable or very well made.  Still, I think that it is a great costume for the price and it looked adorable for pictures and trick or treating.  The hat and mask stayed on well.

Bought this for my sons birthday.he did not wear the mask part but the jumpsuit was enough to get the spiderman point across.i did wish there were more snaps in the back to keep costume closed but it guess its like that so he can move around freely. All and all .happy with cost and purchase.five star too cute.
fit my son good. he's a little tall though so the leg part was short but his socks/boots fixed that. was delivered pretty quick too
So we got a helmet for my son's Knight costume!  It was a bit small but the only thing that looked right!  The snaps are hard to use but it was only for a Halloween!
this was small I bought is for my nephew turning 5 and he is average size. It barely fit. plus the cage falls off all the time. His little brother can wear it.

My son wore this costume for his first Halloween (see the customer image picture I posted above) and just loved it. Spider-Man is his favorite super hero and he barely could contain his excitement. The only issue the Mrs. and I found was that the drawstring mask just didn't work. If you have children, you know that infants tend to not take a liking to things around their head and will inevitably take it off. And lest he should try to pull it off the wrong way and choke himself, the Mrs. fastened the mask to a pair of sunglasses that our boy didn't mind. In addition, the costume does not include a pair of red socks which we had to buy separately (why the boy in the main Amazon picture is wearing blue socks is beyond me. I mean c'mon get it right kid!). Besides this the costume was (dare I say it) amazing!Caesar says thumbs up!
This was a gift for our cousins 2 year old son who loves to wear hats. Fits great on his very large head, durable and very cute!
Great quality knight's hat.  I purchased the hat to go along with a knight's costume I had purchased for my son.  Soft and sized for toddlers and little preschoolers.  Great for dress up fun.
summary: Great dress up or halloween accessory

reviewText: My son had been looking for a helmet, the plastic ones we had gotten were too small to drop down the face gaurd. This fits well and the gaurd is adjustable, which was a pleasant surprise. Well worth it.
I loved the hat: it will work perfectly for my son's 6th "Knights" birthday party. The postage was really quick also
summary: I loved the hat, and the postage was really quick

reviewText: The helmet fits a 4 year old, very well. I bought this as a birthday present for my nephew and he loved pretending to be a knight using this helmet as a prop. It is well constructed, the material is a bit thick, which would make it a good addition to a halloween costume.
This helmet is great for pretend play. My son loves it and we love that it is soft too, since he likes to share it with his baby sister who is 7 months old.
My son loves it, face mask snaps off and on and moves easily.  Seems very durable we just got it so I'm sure it will be around for a whole, well made.
This is a neat helmet that seems durable.  It is a bit too small for my 7 year old, though.  :(

My kid (age 3) loves this, wears it almost every day. It looks real enough for him, but it's totally benign and safe. he gets a little frustrated whenever he tries to adjust the 'moving' visor: the two-button snap here doesn't work super-well. That's the only reason I didn't give this 5 stars, otherwise a great purchase.

Ordered this for my 3 year old who wants to be Super Grover for Halloween.  Couldn't find a child size Super Grover, so we are using this along with a blue sweatsuit and an awesome cape I ordered here on Amazon.  My son loves to wear this soft & comfortable helmet...perfect for youngsters and comfortable enough to wear for long periods of time.  It will be great for dress up and maybe even a trip to the Renessance Festival too!  Great find at a great price.

I bought this over a month ago for my 6 year old boy who is pretty rough on his toys.  He wears this helmet everyday, and it survives all the rough-housing of a 6 year old boy and his friends. i'm confident this will last through his younger brother as well. great!!!

I ordered for Halloween costume. My son did not wear it, I knew I was returning it once I opened the box. It looks like it's made out of tin foil, the material is a good idea gone wrong. It is soft and seemed like it would be good for small children but it just looks cheap and silly. Save your time and money and do not buy this item.
Well built, comfortable and great for storming a castle.  If the chivalric code is on the horizon with your child this helmet will prove true throughout all thier battles (real and imaginary).
i bought 2 sets for my grand daughters for christmas and they love them.they hop around with them.they make up cheers.
I did not use this costume - it was a polyester stretchy material, I was hoping it was actual scrubs.  I will end up donating it.
price was good for this item. The costume wasn't what i expected. The costume fit too snug and it was very thin.
my 17yr .old is going to school to be a doc when she graduate from high school.so this is her Halloween costume.
Had to cover the udders with an apron for my story time at the school. For the price the costume is adequate.  The seller was certainly quick in sending this .
summary: Cute costume . but oh those Udders1

reviewText: The design was unusual and nice to look atThe front utters were an added bonus which made it look authenticThe head piece added to the look

This was a good, affordable costume.  I was able to wear it at work and during the evening trick-or-treating.  My only complaint, and I don't know what the remedy would be, is having to tie the suit in the back.  Other than that it was fun and everyone wanted to have their picture taken with me.  A good value for the price.
this suit is too much fun. it's a one size fits all kinda deal and kids love it. it also helps on the days chick fil a asks you to dress up as a cow to get a free meal!

I ordered six of these for a costume contest and they did the job. The big problem is that the udders are a sickly grey/green color and they just look off. We painted them pink but the paint didn't stick very well. However, the hat is really cute and we won the contest.

Just what I needed to round out my Halloween costume. Price is fair, fits fine, looks ok. Hood's a bit cheesy, but it's optional.This, a plastic bandoleer of ammo, a military helmet and second-hand combat boots from an army surplus store and I was Apocalypse Cow. (Who loves the smell of haypalm in the morning.) Showed up at the office Halloween party and told them I was a pun on a movie title. Coworker thinks for a minute and goes "Bull Metal Jacket?" which hadn't occurred to me. So there's no end to the puns a good cow suit will net you.Oh, and costume designers take note: only female cows have udders. Sort of... unsettling for a guy wearing this thing once he starts thinking about it.
I got this one with weird green and white sickly looking udders that say MADE IN CHINA in one inch tall letters across the middle:Comical Adult Size Standard One Size
summary: Received a different costume than what is pictured

reviewText: The fabric is lightweight and appears "breathable"!  The udders are a riot -- sort of an odd color, but nonetheless will work just fine.  Appears to be well-made.  A good value for the price.
summary: Just what I was  hoping for!

reviewText: We had to paint the udders light pink because they we're a strange shade of sage green . Otherwise costume was fine. Fits many sizes .

This is a one size fits all costume, made for someone much bigger than my 5'3" petite self. But I knew that when I bought it. The only thing I don't like, and it's NOT SHOWN IN THE PHOTO, is the "cap" (horns and ears) - there is a cow face designed into it, and it's not big enough to put over a person's face, so you have to cut it off or tuck it under. Bad design there. But the costume's fun. Udderly ridiculous.

I ordered this costume for Halloween and it was the complete opposite of what I was expecting. I'm only about 5'1 and this costume is huge on me. The udders are green NOT pink like the picture and there's a corny hood to go with it, the picture does not resemble the costume at all. I wouldn't recommend this unless that's what you're lookin for.
This costume fits big on my small 5'4" frame, but it didn't stop me from winning the costume contest! Mooray!!!

At my high school we had a theme, and it was farmer's day, i was tired of wearing flannel shirts for the past 3 years so i thought outside the box and decided to buy this, all the teacher i passed by laughed and thought it was original and funny, i was getting a lot of comments (in a good way) how i had the best costume that day. I really recommend this, except for the fact that the utters are grayish instead of a pinkish color, but that didn't bother me at all.

Received the costume really fast.  Udders were a strange grey color.  The back of the costume is open from the neck down to the waist line.  It ties at the top, but you will need to pin it if you do not want it open.  The headpiece is a cheap little piece of fabric with eye holes.  I purchased a Cow head hat to go with the costume and it worked out so much better than the headpiece that came with the costume.  Not bad for an inexpensive costume.
summary: Not too bad for the money

reviewText: The costume does not come the way it looks in pic...the head piece is different.  I called Amazon and the girl overnighted me another one and she even described what the pic looked like but I got the same costume with the wrong head piece.  I would recommend buying at store so u can see it in person.

I was so disappointed. The picture showed a nice pinkish flesh tone for the udder. The costume I received had a gray unattractive udder. I use costumes for my business and this is unacceptable to show a picture and substitute something else...bait & switch.Comical Cow Costume

I got this costume for Halloween. My friends got the same cow costume and we went out as a herd, lots of fun, highly recommended. This costume is very light and comfortable. I didn't get hot at all while I was using this costume. It's a great costume and I recommend being a cow at least once for Halloween.
It was exactly what was expected.  The seller actually put more into the package than what was expected which I thought was cool.  The costume itself was nouthing out of the ordinary.
This was exactly what I was searching for. I  was very happy with the costume! The item was exactly as described
Not comfortable at all. Low quality. I would not recommend this costume. Better to just order from a real uniform store.

The costume is a cheap one for sure.  The head reflector thing kept having the reflector part pop loose from the elastic.  It's an easy fix, but annoying.  I got plenty of compliments on this costume, and the price was right too.

I loved seeing it and ordering it. When it came in it was a bit complicated in where and to lace the belt. The mask runs a bit tight on the head and I don't have a very big head to begin with. It was easy to get in, out, and it was comfy and warm with us standing outside handing candy to children in the cold and wind. But I would recommend this for a simple costume for Halloween

I bought this costume, and I don't like it even a fraction of how much I like the one I made myself out of stuff I had around the house. Some places are too tight, and others are not tight enough. The only part I actually like is the mask, and it isnt even that great. I wish it were made of some other material, so it would be shiny like in the movie. I am really disappointed in this product.
summary: Catwoman Costume - not the best quality

reviewText: The costume is very pretty, but... it is extremely itchy at the seams on the shoulder and elbows.  I'll have to figure something out to cover those seams because after having it on only a few minutes my skin was very red and irritated.  Be prepared to leave glitter wherever you go because it sheds.  I shook it out several times but the glitter is never ending.  If you're even a little busty this is a tight fit at the chest, and the neckline is very small.  I may have to make adjustments there or not zip it all the way.  I normally wear a size 10. As previously stated, the 'crown' is nothing as pictured.  The crown is a silver piece of stretchy foam that is sized for a child.  I cannot wear it, well, it's possible, but it looks ridiculous. If I hadn't waited until the last minute to order a costume, I would definitely send it back and try a different costume.  I may still send it back and buy locally.

I got this costume, because i was playing Glinda the Good Witch for my school play. The dress came in the day before our performance. It was so beautiful, i loved it. It was just like the dress in the Wizard of Oz, i looked just like Glinda, with my crown and wig too. The only bad part about the dress was it was a little itchy, but that was ok. So i just wore a leotard underneath and some pink tights, and it looked great. I highly recommand any one who wants a Glida Dress, to get one from here. Thank you Halloween Extreme!!!

I WANTED TO BE GLINDA, AND I WAS. I GOT LOTS OF COMPLIMENTS ON THE DRESS WAND AND FUNNY CROWN! ONE ARM WAS SMALLER/TIGHTER THEN THE OTHER SO IT RIPPED A LITTLE WHEN TRIED GETTING IT ON. AND THE ARMS ARE VERY VERY SCRATCHY ITCHY SO I HAD TO WEAR A WHITE LONG SLEEVE SHIRT UNDER IT. THAT REALLY WASN'T A BIG DEAL. IT STILL LOOKED NICE. I AM SIX FEET TALL AND A SIZE 8. THE DRESS WAS HIT ALMOST TO MY SHOES SO IT'S A GREAT LENGTH BUT THE WASTE CHEST AND ARMS WERE VERY FITTED ON ME AND I AM NOT BIG CHESTED AT ALL. SO THIS IS NOT A ONE SIZE FITS ALL. IM SURE YOU COULD TWEAK THE BACK CLOSURE TO GET IT TO FIT A WIDER FRAME BUT THE ARMS WOULD BE A PROBLEM. ANYWAY. MY 4 YR OLD WAS DOROTHY AND SHE WANTED ME TO BE GLINDA. I HAD TO DO IT! SO IT WORKED FOR ME AND MY LITTLE PRINCESS WAS SO HAPPY! THAT'S ALL THAT MATTERS!
summary: IT SERVED IT'S PURPOSE AND WAS FUN TO WEAR

reviewText: Do not get this costume unless you want to look like a fat pink blob.  The entire costume is cheaply made.  By the middle of the night, the satin section in the waiste area ripped.
The costume looks just like it does in the picture -- I got lots of compliments. But the mesh on the arms is very itchy and uncomfortable!
summary: Looks good but is super itchy!

reviewText: This says fits size 10-12 I usually wear an 8 or a 6 & the sleeves were so tight it almost cut the circulation off in my arms. I ended up cutting slits in the back of the arms to get this to work. Just know it fits fine in the body for a size 8 but it's tight in the arms.
summary: Very pretty costume but fits smaller than expected

reviewText: Bought this costume as part of a group costume at work. It was a last minute ordeal, and I purchased the costume on site, without trying it on. When I got to work on Halloween, I went into the bathroom to put it on, and I couldn't believe how painful the seams were against my skin! Mind, I have very sensitive skin, so while other reviews say it was "itchy," I say it felt like torture. I was wearing yoga pants and a cami under the dress, so it was my shoulders and arms that took the brunt of the scratching. I managed to wear the costume for about 10 minutes before having to take it off due to the pain. When I did, I looked like I got into a fight with a feral cat. On my lunch break, I was able to run home and grab a long sleeve shirt to wear underneath. Once I put on the long-sleeve, I was able to wear the costume without problem.The costume is very pretty, but it does it get glitter everywhere. I did not wear the crown; I bought a hard-plastic crown instead and it looked fine. If you have sensitive skin, I would highly suggest wearing a long-sleeve shirt and pants underneath.

The Glinda dress was beautiful and of nice quality. I will save it for years to come. The crown, however, is completely NOT what is pictured. I feel like the manufacturer did a bait and switch. The one that was included was flimsy, undecorated foam. It wouldn't stand up and it was very tacky looking. I spent an entire evening making it into something that went with the dress - reinforcing it to stand up straight and decorating it with glitter and rhinestones.
summary: Fabulous dress, crown was a scam

reviewText: This dress was exactly what we needed for my daughter's part as Glinda the Good Witch in her schools Wizard of Oz play.  The price was very reasonable compared to renting a costume.

The crown is awful! Does not look anything like the picture. It's a cheap, flimsy, foam thing. I had to buy a different crown, adding to the over all cost of the costume. I was very disappointed with the look and quality of the crown.The dress is fine. It's a little scratchy. On the small side, if you wear a size 12 you will have problems, I wear a size 8, it's tight in the arms and around the neck, it's snug through the bodis.Over all it's fair for the price.
Good costume, hat is a little thin, but it's just for one night, right? Don't bother with the straw accessories.

The costume itself is pretty dead on for the scarecrow. However, there is no front/back definition to the pants, which makes them a little uncomfortable. Comes with a few pieces of rope, but needed to order the additional straw kit (bands of straw for wrists, ankles, etc) to make it look a little more authentic.
I saw this a couple different places and glad we got it from Rubie's - it was cheaper but the same product from other companies.  My scarecrow looked great in it.

Ordered this for my husband for Halloween. We went as the scarecrow and tin (wo)man. Costume was exactly what we ordered. All we added was some straw (from the craft store) to the sleeves and the hat. Worked perfectly.

The Scarecrow costume was an excellent base for the overall costume.  I added my own straw and some additional canvas rope to enhance the costume for our annual Halloween gathering.  The fit was as expected, and it is loose enough allowing you to wear regular clothing articles underneath.  The quality is quite low (very thin fabric), but for the price and a one time use you cannot beat this scarecrow costume.
summary: Excellent value, but add your own accessories to win the costume contest

reviewText: I ordered this dress and received an entirely different one. It is still Glinda but has ugly butterflies on it and the sleeves are too small to get on. I am 5'11" so I thought maybe it was just me, but I had my 5'6" extremely petite sister try it and couldn't get the elastic (that is to go around your BICEP) past her wrist.RIDICULOUS. I hope I have enough time to get a costume for Halloween ...
summary: This isn't the costume they send.

reviewText: I bought this costume for a camp I was attending as a councilor.  It was inexpensive, easy to wear, and light weight.  I didn't like the hat so I used my own.  The costume could of come with some extra straw for head and hands.  I found some in the art room at the camp and used that.  I think the costume worked perfectly for what I needed it for.
summary: Scarecrow costume rocked the costume party

reviewText: My husband was in a Wizard of Oz skit and he was the Scarecrow.  I ordered this costume, along with a separate straw accessory kit.  The costume was made from a very flimsy fabric (including the hat), but the overall look was that of scarecrow.  To add more authenticity to the look, I bought a bag of raffia from my local craft store and hot-glued several strands around the hat, the sleeves, and the pants to give him more fuller, overstuffed-with-straw look.  It served its purpose and my husband retained his dignity for wearing a scarecrow costume.
For the price, this costume was great and the large fit my 6 ft 190# husband just right. We thought about adding some straw but it looked great without it.

Got this for my daughter to wear in a school play. She is 5'5", 110 lbs and the pants fit her. They can expand a bit more around the waist and the legs are just a little bit short. The top is HUGE. Easily could fit a man 6'3" about 230+ lbs. I was planning to sew them to reduce the size when I bought it....fortunately, I was able to use the ropes attached to the cuffs and waist to "cinch it." I'll just add a bit of polyfill stuffing and glue on some raffia to the ends of the sleeves and pants and I think it will work. But the sizing info is WAY off.
summary: Easily could fit a man 6'3" about 230+ lbs

reviewText: Made of very thin material and way to small for my husband (6'3"). I would not recommend for anyone who is over 6' or if your looking for a costume to wear in colder weather.
Comfortable and great looking! All you need to do is add a little hay and poof! you are a scarecrow!

The costume over all looked great.  My husband dressed up as the scarecrow, with me being dorothy and my baby was the lion.  I do have to say though, that the costume was just a little small, and my husband is not a big man.  He is only 5ft 5inches tall and i would say that the pants fit him perfect, but the top was a bit awkaward.  The hood is sewn onto the top and he needed a little bit more room in that neck area.  I almost cut it apart.  But it looked good enough so I didn't mess with it.We did win my contest at work!
summary: Great costume, but a bit small

reviewText: very good product. my son looks adorable in it.  i think it is too small for an adult male. but other then that it looks great.
Maybe worth 10.00 but certainly not 40.00, material of entire costume is extremely low quality.  Not worth the price

will pair this costume with the Dog Dorothy costume ,should be really cute. Quick service and well packaged.I have bought several of the Rubies costume over the years and they are great. I think they tend to run small but been good.
summary: this will be fun for halloween and my dog is dorothy

reviewText: The costume is exactly like the picture. The pants were a little short but by adding some fake straw it gave a good appearance. I would order this again if I needed a scarecrow for a single event.
Was concerned about the quality of the costume when I got it but it looked good on and worked well for an Oz dance number.  It came on time and fit as expected.
Our family dressed up at the Wizard of Oz this year, I bought this for my husband.  He had no complaints about the size or how it felt.  It looked great!

This costume worked out great for me.  Of course it's cheap fabric.  For $25 I didn't expect anything more.  But I was able to spruce it up a little with some straw and a brown vest, and the whole thing came out looking great.  Just glued the straw to the insides of the sleeves, under the neck and around the top of the hat.  Overall an easy and good looking costume.
best part is it is a two piece. fit  a 5'8" 140 guy just fine. He was skeptical at first after the fitting of the tin man on my brother. but he wore it all night!
Just what we ordered! Came quick and was easy to assemble! Perfect for the average sized adult, cute costume! Love!

I wore this costume to Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party, and it held up very well.  I have no rips or tears or anything from it and it was very comfortable. I also wore some gym shorts and a shirt underneath it.  I received a bunch of compliments about how cool it looked. I went with my significant other, who was dressed as Dorothy. Very comfortable and cool. You can wash it in a washing machine and dryer, but use a delicate cycle, to be safe. Great Costume!
Good adult Halloween costume. Just as expected. Perfect for our wizard of oz theme. Headpiece was a little uncomfortable but that was expected.
This costume fit my husband (5'10", 150lbs) perfectly.  With a little face paint and the added straw kit he looked like the perfect scarecrow.  It paired perfectly with my Dorothy costume.
will work for a quick costume. cheap fabric but true to sizes. not really worth the price, but it did the job

My husband is a big guy (6 foot 6) and this worked well for him.  We just tied extra straw around his wrists and feet to make it a little "longer" looking.  It was a fun costume and the price was perfect

The costume looks authentic but the material is on the thin side when looked at closely. I think it would be nicer if it had more "straw" like material around the neck and feet and wrists. But, overall it gets the job done if your looking for a scarcrow for wizard of oz.
summary: Authentic looking...but material on thin side

reviewText: I ordered this costume for Halloween. It fit nicely, but I am a woman 5'7" 134lbs. I'm not sure how this would fit a man!
It looks like the picture shows and overall we are happy with it.  Only issue is the hat is extremely small, thin and flimsy.  May need to look for a better hat.
This was a fun costume.  It received an enthusiastic response when I wore it.  It arrived on time and in good shape.  I wore it at events for both seniors and teenagers.
Very cute costume fit very well and overall made well very satisfied with this product. It served its purpose well.
it is a very nice costume would recomend to others comfortable fit and easy to put on and take off
Things are never as they appear in photos but this was pretty close. I would suggest buying this if you need a reasonable costume.

Costume is good, fit is more or less one size fits all on this one, if you are a large tall guy, may not work.  I am 5'11" and 165, fits fine for me and could easily go bigger in the waist for someone else.  Rope I had to burn the ends to keep it from unraveling but to me this is minor for the cost of the whole costume.  Hat is a joke, it is like a coffee filter coming out of the package, may thrown it in the dryer or something to see if I can get it not look like I am wearing an envelope on my head.  :)
This is really cute.  It didn't come with all the parts seen in the picture.  The sizes are great and it fit very well

The neck piece, just under the rope, in no way goes out to the shoulders and down the chest. It barely shows beneath the rope. Like the other reviews the hat is a joke. The picture shows a large pointed crown. The hat in the package is closer to a bowler. The material is cheap. It'll do the job but certainly wasn't worth the $50. I bought Burlap to cover the head piece and will use liquid latex to add the burlap texture to my face.

This year my friend and I choose the thyme The Wizard of Oz for Halloween and I was the scarecrow. The costume was ok, the only problem I found was the hat being a cheap quality and i couldn't make the hat to stay on my head for a long time because it kept falling off.
Nice costume that I was able to add some extra props to.  I won 2nd prize in  an adult costume party!

Costume looked really great on my husband, however, it doesn't quite look like it does in the picture.  So, if you want a more "realistic" look to your scarecrow, use this costume as a starting point then add your own touches.
This costume was great for the price.  Totally looked like the scarecrow once all done up.  Ordered the straw kit from Amazon as well.  Would recommend.
summary: Great costume for the price!  Totally worked.

reviewText: used this for halloween as we dressed up as the wizard of oz crew. everyone liked the costumes! Would buy again. I am a size Medium and this fit fine.

This costume is cool. The hat disappointed me. It did not have a high top like the picture described.  It did not stay on my head. The fabric of the hat was too delicate to handle, so I had to wear a different hat. I wore a hillbilly hat that matched the hat described in the picture, and I was able to decorate it with fabric and make the costume stand out more. Other than that this costume is great.
summary: Great costume. The hat disappointed me.

reviewText: too tight in the crotch for a 5'11 200+ lb person. Ended up cutting it up and sewing it to become a dress. Homegirl ROCKED IT!!!
summary: for real, real about that crotch statement

reviewText: VERY, VERY, VERY cheaply made. Sizing is WAY off(too small)  Looks better in picture than it does on. Very POOR quality, for the outrageous price. The tail ripped and it is sewn right on your lower rearend instead of up higher.  VERY DISAPPOINTED

I agree with the other review; this is a cute lion costume but runs small! I bought it for my son, who is of average size, and it was too small! He ended up wearing it anyway due to not having enough time to send it back for the party he was attending, and it tore the first time he wore it! If you are of average height and weight you better order the larger/plus-size to be safe!
I knew it ran small from previous reviews... It was for a middle school play so it was fine.  Material was cheap

I ordered this costume along with accessories for the costume. It was said to arrive the 26th through the 28th. The accessories both came in days before promised. The costume did not arrive, and when I checked online I was told there was nothing I could do to get it here faster. A phonecall was made and it was then I was made aware on Thursday the 25th my costume was sitting in a warehouse in Texas, a long ways from Missouri, not even shipped out of the warehouse yet. Therefore, the costume (shipping out of Target stores) arrived on Tuesday after Halloween which was on the Sunday before. Yet, I had my accessories to make me feel worse about the situation. I was told I could not sign for the package but it was left in the mailbox and would cost me more than I had spent to go about getting my money refunded!
The tin Man adult size costume was very small.  It was tight through the crotch to the upper bodice.  It could fit a middle school elementary child better than an small adult.
Cheaply made and way too small
Delivery was fast and the item was in great shape!  Thanks for the prompt service!  Too bad the heart, axe and gloves don't come with the outfit!  Oh well!  Thanks again!

The product said it was one size fits all. This is not so true. I am 6 foot tall and only weigh 150. I'm a very skinny man and this costume was super tight. I had to cut the whole bottom half off in order to even velcro the back shut. Which I might add, the Velcro ripped off the costume within an hour of having it on.

this costume was not made for an adult if so the adult would have to be under 100lb and about 4' tall.  My husband is 5'5" and 140lb's and he had to wear it open in the back.  the material is so cheap that it fell apart taking it out of the package.

if the male is 6 ft, and 210 lbs, well lets just say you better get the plus size one. My boyfriend tried it on (5'8", 140lb) still was a little tight in the crotch. Had my brother try the standard size, the 6 footer, and, hahahahahaha..gross, I got more acquainted with his crotch area than i cared to be. If you are concerned about the crotch comments, my suggestion is to just get the plus size. Other than that, this costume was worth it.I ended up buying silver faberic and made the crotch and legs area bigger.
summary: Concered about the Crotch? Get Plus Size

reviewText: This product is very nice looking and probably the Only accurate looking tin man costume out there. I'm 5'10 weigh 140'pounds have sleeve length 33 collar size 15.5. The problem is this costume was extremely tight in the crouch area and didn't close in the back. The sizing was off by a mile and I now have to return this item.

Interesting costume.  Tight.  Very tight. Uncomfortable in the crotch.  Didn't close in the back.  I'm not that big of a guy.  Pretty average.  But, it's not like you have another option if you want a real Tin Man costume.

I was very disappointed with the sizing of this costume.  It was to be for an adult male, one size fits all.  It was more on the size of a child.  I ended up making the costume over, using it as a pattern.  If I were a man, I would be considered to be small.

I read the reviews, so I was aware that the costume ran small. I thought that it would be okay for my husband because he is only 5'3" and weighs 135 lbs. This costume still did not really fit him. He had to buy supportive pants for underneath or it was going to be a bit embarrassing for him. I also altered it to loosen the crotch area. We managed to make it work, but he wasn't as comfortable as I would have liked. It's a shame that it is so ill fitting because it is the most accurate costume that I could find. This costume can not be intended for any adult male. It is a child's size.

Bought this costume for my fiancé, who is about 5’11” and maybe 180lbs. When he tried this costume on, it wasn’t even close to fitting. Are you kidding me??? It’s seems to be made for a child. I couldn’t believe it! Plus, the material is super thin and cheap. Don’t buy this costume for an adult male, unless they are short and VERY skinny. I would probably give this 0 stars, if I could. The only plus was the hat that came with it, which we ended up using. And don't be fooled, the axe and heart are NOT included.

I should have listened to the first reviewer who said the costume didn't fit her husband who is 5'6 - she said it wouldn't close in back. I figured it would work for my husband b/c he is very skinny. I am 5'3 and I tried it on - I can't even completely raise my arms in the jumpsuit! I bought this for my 6'0 husband - I don't know what adult man would fit into this....don't bother buying it, especially because now I can't even return it (funshippedfast doesn't take returns, which I didn't realize!)
The costume in the picture is not what they sent. We called them and told them that. Apparently they don't care because the image is still wrong.
this costume is not for an adult,  small or otherwise....the design crummy, fabric cheap, construciton even worse...too late to return...make your own

This costume is ridiculous. I bought it for my daughter who is 5' 2" and 120 pounds and it was so tight. Not to tight around but from r shoulder to crotch. Looks nothing like the picture and this costume could never fit a man. I am sending it back and making her one myself.
I bought this for a 12 year old girl and it fits her perfectly.  Looks nice.

IT ALL GOES ALRIGHT BUT THEY HAVE TO WEAR THE BASTARD WITH PANTS OR SHORTS BECAUSE IT GIVES THEM MANTOE BEYOND BELIEF. THEY'VE ALSO GOT TO WEAR A SHIRT OR SOMETHING BECAUSE THERE'S A OPENING ON THE BACK AND WITHOUT THE CAPE PRICKS ARE ABLE TO SEE THEIR BEAUTIFUL BACKNESS.LOOKS GOOD BUT.

i put this costume, excited to surprise my nephew, only to be left horrified at the strangulation of my balls in mirror. camel toes is more like it. it accentuated my behind, but the front was just a horror.it would look decent when i hunched over, relieving my crotch of the pressure of the polyester.this costume is made for hobbits. if taller than bilbo, stay away, and go back to the shire.
