But if you are looking for something for you child to play dress-up in for months to come, invest in something more durable!The costume also tends to run small.  My son is on the big side and at age 3 1/2 it JUST fit (he normally wears a size 4/5).  If you will be wearing bulky clothes underneath for trick-or-treating or if you just have a bigger kid, then consider getting the next larger size.So in summary:  Great for one-time use, NOT so great for long-term play.
summary: Good for a one-time use but not very durable

reviewText: I wish I would've read the reviews before buying this costume.  It is made of extremely cheap material and I have had to sew it already in the 1st week.  It is made for a child to only wear once.  Definitely not worth the price I paid for it.  I wish I would have just bought material and made my own.

We got this for my 4 year old (who normally wears 4T)  and it fits just right, if a little long in the sleeves.  We did not receive the mask in the package but my son wasn't too concerned.  He's worn it a couple times and it's starting to get a run in the sleeves.It's pretty much what I expected, an inexpensive Halloween costume that won't last much past a few wearings.

My son LOVES this outfit!!  The mask runs a little small and barely fits my 3 year-old's head and the costume is huge - I had to hem the bottom.  But he doesn't care and really enjoys wearing it and playing.
This item show a full face mask along with the muscle shirt, I too did not read the reviews before I purchased... Wish I did...Kid hates it, wont wear..

We bought this for our son for his 6th birthday - he swore it was what he wanted. We let him wear it for his birthday party and by the end of the party, it was ripped and had strain lines around his neck. The fabric is so cheap and thin that it wore out after only 3 hours? Did they think that children just use a superhero costume for walking around in? We are the kind of parents that let him keep a bin of dress up clothes year around and if we are spending this much money on a costume, we want him to be able to use it more then once.

I bought this Spiderman costume for my grandson and he was excited to try it on. I am not happy with it at all. It is VERY cheaply made. Within one day of use, the seams started to rip and fray. The material it is made out of runs easily (like nylons do). If your child will only wear this once, then it is a perfect costume, but if he wants to "live" in it then I would recommend investing in something a little more durable.
He was excited getting this, the only issue is for him that the head cover is a little small for his head.
My daughter cannot get this off of my grandson; he is absolutely in love with it.

Well, my friend and I were wanting to do some cosplay, and I REALLY wanted to be Spider-Man, but without buying a suit over $100 so we got this instead, thinking I could modify it, and we were right, I cut out the eyes of the mask and replaced it with some white rubberish-foam mesh, took off the velcro on the back and just sewed it up, and I covered the nose holes with red mesh on the inside, I am currently working on the body peice, and I now have a job, and I have a special savings for a $130 Spider-Man full body spandex suit, and I have another special savings (for drivers ed. :/ )
summary: I modified it to fit my 16 year old body

reviewText: My son just received his costume today, and he is very excited about it.  I wish I would have read the reviews before I ordered, because I was also misled by the photograph.  I expected to receive the mask which covers the whole face (although it sounds like that mask doesn't allow for breathing).  My son is three, also, and I fear he will be disappointed with his, if he sees that someone else has the full face mask on.  The hat is too big, although my son is of average size. The eye mask doesn't have big enough holes, nor the right spacing, to allow him to see properly, and he won't allow me to cut bigger holes.  I will probably end up painting his face like spiderman.  But, overall, he seems happy with his costume, so that is a good sign.

It is a real cute costume ,. And easy for my son to put on..I was a bit skeptical after reading the reviews ,but the look is all good.The cap does not seem like  fabric , its some thing like a mix of net and paper.My son wore it on the halloween day  and the next  2 evenings (he loved it), so the stitch on the shoulder came off .The 5 stars are for the quick delivery(2 days) , the looks and the way it made my 3 and half year old Thomas fan happy.For the quality i rate it as 3 stars.

This was purchased as a Halloween costume for my grandson. He loves Thomas so was very happy with it.  It easily fits over his regular clothes and is comfortable.  We did sew elastic bands to the sides to keep it from gaping.

My son loved his costume.... he wanted to be Thomas for halloween & I didn't think I could get a 'Thomas' costume.......... & helooked so cute in it!!!the costome was delivered within 5 days... service was EXCELLENT!!Thank you so much

The reason I gave it 2 stars is because it made my son happy. The colors are nice and bright. Otherwise, I would have only given it 1 star. It is poorly designed. The Velcro does not stick, so the costume kept falling down in the front making my son trip repeatedly. It needs a design redo!  The hat is quite cheap too. Luckily, my son had a Thomas baseball cap so he wore that instead.

My son's first words were "chugga chugga whoo whoo". Okay, not really but they might as well have been. My son loves everything to do with trains, doesn't matter if its Thomas the tank engine or not. This is the costume I had to hide a few weeks ago so we could have a normal family picture without my son wearing his Thomas costume. To say my son loves it is an understatement. I had to pin the sides together so he could walk without falling down, he's a little on the short side (gets it from his father). But I can see him wearing this for the next couple of Halloweens no problem. The only problem I had with the costume was the hat, it was way to small to fit on his noggin. But since we have a problem with hats and 3 year olds anyways, it wasn't that big a deal.

Recently purchased this for my 5 year old grandson.  He was so happy when he received the package and couldn't wait to put it on.  He carries it in his backpack.  After all, you never know when Spiderman will have to come to the rescue!
summary: Want to see a 5 year old smile?

reviewText: This might work for many kids, but my 21-month old son didn't like the apron-like style of the costume.  Having it hanging down in front of his knees just slowed him down when we tried it on.  The hat is cute, but he didn't want to keep it on.  We're returning it and getting something that allows for more movement.
summary: Not an ideal costume for active kid

reviewText: Such a cute costume. My son loves it. Doesn't look like the best quality- but good enough for some dress up fun. Funs a little small- and hat is snug; but overall still adorable :-)

My son uses this for dressup and for Halloween -three years in a row.  The style allows it to fit for a large range of children's sizes.  It has been very durable for us.  The hat is a bit chitzy so we used a blue and white stripped conductors hat.Best money we ever spent on a costume.
summary: Best value and most loved costume

reviewText: I read a few of the reviews describing this thing as cheap but thought "What the heck - it's just a Halloween costume". My oh my. This thing is CHEAP. And the hat looks NOTHING like the one in the photo. Probably not worth the money.

The costume arrived on time and exactly as described.  The only problem face was trying to get my Thomas loving nephew into the costume.  Not that there was any problem with the fit but rather he refused (what can you do with a 2 1/2 year old).  So my sister put it on herself and was Thomas for Halloween.  Oddly enough it fits both adults and toddlers alike.  My own 2 y/o has been happily pretending to be a train in the outfit every night since.

I purchased this costume for my little boy who absolutely loves trains and Thomas. The costume came and arrived fast however there was no hat included and it was very bulky and only sat on the shoulders there were no ties or anything to keep the costume from coming off. Not a completely bad product just wasn't what we were expecting.

My son totally adores this costume. He is 4 and Thomas is his favorite character. This costume is perfect in that it can be put over ANYTHING, so the weather doesn't matter. No worries about the child being too cold or too hot. As a mom who is very finicky about her kids being adequately dressed for temps, this is a HUGE homerun!

I bought this because my son likes Thomas & Friends, but I couldn't believe what a flimsy "costume" it was when I opened the package and took it out. The costume and that hat probably cost the distributor [...] cents to make in China, and they sell it for close to $[...] retail. This is just capitalism at its worst, even after taking the necessity of licensing into account. I'm taking it back to the local store.

We just recieved the Thomas Halloween Costume - My son and I LOVE it!!  It will be worn often for Halloween, dress-up and play.  It's great because he can wear it indoors with regular clothing or outdoors in our cold Minnesota weather for trick-or-treating and there's more then enough room to bundle up underneath it!  I was also pleased with the shipping - it came in just a couple days and the shipping was free!  Can't beat it!

If your boy is into trains he will like this costume, and that is what really matters. This is why I gave it 3 stars.But as a parent let me tell you what is wrong with this. At the time of Halloween my boy was 38 inches tall. The costume goes over his head like a sandwich board. It is very loose while he is running around because there are no side straps. This leads to him tripping on the bottom or having it catch on anything he runs by. But the hat was very tight, there is no way it would fit him next year. SO the hat is to small and the costume was to big. Construction of the costume is low grade but for the price I was not expecting more. I would not buy this again after seeing it.
Purchased for my grandson for Halloween.  Quality is very good and I'm sure he'll have a good time with the costume after Halloween.

The costume looks great and fits great for my 3 year old. I was debating between this and the long version of the same costume and like this better as he can sit in school with  it on or anywhere. There is also a cool pouch type thing to hold all of his candy.
summary: LIke this better then the long version

reviewText: The costume was for my 2 year old granddaughter.  It was HUGE on her.  I thought when I purchased it that it said it was for a toddler.
My 4 year old son loved wearing this for Halloween. We added ties under the arms to keep them in place.
My soon liked it as soon add I unpacked it but it was a little to long and if he tried to walk he would step all over it. I will follow up after Halloween.

I didn't purchase this off Amazon but at Toys R Us after Halloween when they had all their costumes on clearance. My son is a huge Thomas fan so I thought he would enjoy this for dress up. The hat is a pretty decent quality (he needs help getting it on) and the Thomas fits him excellent but the Velcro that holds the costume together on the back is very poor! It keeps falling apart which makes Thomas slide down a little bit. Also the same day I bought it I had to sew a seam back together because it ripped after one wear. I didn't pay much for it and my son enjoys it so that's why I gave it 3 stars however I would've liked a better quality item.
summary: Little Poor Quality But Son Enjoys

reviewText: We had borrowed this costume in the past but went ahead for the purchase after, once again, my son wanted to be Thomas for Halloween. This is a fast easy costume that will stand the test of time.

I expected the costume to be made of fabric, but it is made of thin material, almost like foam/paper, and does not look durable.  The hat is even thinner (like surgery cap).  It's fine for an evening of trick or treat and for pictures.  My son seems to like it.
summary: Looks cute in picture, but not impressed with quality

reviewText: My son was 2 1/2 when he wore this for Halloween, and he still plays with it when he is playing with his trains!  There is room for him to grow in it too!

I ordered this for my son who is two and 38in tall. I was worried that I would be too long but it was just short enough for his feet to go under the bottom. The material was kind of cheap but you get what you pay for so I didn't expect it to be perfect. I also had to use a safety pin to hold the back together because the Velcro kept coming undone and then my son would trip on the costume. Overall it did what I needed it to do.

The costume was great for my 2 year old son last year (he is average weight and height). It was only sightly big, but it wasn't too too big for him - he could definitely wear it.  The conductor's hat was a nice touch. Good quality and I recommend to other parents.
summary: It fit and it was fun!

reviewText: This is a cute costume but it is front heavy as all of the designs and extra fabric (since it's 3D) are all in front. If the child is short, then there is a possibility of tripping. The hat is very thin unlike the costume.
Great costume that was well built. Great for children that love Thomas. Size is adjustable. I washed and put up incase he wanted it next year. Came with a cute hat.
It was clean and sent on time really had a nice time for Halloween the hat just made it that mush all better
Loved this costume as it works well with any weather conditiion. We got a lot of compliments and now my kids can use them to play around the house.
The material of both pieces was about what I expected it to be. The hat was even a little nicer than I expected. My 3 year old nephew loved it. It also fit great!
My grandson wanted to be Thomas the Train for Halloween.  I made the granddaughter's costumes, but didn't couldn't find a Thomas pattern.  He loved his costume!

My grandson just turned 3 years of age and really likes Thomas The Train.  I bought this for him even though the package stated sizes 4 - 6.  The way the costume is designed (slips over the head), it fits him perfectly.  The railroad cap is the crowning touch!  He looks so cute in it and can't wait to go Trick or Treating!
summary: Thomas The Train Costume comes in a winner!

reviewText: It said up to 6t but it fit my son who is a 3t. The whole outfit was really cute and we got lots of compliments.

I was thrilled with this purchase for my 3yr old!  He looked so adorable and the hat was the perfect accessory!  It was a little big for him but he could still wear it without a problem and the best part was how you put it over his everyday clothes so he  wouldn't freeze while trick-or-treating.  Absolutely an adorable costume!
I bought this for my 2 year old son who's a Thomas fanatic. The costume fit him well he's usually a 3T and it fit a little long, but it serves its purpose.
Product is nice but if you buy it make sure to run to the store and get some safety pins as the tiny patch of Velcro does not stay secure and the whole costume comes forward causing children to trip

We bought this for our 3 year old son because he refused to be anything else for Halloween.  After getting this product in the mail (5 stars for shipping!  We received the item very quickly.) I'm extremely disappointed in the quality, and the price.  I've seen this advertised for as little as $19.99 and as high as $32.99 when it shouldn't be priced any higher than maybe $9.99.  The material is hardly any stronger than that thin foam wrapping that is on new electronics when you take them out of their original boxes.  Last year my son wore his costume several times because he loved it so much...it was a $10 chicken costume.  This year I'll be surprised if we make it out of the house to go trick or treating before he rips this costume.  Oh and the hat...NOTHING like the one in the picture.About my ratings:I gave it a 5 for fun because my kid wants nothing other than to be Thomas for halloween and he'll be SO excited to see his costume when we give it to him.I gave it a 1 for educational value for obvious reasons.I gave it a 1 for durability for the reasons I stated above.Overall I'd give this costume a 2.
summary: Fast Shipping.  Quality of product leaves much to be desired

reviewText: My son wore this last Halloween and we're planning on using it again next Halloween for my other Thomas fanatic (my younger son). Easy on and off and it seemed pretty comfortable for a costume!
Costume goes right over regular clothes.Easy on, Easy off!My son loved this costume! It was worth the money !
My little guy loves this, though needs safety pins to fasten the sides so he could keep it on otherwise moves around too much.

Easy costume to put on and off. It is sized for a 3-4yr old. My 2 yr old was a bit swamped in it. However he loved it and when he was tired of wearing it, it was easy to slip off and he was wearing street clothes underneath.
Sizing is right on... my son is a "small 3" and it was a little big, the shoulders slipped a lot.  Durable enough to be worn a few more times!
My grandson loved it. He wears it all the time. He says it will be his holloween costume this year.
cheap - But I guess for such a cheap costume, I'm getting my money's worth.  Plus - the back of your hear is "Exposed".
summary: Its worth matches the amount you pay for it...

reviewText: I love the costume and my grandson looks great in it.  He loves the mask because he can scare his brother and cousin :).  Thank you for the great service, timely delivery and wonderful product.
This was a great halloween costume. One of our favorites! We also got some gloves with lights in the fingers from Amazon. Best costume ever.
This costume was much better quality then I expected.  I only needed the masks and they worked great for my needs.
A giant  hit with the little one. Was too long so we just taped it up. He killed every alien for days with his space gun....too cute.
The mask shown in the picture is misleading and nothing like the mask received which is basically a very cheap plastic mask that only covers the face.
but for the price is what we should expect, looks fine and my boy is happy so i recommend it
summary: The mask be carefull it breaks easily,

reviewText: perfect little alien costume for a 5 yo obsessed with costumes. mask looks just like a typical alien. dress fit good for a tall 5 yo.
This costume was exactly as described and it was shipped quickly and came in excellent shape.  My husband is using this for a Halloween project and it worked perfect.

This costume was a huge hit!  For the money the robe and collar were good and provided a great look for my little alien (6).  We did not like the mask at all.  It is a thin crispy plastic mask that just covers the face. It wasn't comfortable.  I purchased the green bug eye glasses here on Amazon and we did green & white make up instead of wearing the mask.  He got lots of compliments on the costume.  It does not come with the gloves.  We used winter gloves he already had.  This was fine for a young child and worked out great because it was chilly.  An older person/child might be more particular about the gloves.
This was a very realistic suit for the money.  Price point was good too.  The mask was comfortable for my child and I would order it again.

Downside: It is very difficult to insert or remove tools from the rubbery toolbelt - even for an adult.  My 2 year old can't put any of the tools back on his own and has difficulty removing some of them without help.  The clothing portion is typical of a halloween (or limited use) costume, threads easily unravel and the back is closed only at the top with simple velcro.Upside: As a halloween costume, it is adorable and my son just loves it!  He especially loves the hard hat and tools, which he can play with even if he isn't wearing the costume for a special occasion.
summary: Cute costume; but, don't expect long-term wear.

reviewText: Smooth locking & opening, but later I found out that Meijer has it cheaper, 3 dollars sth.. Anyhow I bought another one at Meijer, turns out it won't open.. So I returned it and got another one which works.

I guess the rating really depends what you expect from this lock. If you need to keep something secure then look elsewhere. If you want to make something look like it's locked then this might do the trick. I didn't need much security for my purposes so this has worked fine for me so far, but I'm almost surprised at how flimsy it feels. I wish I had gotten something just a bit better because I think it would be worth it for the peace of mind.

My son loves his costume!  He's had the tool belt with tools on since it arrived.  The best parts of the costume are the tools and the hard hat.  The tool belt is some sort of rubber, so it is very hard to get the tools in the belt.  We can do it though.  The fabric of the costume is pretty low quality, and I didn't think he would like it.  However, he wore his costume all afternoon and evening the first night we received it, and he asked to put on his costume first thing the next morning.  It has been a big hit.All in all, this was worth the money.  The tools are great, and I'm sure my son will enjoy playing with them for a long time.  The hard hat fits very well.  He is 2 and will be 3 in January."Our Baby Depot" was great.  They upgraded our shipping to 2 Day, so that was very nice since my son asked when his costume would be here everyday.
Good lock, I use this for my gym locker and it serves it's purpose. I like that the color stands out so i don't have a hard time finding my locker(:

The lock works great, which is what you would expect from a Master Lock. I use it for my gym locker and it makes my locker easy to identify. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I ordered green and received purple(which is still an ok color), but wasn't worth returning or even complaining about. When ordering, just be aware that these colors might get shipped at random.
summary: It does everything a lock should do

reviewText: My daughter selected this for use on her school locker. She loves the colour. Purple! It wasn't clear however when we were doing checkout or on the confirmation of the purchase whether she would get the colour she selected. The description of the purchase was unclear. This could be made clearer at the time of purchase as there is an assortment of colours.  It all worked out in the end and we are pleased with the purchase.

I have been using countless Master combo locks for many years and just got a new one. The lock looks OK, however, I am concerned that it is now produced in China - which is written on its packaging. Unfortunately, Amazon had no word on the country of origin. Master locks I purchased before were produced in the USA. Just think about extra fuel and packaging used to bring this lock here from the other side of the world. I know that some companies still produce same kind of locks in the USA. If you want to make purchasing decisions with environmental considerations like myself, consider a lock from a company, which produces it in the USA. I guess, no more master locks for me.
This is piece of junk. Second time I have used it today on my gym locker. I had to have someone cut it off because it was stuck and would not open. Don't buy this.
feels cheap. not made like they use to. consider American/Canadian made locks as this Made in China product doesnt have a strong feel to it.
It's a lock. It locks, and then if you use the right combo, it unlocks. That's about all you need. It doesn't get stuck and it moves smoothly.
summary: Why are you even reading reviews on this?

reviewText: You should use this if you do not want your stuff stolen at school. I recommend people who bring their psps, ipods, sidekicks, lots of money, ermm drugs or whatever to avoid having it all stolen.
summary: haha this save my problems from being locker jacked in p.e.

reviewText: I got the purple lock and it is easy to see.  The combination lock is extremely easy to use.  Works great on locker at gym!
Although learning how to operate it is a little bit hard. However, the quality is really good. It is very complicate for others to open.
simple - a lock that works and is easy to spot. I've had master locks for years but lost my old one... the color on this one is really fun
standard combo lock for the gym. got a green one. durable and color has not chipped yet. a bit on the heavy side--it's a good thing.

I've been using combination locks on my lockers since middle school. Yet, if you go to a giant college (large public school in general), like I do, I DO NOT recommend this lock! Recently, when I was in my body building class somebody tampered with my lock and got into my locker. The person stole my backpack, jeans, wallet, and keys, and did so WITHOUT breaking the lock, and even did me the favor of re-locking it before running off with my stuff! The only damage done to the lock was a few dents on the bottom and side and honestly, the combination wheel turns even smoother now that it's all beaten up. As well, there is no need to even beat the lock to open it. One can simply learn how to open a master lock combination lock with only a piece of a soda can, on the internet.

I wish that there was an option to choose the color of your lock, but I'm still satisfied with the color I received (green). It's exactly what I expected, and will be great for my gym locker. I wouldn't use it to lock up anything very valuable like a bike or something, but it will serve its purpose. I still wish I could have chosen my own color, that's the only reason I'm giving it 4 stars out of 5.
pretty color and easy to operate.Quite durable and strong lock.Strongly recommend for multi-purpose use.I used it for gym locker and love it

I hated this lock! I went to high school and defiantly know how to use this tip of lock! But could not open it! I had my brother try and my dad, did not work! We googled it to make sure we were doing the combination correct we were!!! Still it did not open. I threw it away what a waste!
It was really good. It works really good for my gym locker at school. The thing that hooks on, was a little too big and it annoyed me, so I bought a new one.

A traditional combination lock.  Works fine.  My husband didn't read the fine print that 1 of 4 colors would be randomly shipped.  He thought he was ordering a blue one, but he got a purple one. It's a good thing he doesn't really care, but I know some people can be much pickier.
summary: Don't get a color choice -- all random

reviewText: I got this lock for a storage locker.  It doesn't seem to be as sturdy or heavy as I recall Master combination locks being back in the good-ole-days.  Overall, it works fine and is cheap.  I don't keep anything valuable in my storage locker, so I'm not too worried.  If you actually want to keep something secure, get a different lock.
Does what it is supposed to - which is why I bought it. Price is right, too.

I've used this lock for about 3 months.  The first time I used it I noticed that it was a little "stiff" when turning the wheel.  The wheel seemed to drag as it was turned.  About 1 month ago (after using it about 30 times on the locker at my gym) it became extermely hard to turn.....to the point that I thought that I would not be able to open it, but I finally did.  I used silicone spray to lubricate it and it's doing much better now.  But it's definitely a lower quality Combination Lock than Master has made in the past.
Someone popped this lock open on my locker at the gym, stole my wallet, then closed the lock again.  I'LL NEVER BUY THIS LOCK AGAIN. AVOID IT AT ALL COSTS OR YOU MAY BE NEXT.
We ordered a crap-ton of these for our staff lockers and they are the best.  Super high quality, and such cute colors!

Yes, this is a good lock especially for the money.  But I had to laugh when I realized I could not enter my own combination numbers.....the maker actually gives you the combination you have to use on your lock and then you get to memorize THEIR numbers.....how stupid are we getting??
summary: This is not your old high school lock.

reviewText: As always this product is great perfect on all parts and works great at gym and the color makes it easy to identify

I ordered this masterlock 1530DCM several months ago and noticed that it began to feel "loose" somehow where the metal ring entered the combination chamber.  As a few weeks past, it became harder to re-lock it each time.  So, I contacted masterlock, who said that they would replace my lock and give me a new 4-direction lock for my trouble.  In addition, they were curious to see what was going on with my lock, and told me they would pay postage for my return of the defective lock.This was just in time, as a few days later, the base dropped right off the ring.  I received the two locks, as promised.  I am thankful that Masterlock is not only conscious in its customer service, but also interested in fixing the problem for the future.  These days, it is a rare company who wants a better product, rather than another throw-away product.And so I will continue to use Masterlock products....
summary: Broken Lock Rectified with Great Customer Service.

reviewText: This lock does the job when I go to the gym. It feels pretty cheap though. They dont make them like they used too.I am more concerned with not unlocking vs someone breaking it.
As I expected. What can I say about a lock? It is a pretty shade of blue. So there ya go.
I love having a purple lock to stick out in the locker room.  And, finally, no key to lose at the gym.
Good price, good look, smooth function.  The big bonus is the cool finish, so I never confuse my lock with others at the gym now!  And for under $4, that's quite a deal!

We purchased this for our son who is going into middle school and has ADHD. We wanted him to be able to feel comfortable with a combination lock, as they are installed on all the lockers at the school. This lock felt very cheap - you could hear the parts rattling around inside. My husband and I both tried it over a 3 day period before showing our son how to use it. Sometimes the combination would unlock it, and sometimes it wouldn't. My husband and I are both very adept at using combination locks.. I personally have used them nightly at work.. so it was not due to user error. It is just a very cheap lock. We sent it back for a refund, and are trying to figure out what step to take next to help our son.

Master Lock has been around for a really long time.  I purchased because of the name, the sturdiness of the lock and the color.  Easy to spot which locker is mine amoungst the dozens, most sporting boring black locks.

Just google "Why Master Locks Are Not SAFE!" and you will watch countless videos of the simplest ways too hack locks like this. And don't be a fool, these methods work just as well with Master Locks that come with keys.

I use it to lock up my bag and valubles in the gym . Works just like a lock is supposed to, can't really say much .You might want to try Target , Walmart , they sometimes have it for cheaper . I realised later , when I saw it at the Target Store for a dollar cheaper , no big deal , as I used it as a filler to acheive my 25$ free shippinghappy shopping
It works fine, it's just a bit lame that the company "chooses it at random" for you instead of letting you pick out the color yourself.
summary: It works fine, it's just a bit lame that the company ...

reviewText: This lock worked for a week, but then it abruptly stopped working. It got stuck, and wouldn't open. I wouldn't buy a combination lock period, just not trustworthy.
Exactly what I needed for the lockers at my gym that I frequent. Just make sure to keep the combination numbers somewhere safe and don't lose it.

If you need to lock something, this is your lock. It has a full featured dial with numbers on it to put in the combination, which is included. It locks things extremely well, almost as if it were a lock of some sort.10/10 would buy again.
sent me the wrong color lock.  but otherwise, MasterLock is a tried and true brand/lock.

You get what you pay for.  This lock started to get faulty after just a few uses. It would stop unlocking with the correct combination and I would find myself standing at the locker for 20 minutes trying to get to my stuff.
summary: Stopped working after a few uses

reviewText: Does its job with a good price.  Like having a weird color.  Feels like it would last a long time.

My middle schooler's gym lock broke and had to be cut off leaving her with a wide open locker. Where I live these aren't widely available at fair prices after the back-to-school rush. Thank you amazon!!We ended up with a green one and It works just fine for its intended purpose. The combination is preset and it is reasonably sturdy for a gym locker. For heavy duty protection, I would suggest a more rugged or sophisticated lock. Absolutely cannot beat this price locally.
summary: Does the job for gym class

reviewText: Bright color is nice to have it stand out in the gym locker room. Same standard master lock I have used in the past.  Good value.
A good sturdy lock, but really just a regular combination lock in neat colors. Easy to do the combination and works great, and the color makes it stand out in the locker room.

It is a great product and my son had no issues with his lock!  The only thing I noticed is I ordered the blue (at least I thought) but I got green instead.  It's not that big of a deal.  I'm just glad it wasn't pink!

The Master Lock is exactly what it advertises to be, a simple, easy to use combination lock - used best for lockers, storage rooms and immediate use for hand bags and carry ons.For its price (and with Prime shipping), it's one of my best purchases. Highly recommended.
Master Lock works perfectly. The color coating helps a lot since I use this lock at my gym and I don't always get the same locker. Makes it very easy to identify.
Always a smooth, easy to use lock.  Great for lockers and standard uses.  I wouldn't put it on my bike, too easy to cut, but for lockers at school, the gym.  Great lock.
Your basic lock, reminds me of school daze, seems to work fine and the updated color ( I have Ravens purple) is a nice modern touch!
summary: Standard lock just like my school daze

reviewText: Perfect
The hats were great!  They were used in a skating show number.  They were shipped very quickly.  I would recommend this seller.
Never too early to start dreaming about Halloween. With a few embellishments and a little bling they will be show stoppers!!!

Ordered this hat thinking it was going to be SATIN. It is not. The other reviewer i thought was just sent the wrong hat so i ordered it anyway thinking i would recieve the right hat. This company sent me a Fabric gauze see threw material witch hat.
summary: This hat is not "SATIN" it is a see threw  hat.

reviewText: This was the cheapest witch hat that I found on amazon for a child and you can tell that in the quality. It worked great for my daughter's Halloween costume but it is not excellent quality.

This hat is not satin as advertised. The material is see-through like gauze. Even the tag says "fabric witch hat" rather than "satin witch hat." It is also much flimsier than the photo makes it appear. BUT for the low price, it is adequate for my child's dress-up play. I just feel misled by the product description.

I am happy with this purchase... costume is well constructed and fits well (medium build male, 5'7"). Contrary to description it is made in USA (imagine that!!). My only minor complaint is that it is difficult to get collar tight enough so that white panel in front lays flat.

I got these for a Halloween costume for my 2 and 4 year old. My 4 year old has a big head but it fit him fine. Yes the material is see through if you put your hand against it and look. But it isn't noticeable when was on my children's heads and none of the photos we took look see through. I also bought "Kids' Black Satin Witch Hat" but those were more flimsy and one of the wire rims were broken. I think the key to buying these is just buy an extra one and few different types because you really don't know what you are going to get.
summary: Yes it is thin material but it is firm sturdy material so it stand pointy

reviewText: The material is thin and cheap, but not bad at all.  The neck collar offers plenty of room so you don't choke.  Overall, for under $18 with shipping, it's a worthwhile buy for something that I'll probably only ever wear once.
summary: Pretty good for what you pay for and simple.

reviewText: So I think it is reasonable to say the the most important part to this costume is the white collar and this one is terrible. All stretched out and too long and also too thin. I would not recommend this costume.
summary: They messed up the most important part

reviewText: The robe has only about half inch of white on the collar. Hardly visible to make out that it is a priest outfit

I loved this costume, very good design, the fabric is very good, good quality, is long and according to the measuresthe costume is exactly the picture does not change anything.I highly recommend this seller, serious. My order arrived very quickly.

Wow... I wasn't expecting much from this, considering the price, yet they still somehow managed to let me down. The material is already frayed, straight out of the packaging. Looks exactly like one of those black robes that you'd get with a ghost costume, only they grudgingly stitched in a crappy collar. Would not buy from this manufacturer again.

Remember, this is a hallowe'en costume, so don't expect C.J. Almy. Also, the collar part is going to need professional alteration to make it usable. That's the bad news. The good news is that it's a tenth the price of a "regular" cassock, even after alteration. A note of caution: I wouldn't wear it to a clergy conference or to the bishop's reception, but for a comfortable garment to wear around the parish,at the coffee hour etc., it works for me. Also, it hangs and stores in the bag it comes in, without wrinkling. I haven't washed it, yet, but anticipate that after Ido it will need to be reinforced at the hem.
summary: A NIFTY LIGHTWEIGHT CASSOCK FOR THE MONEY

reviewText: I took into consideration the other reviews about this item being flimsy and running small, only fit for 13 year olds, so since this was for a theater project where younger kids were going to need these costumes, I decided to give it a shot anyway. I got 3, They fit the 2 14 year olds and 13 year old perfectly, so that is the age you should have in mind when purchasing this item. Only thing was that it has bad static cling, so use something to get rid of that.

I don't really dress up for parties but this worked as needed and I got it withing the time limits that were put on the package. Being in Germany its hard to order from the states and get it when you need it.
The costume is plenty long enough, however it is almost too tight in the width.  Also very cheezy material.  I am not happy with it but it's not worth the expense of sending it back!
summary: I am not happy with it but it's not worth the expense of ...

reviewText: I was really disappointed in the quality of this item and decided to return it.  It is made of the same (almost see thur) thin material of a typical witches costume.  The collar won't stand up right and ties in the back like a child's costume.  The white part of the collar is not as pictured.  It is not as wide as shown and was frayed, not hemmed.  It's made of the same thin material as the black fabric.  It also fit kind of snug and I'm fairly fit at 5'11, 179lbs.  The length was good for my height, but that's the only positive comment that I have to make.  Wish it was better quality!
This product shipped fast.  It is very well constructed.  I've woren this item more than once and washed it every time and it still holds up.
Don't forget to order the cross separately!! Not the real thing, but it does make a statement. And the price is right!
It may last through a second day wearing it.  It looks good, but wear black underneath because it is not opaque.
My daughter needed a costume for her part in the musical, Nunsense. This one worked perfectly! Inexpensive and great fit - comfortable & durable for multiple performances.
My best friend got this for our company costume party because she was pregnant, she won second place in the costume contest!
sizing was good, quality was good for the price needed a beltworked great for the youth production of Sister Act!
Fit was great, well made and exactly like the photo.  Received it with in a few days! Would recommend this site.
We received many compliments about our costumes.  One size really fit all- from a size 2 to a 14- with no problem could have gone bigger or smaller no problem. Very easy to put on- great costume!

I wore this costume to the sound of music sing-a-long in LA and I LOVED IT!! My 5'2 friend also bought one and it fit her - I'm almost 5'11 and it fit me too without being too short. Not sure how that's possible, but it worked! The white flaps on the sides of the habit need to be pinned down unless you want to look like a flying nun, but that's a very minor detail. I wore it again for halloween and everyone loved it. Loved this purchase. Oh - and YES, make sure to wear something underneath. :)
I got this for my daughter for renaissance festival at school. She loved it and she said she got lot of compliments!!!

The costume was as expected and a good product for the price.For a shorter person such as myself (5'4), the costume was way too long in the arms and at the bottom.  The fabric is not hemmed so it's easy enough to cut it down if you need to.
Costume was new in original package. Used the costume for a highschool musical. It was very basic but served it's purpose on the stage.

A lot of people actually thought I was a real nun. It was good  but the drape part kept falling to the front. You have to use safety pins to secure things in place. Should have used a stiffer fabric I think.

Super costume at a great price. I had a hard time figuring out how to get the headpiece to stay on my head.  There are two elastic strings near your ears - I ended up tying those together. Seemed to work.Costume will fit anyone, any size. You could also be a pregnant nun if you wanted to do that.I had a great time wearing it and my husband wore the priest costume.
summary: Super costume at a great price.

reviewText: It's your basic chain store bought Halloween costume: thin polyester black dress and veil, one size that probably fits to about a women's size 18/20, and you'll have to pin something to get it to work.The black dress is basic and suitable. Nothing fancy, but also nothing weird. I'm about 5'8", and the sleeves don't come all the way to my wrists. The length on me is similar to the picture.The veil is the part that's a bit odd. The black part is the same material as the dress-that's fine. The white part is also polyester but the headband part is padded. There's velcro on either side to hold the lame phrase bands, but if you're not using them you could cover the exposed velcro squares with the black veil, but it's not ideal. Would have been nice if they could just leave that out. There are these two weird black elastic bands at the end of the white padded part that are about 2 inches long. There's no obvious reason for them. I can only think that it's a left over from another costume design. I will have to use bobby pins  and/or rig some sort of head band to keep the veil in place. The inside of the white padded band came dirty on mine. It's hidden while I wear it, so I'm not returning it because it's too much of a hassle just a few weeks from Halloween.The white head, neck, shoulder covering is just ok. I'd like it to have a bit more weight for it to lie properly, but I won't be using this piece anyway. I've order a separate white peter pan collar to attach to the black dress, so that I can look more like Miss Clavel in the Madeline books.
summary: Good enough for a quick Halloween costume

reviewText: Arrived very quickly and this costume is great! I wore it for "Sing-A-Long Sound of Music" and it was a big hit. People kept asking for me to be in their photos--"Where's the nun?" It was great fun. The costume is excellent and very comfortable--the cab driver thought I was a real nun.

I was surprised at the quality of the costume, it is well made. I had a little trouble getting the head piece to look right, I had to use a couple of bobby pins.This will last a few years, maybe next year I will wear it with a scary clown mask.Yikes!

This costume is HUGE. It's like a circus tent. I'm 5'3 and I was completely swimming in it. If there were smaller sizes, it would have been much better, but as it is I can't wear it with any hope of resembling a nun. I'm sure it would fit a large person much better, but do NOT get this if you are average size or smaller. Also, the material and stitching are very poor (as you would expect with any standard halloween costume). In all, I would not recommend it.

The nun costume was just what I was looking for. The size range fit up to adult women size 12, but could probably fit a larger size woman, since it was a loose fitting style.The fabric was a good quality polyester. I was in a parade and I looked very authentic. The price was reasonable.. The only concern was there were no instructions on how to fit the two pieces of the head covering together. But my two friends, who helped me, figured it out.
Used for our performances of the Sound of Music and it was exactly what we all needed for the nuns

This was a great costume.  The gown was very roomy and comfortable.  I was a little concerned that I had read somewhere that it was a size 14 and that is what size I wear, but there was plenty of fabric.  It wasn't clingy at all.The only downside to the costume was the head piece.  There didnt' seem to be anything to attach it to your head.  There were two straps, but they weren't long enough to tie.  I ended up using a safety pin.  If there was velcro on the straps that would have made it super easy to attach.
its just a big old cloak style. i felt like i was more a chris brown costume looking more like a terrorist.

This is a great costume for the price.  The black material is that typical witches costume material, but the white part of the habit is nice quality polyester.  It looks good and is generous in porportions.  I'm a size 14 and it fit me great!  Going as a pregrant nun this year after I saw Octomom do it last year.  Promises to be a hoot!
I need help, would this fit a man???? i'm a pretty big guy and wanted to know if it would fit.Please respond if you can help

I bought this costume for my wife and she was very happy with it.  The headband "labels" included are stupid (not funny) so we tossed them, but the rest of the costume is good.  It took a long time to ship and they did not deliver within the predicted window of time - so don't wait until the last minute to order.

I bought several of these for an office Halloween party and we had the most fun with them.  I actually had one lady think I was a real nun!  The fit was good,l although mine was long for me, I just cut the bottom off and used that material to make a belt so it was fitted at the waist.  Worked out great, and made for a fun time at work!

people actually thought i was a nun!I am 5' tall and this was too long for me i had to cut a good 6 inches off before i was able to walk without stepping on the fabric. its made out of the cheap costume fabric so dont be too rough with it. overall a good constume and its very fun to wear
summary: won a costume contest with this

reviewText: Great costume!! It was a hit!!!! It is good quality and looks soooo real!! Everyone loved it!!!! The price was great too!
This costume is very uncomfortable and there is no really good way to keep the habit on, it's very clingy so the dress rides up as well.

It was a great value. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because some of the hemming wasn't the greatest and it may not hold up well over time. But it is a costume and you get what you pay for. Overall good value.
The costume fit well. It is thinner, so I will have to wear something underneath.  Not authentic as some reviews said, but close enough for the play I need it for.
summary: There were nun of the problems

reviewText: The only problem is the habit sticks out at the ears and looks like yoda.  The dress is a nice weight and texture.
I was raised by the Sister's of St. Joseph......and this is just like they wore.  High quality and great price!

This costume was needed for a retirement party skit. It arrived in a timely manner and was reasonably priced. The pieces were of the costume were of good quality and fit together easily, right over my street clothes. Everyone was very impressed with how realistic I looked!  I wore the headband that said, "Nun of Your Business", one of three that were included with the costume.  It was really fun and I looked fabulous!  When the skit was over, it took me only a few seconds to slip it off and join the party in my regular clothes again. I would definitely recommend this costume to a wannabe nun (a nunnabe?) on a budget!

I had a little trouble figuring out how the headgear was supposed to work together and maybe I didn't put it on right, but I had to use a few safety pins to keep the pieces together and keep them laying flat.Otherwise, the costume got rave reviews from other party-goers and it kept me warm at an outdoor party where the temp dropped to 39 degrees that night!
summary: Good costume for a great price!

reviewText: For the price, I think this is a fine costume. No more cheaply made than the next Halloween costume but because it's so simple, you can't really tell. It was a hit at the party I attended (I went with someone dressed in a priest costume made by the same company - great couples' idea)! It would earn an extra star if it came with the cross. I had to buy one for another ten bucks at the last minute.
It looks really good and it was a great price. The headbands are kind of dumb and unnecessary, but you don't have to use them at all. The costume looks very legit, I would highly recommend it.
You look so naturally a real nun when you wear it!! I had a great Halloween night~! i am 5'7, a little bit too long for me.
I used this for a play and it worked well. It was lightweight, but all the parts were realistic enough to be believable.
I received many complements on the costume.  Many people thought I was really a nun.  It was actually pretty lightweight and comfortable.
Very pleased with the quality, couldn't ask for a better value and was exactly what I was looking for.  This is going to be a hoot, can't wait!!
It looks real enough for a costume party, but just plan on wearing it once. Will not make through washing, I believe.  It is see-through, so wear some black underneath.
I have a friend and she is not dating for  a few years untill her child goes to college.She said I feel like Im a nun now so I sent this to her. She laughed her ass off.
summary: This was sent as a joke

reviewText: Fast delivery, costume came with some extra things that I didn't know about, what a great surprise.  Love halloween can't wait to wear my nunsense costume.

I bought this for my 10 year-old daughter to wear for Halloween and was pleased with the fast delivery and authenticity of the item.  Would prefer the costume come with a cross necklace as well (to complete the ensemble).  Thought the price was reasonable.
The edges are unfinished and the material is running. And I had only just tried this on.  Very poor quality.
As it turns out, I didn't have a chance to use the costume but it seems to be well made.  Look forward to using it another time.
Good quality true to life costume. Added some rosaries and had a fun time coupled with the priest costume. Would recommend.

i love this costume i went trick or treating with my little sister last year and let me tell u ppl feel obligated to give a nun a handfull of candy...i've been tempted to wear this costume around just for ***** & giggles or to creep ppl out lol had it for a year now and it's great!!

I chose this particular costume because I didn't want anything skimpy and I didn't want to spend very much money. This costume certainly filled the bill on both counts. My husband, who dressed as a priest,  and I were a hit at the party we attended. The costume is a little flimsy so I wore a black shirt and leggings underneath it but the overall effect was great. We both added big, tacky crosses to our outfits (it doesn't come with one even tho one is shown in the picture) which really completed the look. We played up our parts saying we had come to bless the party, etc. and received lots of compliments. For the money, I couldn't have been more pleased. I don't quite understand how you were supposed to use any of the novelty headbands but that was fine since I wanted the traditional look. The only thing you might want to be aware of is that when it comes, it is very wrinkled, so allow time to remedy that. I didn't want to risk ironing it so I just used a steamer on each of the pieces and they came out great. I would definitely recommend this costume as long as you aren't expecting an actual habit.
We bought this outfit for my wife for her office halloween party and it was an absolute hit. She looked really cute and funny in the outfit and he got loads and loads of compliments.
Good costume for the price, not real fancy, but ggod enough for a party. My wife liked ita nd fit perfect for her.
Happy with it.  Good value for the money an would recommend it to someone who is looking to purchase one.

This product is not as advertised. It is not an authentic Habit and it includes gag headbands, like 4 versions. The material is very thin, not good for a Halloween night in Seattle, Washington. I was hoping for an authentic Mother Superior Habit...a good sign was the price. LOL!!

I ordered this costume only about a week before a friend's Halloween party. It arrived quickly and I was happy with the product. I paid less than $12 and although it was thin material, it was not a bad costume. I was worried about the size (one size fits most)most people saying it would fit a size 12. It fit, no problem (I'm around size 14-16) and I had lots of extra room to put heavy clothes underneath. Good product for the price.

This costume was perfect. Easy to throw on and the headgear stayed put. I threw on a costume jewelry big cross necklace(from the halloween dept. at the discount store) It was great. Funny thing...I went to pull a smaller hard cover black book off the shelf to carry as my 'bible' and saw a novel called "Faithless". I took the jacket off it and it was all black! And the best part is that it said Faithless down the spine. Perfect book to carry as a halloween nun. Great deal for the inexpensive price. I even paid for two-day shipping and it was still worth the total cost. Can use it again sometime.
summary: Great Costume. Everyone loved it! Jokes were plenty...

reviewText: This costume is so much fun.  It looks so real I can't wait to wear it to the church costume party!  The quality is so good I should be able to wear it over and over.  I'm a happy customer!
Costume is a boat load of fun!Great price for a very fun costume!

I wore this costume to a charity event and while walking to and from the event, I had people stop and ask me if they could get my picture with them.  They thought I was a real nun.  The actual event involved me swimming in seawater for an extended period of time and this costume not only held up, but I'll be wearing it to the same event again next year.  This is a great value and a purchase I would recommend.
summary: People thought I was a real nun

reviewText: Wanted to where a unique costume for Halloween. Everyone who saw me wearing this loves it. It's very nicely made & it fits perfectly. It fits people between 5'8 - 6'0.
This costume was better than I imagined it would be. Very authentic looking. I wore it to the SOUND OF MUSIC  SING ALONG .I PLAN TO WEAR IT NEXT HALLOWEEN.
comes with everything but the cross and beads. I consider this a good purchase for the price. Got here fast too.

I order two nun outfits for a school play and they were perfect for the stage. It's one size fits all so they are a little big for a small high school student but was expecting it and just used a belt.
This is a very authentic costume. i've already worn it to one halloween party andplan on wearing it to 2 more. I got lots of compliments.

I wore this costume to a Halloween costume this year and EVERYONE LOVED IT!!! People wanted their pictures taken with me!!! It was hilarious! I didn't use the silly phrases that comes with this costume which you can place (Velcro) on the white crown piece though, that's just not my style. My boyfriend wore the Wandering Gunman costume and I was obviously Sister Sarah (re the Clint Eastwood "Fistful of Dollars" series). That being said, this costume is easy to put on. You can wear street clothes underneath (I wore all black under mine) and not be overheated with the costume over it because it is very thin fabric. I read reviews on this before I bought it and some people had trouble with the head pieces staying in place. Not so with mine. I just pulled all my long hair back in a pony tail and put everything on and it stayed in place all night long. We went out to a club after the party and I even sang on stage (my friend was performing and asked me to sing with him)! The audience was pretty quiet at first, thinking I was a REAL nun!!! Lots of funny looks in the car driving around, too!!! HILARIOUS!!! I would recommend this costume to anyone. It is roomy and authentic looking from a distance and is actually fairly well sewn together. I will keep this for another party or costumed event. Good for the price.
This came fast and it's of great quality! Perfect for the price, a little better actually. I am going to enjoy this ;)Happy Halloween!
Husband wore it and it made the night.Mask was great quality.And the rest was basic. Not bad cloth quality. So go for it if ur looking for a scream costume

I got this for my daughter who loves animals and it was the favorite at Christmas. She has hardly taken it off. It is great for the small kids and I love the velcro front it is easy for a child to put on or take off. I think the dog could have been a little larger but she loves it also. I would have paid almost any amount for this toy but I think this could have been a $20.00 toy instead of $30.00, for the fact that you cannot hear a thing through the stethoscope and I am a little weary of the plastic pockets we will have to see how long they last. I do rate this a 5 for fun because my kid loves it, and so far the durability is good but questionable.
summary: My 5 year old wants to be a Veterinarian

reviewText: I purchased this for Halloween along with a Priest costume.  I was not sure which I was going to be and also, I figured, it would not hurt to have an extra costume on hand in case another friend was out of ideas and needed something to wear.Well, I received both less than a few days apart.  At a small party with my closest friends, I tried on both and the overwhelming response was to wear this one.I can gratifyingly say IT WAS A VERY BIG HIT at all of the parties I attended that night.  I went to four different Halloween parties and had my picture taken at least 50 times as the night progressed.I wore it plain, as it does come with some funny headbands (NUN FOR YOU, NUN OF YOUR BUSINESS etc.).  I also enhanced it with a set of rosary beads and a cross I had gotten from my grandmother.The costume is very light, so it is excellent to wear over regular clothing.  This way, if you want to go to the party and put it on at the last minute you can do so with ease.That being said, the material is of sheer nylon (no, you cannot see through it) and the headdress is easy to take on and off.  It appears to be machine washable, but because I wore regular clothing underneath it the one night that I wore it, I simply hung it outside for a few hours to get all of the cigarette smoke (the parties I went to were at four bars in the same neighborhood (Itaewon, Seoul, South Korea) within walking distance of where I was staying) out of it.It looks very authentic and I would highly recommend purchasing it if you do not intent to wear it often.
I looked into the Barbie stuff. WAY too expensive for what you get out of it. I bought this for my 4 yr. old daughter and she likes it. Probably just as much as the expensive stuff.
My Grandson loved it. It fit perfectly and because it has all the necessary gear I did not have to spend extra. one choice, one payment.
This is the first Halloween costume my daughter has worn, voluntarily. Since the jacket goes over regular clothes there is no "itch factor", a big complaint of 3 & 4-year-olds. She looked adorable.
The costume fits well, the package arrived on time and was as expected. Received good feedback from friends also. Overall good merchandise...
The quality is awesome for the price of the product. I loved it. Can recommend it. It was very quick service
This was a gift to my sister-in-law. She got it dressed and set it great. Her size is 10. Excellent purchase.

A really nice costume that my 6 year old son absolutely loves. I like it big b/c he can wear it longer. Though since it is a little big I tell him to just wear the cape and he says 'No', it's either all or nothing, LOL
summary: A little big, but it is Large 8-10

reviewText: This is a pretty good wig for occassional use.  I used it for halloween and I tied the hair back.  The hair looks very real and the wig held together very well.  The bandana is attached but it looks good.
looks great, even on my husbands big head ,LOL. Will keep
Great costume wig. Very full and long. Looked great on, I have several wigs and this is one of the nicest ones.
I purchased this for my 24 yr old son to wear to my grandsons birthday party.  It was great.  All of the guys had to try it on!!  Lotsa fun!!
I wanted to comment on this pirate wig, this makes a nice prop for a pirate costume and looks great!
I am sure that it would have been great but I did not get my costumes so we could not use the wig. Maybe next year
This wig was perfect. it looks great and had a great price to match. Great for any male pirate costume or could be a females as well.
I bought this wig for a Halloween costume and was very surprised in the quality for the price. There is a lot of hair but the bandana doesn't stay on very well. Still a great product

This has been a pretty fun wig!  There is a LOT of hair and it's quite convincible:  I had many friends who did not recognize me when I was wearing it.  True, the bandana does not come off, but it's only sewn on so one could easily remove it without doing a ton of harm to the overall product if one wants just the wig.
summary: This has been a pretty fun wig

reviewText: This fit fine and looked real. It matched perfect with the Jack Sparrow Beard & Goatee Set.
The quality of this wig actually surprised me a bit. It is of decent quality and definitely better than many cheap wigs I have seen.
summary: a good pirate costume wig for the price

reviewText: This is a cheap imitation of the "Captain Jack Sparrow" Wig. Hair looks very feminine, and the brown wrap is made of cheezy synthetic suede.If you choose to use this wig, you'll need to do some work on it.
Ordered this wig for Halloween.  I wear a large hat and have lots of hair and it still fit very comfortably.  Nice quality.
Wig arrived quickly and was exactly as advertised.  I can't say how long it will last, because I only used it a few times and it seems fine.
Nice quality on the wig part.  But the bandana is almost permanatly attached to the wig.  you will have to spend some time if you want to use a diffrent bandana with it.

An excellent kit for keeping those shoes nicely buffed. I also found an additional useful feature when I accidentally dropped a coin next to my home shoeshine kit and it told me that word on the street was the Gambinis had been taking heat from the DA's office on account of that business with Frankie the Snake.

I bought this for my 6yr old son and he absolutely loved it. He was so excited when he opened it. He is on the taller side for his age and it is a little big. He loves the cape.  He likes to wear the costume to bed so I've washed it a lot and it still looks like new.
One speed (high) didn't work at all and the other was useless.  This was using brand-new Ultra Duracell batteries too.  Surprising from Krups!  Maybe that's why it's discontinued?
summary: Didn't work right out of the box

reviewText: I ordered the Krups shoe polisher with some amount of excitement after seeing it featured in a number of magazines and catalogs. What I received was a relatively weak handheld rechargeable unit, and a purpleish plastic box designed to mount to the wall and hold the buffing and cleaning pads. Despite following both the instructions that came with the unit, I found it 100% impossible to achieve a satisfactory shine using this machine. I also tried applying shoe wax by hand (instead of using the brushes in the set), and then buffing it off using the unit. This also failed to work well. To make matters worse, the unit actually took me longer to use on my shoes than it would to do the same process manually, and failed to come close in matching the results. I've since returned this product and gone back to my old natural bristle brushes, which produce a vastly superior shine on my shoes. I would definitely not recommend this for most people. Take your money and go buy a brush and shoe polish instead. You'll save [money] and be much happier with the results.

It's really easily for anyone who usually need to shine their shoes. But, it needs to prepare a lot of battery for your daily use. However, if you use rechargable battery, that will be fine. It needs 3 battery but four, that's what we need to notice.
summary: Not hard to use, but waste of battery.

reviewText: Bought this a year ago today actually.First of all...the band broke after one month...then...the casing started to wear showing that the casing is actually painted on...that is not the true color of the casing...and then...this weekend while on a hunting trip I noticed that no matter what direction I was headed...it always said NE.  Luckily a friend brought a compass and we were able to find our way back to the truck...and ultimately me back to my PC to write a review for this terrible product.So...consider this you warning...and BUY SOMETHING ELSE!!!

This watch is incredible. I would only reccomend it to people who are either 1. out on the hiking trails a lot, or 2. really sporty and keeps up with their physical training. This watch looks cool and is pretty light. Stop watch, countdown timer, glow light. It's really wonderful and can be a lifesaver (if the situation ever arises). Say you need a compass in the wilderness, yup, this watch has it. Alarm (of course). This watch is pretty hot.

i purchased this watch pretty much to save myself from buying one for about double the cost.  when i received the watch i found out why:the band is what you would find on a very cheap watch / the box makes reference to being made in germany, however the watch clearly states, "made in china" / the directions were poorly translated / and the sealer of the deal for  me was that the mode button was very poor - sometimes it would advance two modes ahead on one press, other times it wouldn't advance at all.i'm definitely returning itTAKE CARE!
summary: just a cheap watch w/ a compass

reviewText: I recommend this digital watch for its reliablity and I have it over 5 years and I only spent money on 2 battery replacements and one watch band.  If you can still find this watch, get it.

I've been using the Stinger since 2006 and it's a very good dive computer. It has every function I need and it will be good for later technical diving as well in gauge mode. The algorithm is very conservative and ascending speed has to be slow to avoid warnings. The menu navigation is simple and every function can be found easily. I also use it for free diving and in the menu it can be set to free mode. Mine is with a metallic band and it's still comfortable on my wrist with a 6.5mm semi-dry suit. With a dry-suit it's better to use the elastic strap. I wear it every day as my watch and I'm used to its weight.

Wonderfull watch! Great sales experience. I bought that for my wife, and I called the vendor asked to expedite the shipping. It was delivered ahead of schedule, on time for her anniversary. Excellent price and smooth purchase. I definitely recommend and would return to purchase more. The product itself has all the required features and functions that a professional diver would expect!
summary: Great Product, Great Customer Delivery, Great Sale Experience

reviewText: On thing...this is not a watch.  It is a dive computer.  I would not get this to wear around except on dive trips.I've owned one for almost two years and the best feature I can think of is that its very simple to use.  It takes care of all the administive details for you.  Depth, dynamically keeps recalculating how much time you have left at your current depth, safety stop timer, when you're topside it keeps track of your surface intervals and refactors for your next dive.  No flying warnings appear as appropriate.It made me a more aware diver.  When I started using it, I noticed it kept beeping at me telling me I was ascending too fast or descending too fast - ie breaking rules.  It was annoying at first but the sad fact was that I was breaking rules and didn't even know it and I was putting myself in a higher risk category.  I paid attention to the warnings and I think I'm safer for it.  Now my Suunto doesn't beep much when I dive.The algorithm it uses is very conservative so I'm comfortable.It is not air integrated so you still have to look at your pressure guages.  But if you rent your equipment or you're a new diver, this is the first thing to buy (literally buy it with your mask, fins, snorkle, and wetsuit) before you start going out for regulators or BCDs and stuff like that.  It just takes makes diving more enjoyable.  Its especially useful for multiday dive trips where you're renting gear every day...it keeps track of your no fly times which on long dive trips can extend more than 12 hours so the computer tells you when not to fly.Titanium is very light.  I use the plastic strap mostly because its easier to put on and off with a dive suit.  The Titanium strap looks cool though.  I generally don't wear it as a watch...its huge and you can tell its a dive computer - if you're 6'5" maybe you can use it as a watch.  I do wear it on diving vacations though as my primary.It has a bunch of features too nitrox mixes, dive planning, and a whole bunch of other stuff.An interesting thing is that if you break too many rules or do something that puts you in a higher risk of microbubbles and things like that, it will give you warnings telling you not to dive.  I received one of those infractions once.  Consider it your diving police officer.  It is pretty merciless though.When I get home I download the data to my computer and it tells me exactly what I was doing.

I bought this diving computer couple of months back, and I used it for five dives since I bought it (Scuba, Deep and Night).I highly recommend this diving computer, and it doesn't matter if you were a rookie or pro! Very easy to use, huge display and numbers, fits for Nitrox + Air divers.Guys, don't waste your money on other brands, Suunto has it all!!

This is my first diving computer. I was pleased with its functions and ease of use. It logs all your dives and you can transfer them to your computer. It really simplified logging all my dives.The computer will track your every aspect of your dive and you can set warning for depth and time.  It tracks your dive time, surface time, no flight time, ascending speed, recommended safety stop and mandatory stops.Overall I am very happy with it and every diver should have one.

When my baby was first born we always used this after a bath.  It was soft, warm and she would snuggle up in it, lay on me and fall asleep!  I washed it many times and NEVER had any problems with it unraveling or fading.  We stopped using it once she became too long for it, though I'd love to have one in a bigger size for her now!!  Must buy!

When I was a new mommy, I liked the bath bag more than the towels.  I just felt it was easier to put her in the bag than to wrap her in the towel just right.  My daughter was 21 inches at birth and the bag covered her feet (which was more of a struggle with the towel). I felt she was warm and snug in the bag and it was much easier to take her from tub/sink to her changing station with her wrapped up in the bag.  I think it made things a little easier for me and I never wound up getiing wet ( like I did with the towels).

I found that this baby wrap was great for my baby when he was a newborn. He still fits in it, and we use it once in a while. But he seems to prefer a towel, and we never have the wrap handy when the bath is over and end up using a towel. I like the fact that it has velcro to close it and it stays closed incase he pees. Towels can fall open. The material is nice and baby soft unlike a towel.

We are 2 weeks before our due date and I am washing all the baby things. I took the bath bag out of the gift box it came in, put it in the washing machine and dryer. When I took it out of the dryer to fold it, the seams has come apart! This is an expensive item to just fall apart like that in the washer! I would avoid buying it unless you want to wash it by hand! My son is not even born yet and this happens! UGH!

These bath bags are so soft and cozy. I always liked using bath bags instead of towels because they keep baby warmer and keep mommy dryer. I like the Baby Jockey Bath Bags better than some of the other ones we have had. They are much softer and more light weight. They are a little expensive, but worth the extra money.

I love this towel set!  It is very durable.  Seems warm to wrap that wet little baby in.  Very soft and cuddly (Much more so than other expensive versions).  I wish I had bought only this type for my baby!  A must for first time moms!!!

My wife bought this watch in Feb 2003. I liked it at the first sight. However, the alarm kept ringing till the battery was running out. And then I opened te case and changed it. The inside looked pretty bad. Moreover, the alarm doesn't work anymore and the casin g is easy to peel off . The last thing I want to mention is that the warranty is only 90 days. (I guess there will be something wrong in you watch after that time).BTW, I came from China. "Made in China" doesn't tell the product is good or nottell you much. We can make good stuff.
summary: think again  before you buy it

reviewText: A friend recommended these towels before my daughter was born & I couldn't imagine at the time how you could actually have a towel preference for an infant. They are just great quality, which is surprisingly rare when it comes to hooded towels. My daughter is a year old now & these are still the softest, most absorbent towels.

I put this towel on my registry because of all the positive reviews I read here.  The product certainly lived up to my expectations.  It's so soft and thicker than the other hooded towels I own. I especially like the fact that the "hood" part is made of the same terrycloth material as the rest of the towel, since it absorbs more water from the hair.  Cheaper quality hooded towels don't always have that.  You won't be disappointed with this product.
summary: I can vouch for all the positive reviews below

reviewText: We've been using these bibs for 3 mo's now.  They are good quality but we prefer big loop terry cloth bibs because they catch things better.  These bibs are priced a bit high.

I bought this custom for my 3 year old son for Halloween and he loved it.  The belt makes noise and the tools come off the belt for play.  Even though Halloween is over, he still brings it out to put on and play with.

I received the costume yesterday and i could not stop looking at it.  I showed all my co-workers and they were all with the AWWWWWW's.  I took the belt out to hear the hammering sounds, very nice.  When I got home, my son saw it and wanted the hat, he looked sooo adorable with it and did not want to take it off. Great costume, can't wait until Halloween.

except when the belt is in the bottom of the toy box and when a toy hits it just right it stsarts hammering. My cat has also activated it in the middle of the night and it is quite scary to wake up to lol. Amyway it has been 2 years, the costume still exists but my son mailly plays with the helmet and the belt. When he wore it for Halloween everyone commented on it, especially men, which I thought was cool

My 4 1/2 year old son is very happy and excited about this costume.  He enjoys the hard hat and tool belt even without "dressing up" in the shirt and overalls.  As a parent, I too am pleased with the costume.  It is roomy enough to layer clothing underneth for trick or treating.  I had no illusions about what kind of fabric the costume would be made of (very thin felt-like fabric) and therefore am pleased with quality and price.
summary: Happy with purchase because I knew what I was getting

reviewText: Do not buy, Item not faithful to picture. You need to stuff interior with foam and get someone to teese it up to try to match

Product arrived on time, Good!! The Afro wigs Blond and Black are Ok if you just going to use them on a party just for fun... but if you are going to use it as a part for professional artist wardrobe forget it !!  this is a poor quality product for that matter. The picture makes it look better, but in reality you'll have to invest some time, money and wit effort to fix it to make it look better.
summary: Not as good as it looks on the picture...

reviewText: If you're a part-time clown, this'll be ideal for you!!!!  It's a really good size and color, however - it is NOT FOR SERIOUS PARTY-DRESSING....UNFORTUNATELY.
I bought this and i am going to wear it for halloween my friends say it is great,except for the ones who hate harry potter.Bye It it is so worth it....

My father had one of these, and the whole family used it at times for polishing the larger areas of our leather shoes.  Obviously it can't be used for fabric and a little elbow grease is still needed for the tough spots.  But, all-in-all it does a nice job.  This price is great.  I've looked at a similar one at the mall for twice the price! My husband is getting this for Father's Day.
Works well, could be a little easier to attach polishing pads, it took an inordinate amount of time to do.

This is a piece of trash.  The buffer ends are made of cheap plastic and the pads are so thin that it resembles a toy.  When you put you shoe on it, the shoe bounces off of it.
