There is no way to make it buff smoothly over the shoe.  You can't use any pressure or the spinning shuts down.  After 10 minutes of use it shuts down because it gets to hot.Don't waste your time or money on this thing.
summary: Should be worst class shoe polisher

reviewText: Another attorney in my office has the exact same electric shoe polisher which he bought at Sharper Image, and he paid a heck of a lot more for it. It works well and keeps my shoes looking very nice.
summary: Good product at less expensive price

reviewText: Yesterday,June 27,2003,was one of the most beautiful nights of my life.I saw Dollar Brand,or Abdullah Ibrahim,on stage,playing solo acoustic piano for two hours.I told many peaople in town to come to this concert,because it would surely be one of the most essential dates we had in some twenty years,with Randy Weston,Chet Baker,Tommy Flanagan,George Adams/Don Pullen,Shepp,Benny Carter/Harry Edison and David Murray;and I was right.And if they didn't believe me,too bad for them.We had two hours of pure magic.Abdullah played the first hour and a quarter without a stop,creating some kind of Ellingtonian suite,including only his own compositions;haunting ballads and african tunes;then he played two shorter parts ,twenty minutes each,and the first one included several Dukish tunes.There was an irreal moment at the end of the concert,when everybody was standind up applausing the Master for minutes and minutes,while he sent kisses to the audience.This 69 years old king of piano,who was discovered by Duke Ellington (who organized Dollar's first recording session for Frank Sinatra's Reprise label),is one of the last great masters of jazz piano, with Hank Jones,Randy Weston and Ahmad Jamal.This record is one of Abdullah's earliest ones;it was made in London,March 16,1965.He pays tributes to his main influences: Fats Waller(1904-1943),with an incredible version of the magnificent "Honeysuckle rose";Randy Weston,7 years older than him,with a beautiful song by Randy,dedicated to his son,"Little Niles";Thelonious Monk(1917-1982),with the sublime "Reflections" and "Monk's mood";and of course,his main influence,Duke Ellington (1899-1974) with an extremely beautiful medley including "mood indigo"(one of the most beautiful tunes ever written),"don't get around much anymore" and "take the A train".Abdullah was 32 at this time,and already was one of the major piano players.He's the man who never played two notes if one was enough.He's the man who,when he plays his african,very swinging and rhythmical tunes,gives me as much pleasure as the old stride piano players,Fats Waller,James P.Johnson or Willie Smith.He's one of the few immense jazz artists still alive and playing.And this solo piano effort is essential.Just as many of his recordings: "african piano","anatomy of a south african village","live at Sweet Basil with Carlos Ward","Duke Ellington presents","Autobiography","african magic","cape town revisited","memories","ode to Duke Ellington","anthem for the new nations".You'll have troubles to find some of these in America (maybe most of these).It's a pity,because here are some of the most necessary records by this master.So,good luck.I wish you could find these records,but what I wish the most,is that you could see Abdullah Ibrahim in concert;you'll never forget this moment.
summary: Meet the South-african master of jazz piano

reviewText: I bought this product for my Dad.  He likes to always look sharp at a moment's call.  He certainly likes this product, but it is really only useful as a last minute dust-remover and light-buffer.  It doesn't buff the shoes quite as much as we'd hoped, so you will probably still have to go through your normal buffing process once in a while, but it does a pretty clean daily job.  All-in-all, an acceptable product for sharp-dressed people; unnecessary for anyone else, really.
summary: Good product... for last minute touch-up

reviewText: THe polisher looks good and does the job, albeit, with an under-powered motor. Maybe 1/4 horse-power more would be the key.

It requires a bit of assembly, which takes about 5 minutes and you've got yourself a first class, value-priced shoe polisher.  The fuzz pads are a little economically built (not as good as the ones in the barbershop when I was a kid), but they work.  For the price, it's hard to pass up.

These bibs are beautiful and the quality seems fine, but there is a small tag on the back that says they are good up to 12 lbs.  My son was a big newborn, so he reached 12 lbs pretty soon. THese are adorable, but not a good choice if your baby is bigger.
summary: great unless you have a big baby

reviewText: This is the ONE shoe polisher ... I'm on my second now (the first is still working fine after more than 15 years but left behind in a separation).  Not the cheapest but worth the extra money and will service your shoes for many, many years with a change in pads every 5-6 years!The only other similar product I absolutely love is the Corby pants press .... also a must if you want to save money on dry cleaning and want sharp slacks day in and day out!!

I bought this shoe polisher for my son...a very finicky yuppie! He just LOVES it! There it stands in his bedroom ready to polish his shoes just before leaving the house. I have to admit, he always looks so handsome and well groomed and nicely polished shoes contribute to the total "look". He's very successful as a pharmaceutical rep...maybe the shiny shoes help?
I am returning my unit.  The brushes are too soft and the motor is too weak to actually do anything but take the dust off your shoes.
item is just as described; works very well and does a good job of shining leather shoes
This is a nice polisher for on/off use. For the person looking for everyday use, this most likely would fall apart after a couple of months. It saves me time and it fits a need at the right price.

Nice costume.  My daughter loved it for her halloween costume and will use it afterward for dress up.  However, I was disappointed because in the review it said it comes with gloves, petty coat, and hair tie to match dress and it did not come with it.  Just the dress itself.  Besides that it was great.

This shoe polisher lasted less than three months and it was only used by my husband for a quick buff to shine up his shoes before leaving for the office.  The brush broke off and we couldn't find any replacement parts anywhere.  So we just bought another thinking that we'd at least have spare parts if anything broke again.  Well, the same side brush broke as did the one on the other side.  The problem is that the brush should be on a metal axle rod and not plastic.  This whole thing is made of cheap plastic with the exception of the tall handle!  Definitely NOT worth the price!
This watch has all the features my husband was looking for in a wristwatch.  He especially likes the ease of setting the alarm.

I bought this watch because it was analog and easy to set.  I work an odd schedule so have diffuculty remembering the day.  The date is awful small for us over 40 folks as well.  I love the easy to set timer.  Just spin the dial.  No multiple buttons to push and no 26 language instruction sheet to wade thru.  Unfortunately my dial fell off and I returned it to walmart and got a replacement.  ON this watch the bezel has lost its color and the indiglo has lost its brightness so I cannot read the watch at night.  As a professional firefighter EMT I need to see the time and second hand  on the watch.  Definitely want another but wish it was tougher.!

This new Ruby site of Amazon is easy to navigate, with all the nice Amazon.com features, a pleasure to shop! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was the sometimes very limited selection (try men's watches: just one Timex watch), but I assume that's because it is still in the making. Congratulations!

Very useful easy-set alarm.  Indigo light is excellent and can double as small "flashlight" in a pinch. Functional, easily read analog dial.  Tough, scratch proof crystal. Keeps perfect, and I do mean perfect, time--best of any watch owned at any price.But... after a couple of years the alarm only works on certain sections of the dial.  The bezel on the back has become completely corroded from persperation.  (I believe the finish was rough when I first bought it. But, I did not expect such deterioration.)  The buttons are tough to push with a rough feeling.I like it so much I have ordered another in spite of the durability issues with the first one.  If there are imperfections in the bezel back finish of the new one, I will return or exchange it this time, however.
summary: Poor durability, but great features so I'm buying my second

reviewText: I was delighted to find this watch an analog masterpiece with magnificent looks! The dark brown leather strap adds to the aesthetic appeal of the light brown dial.The alarm mechanism is one of the most beautiful. One can set the alarm by turning the dial of the watch to the preferred time. There are two options to set alarms: hourly ring and 12 hour ring - truly wonderful by just turning the dial. This is why I called it an analog masterpiece. In today's digital era, this watch surely makes heads turn.Plus the Timex - Indiglo feature makes this watch a cool item and worth buying.

The easy-to-set alarm deserves high praise. Just turn the bezel (the rotating ring around the face) and easily set the alarm to go off within a one-hour or 12-hour timeframe. I wish other manufacturers offered something similar, because I've lost confidence in Timex quality. Within a year of owning the watch, the bezel fell off after a minor bump. I was able to snap it back on, but it no longer turned smoothly and the bezel began to fall off on a regular basis. Eventually it fell off without my noticing and was lost. Since others appear to have had the same experience, I cannot recommend the watch.
summary: Disappointed: nice features, but not sturdy

reviewText: I very much like the analog dial and timer function, but this watch just will not stay together! My outer ring (possibly the &quot;bezel&quot; another review mentioned) fell off after six months, so I got it replaced. Six months later, ring falls off again. So I go without it and just use the buttons to adjust the time/timers. Today the top button used to adjust the time came off, so now the watch is toast.I remember when Timex watches used to &quot;take a licking&quot; and &quot;keep on ticking&quot;, but this is pathetic. I spent around $50 for this watch (slightly different style) and to have it last less than 18 months is ridiculous. I've now given up on Timex and will be buying other brands from now on.
summary: Takes a Licking and falls to pieces

reviewText: My dad owned this watch before passing it down to me. We figure it is about 25-30 years old now and it has been an outstanding watch. It's extremely simple to use yet provides the essential features of a digital watch (timer, chrono, alarm, date and, of course, time) and is extraordinarily reliable in whatever conditions you throw its way (did a variety of construction and landscaping jobs with it, automotive work, light scuba diving as well as other sports, and just everyday life). I found batteries would easily last past 5 years, wouldn't be surprised if they lasted beyond 10 years, and it never was inaccurate for time.The screen is very easy to read in whatever light, direct sunlight through to pitch black (with the backlight). The backlight provides very even lighting. It's also extremely light weight and thin, which is a nice change from a lot of watches with similar feature sets that look like they were carved from a block of rubber.I'm looking to replace it with this one again simply because after that many years the buttons became very hard to press and the glass became so scratched that it is difficult to view the screen. I consider this acceptable though after that many years.The biggest drawback would be the strap, as I'm not a fan of Velcro. This is easily remedied by purchasing a new strap, however (as I have done with my old one).For a basic, everyday watch, I cannot recommend this watch enough. Outstanding work by Timex.(A good measure of design: it's design hasn't changed for 25-30 years. The model today looks identical to my old one. Perfect.)

This is the best shoe polisher for its price. I know some people don't like how the buffer stops under high torque, but you just have to learn how to be more delicate. But the thing does a good job. This is the second one of these I bought. One is at home, the other at work, which I use for touch-ups, plus it is a nice thing to have around for visitors. I really like it.

Have had this watch for years (15+), and other than replacing the band and batteries, I've had no problems with it. Finally replaced it with the same model only because the price of a replacement band and new battery are high enough, new watch is cheap enough, and the old one was beat up enough, that it just seemed to make sense going with a new watch.Its not overly big (some watches are the size of clocks) and its got everything I need. Day of week, date and accurate time that I can see in the dark.

I've had this watch for at least 5 or 6 years and it still works like a charm.  It's been submerged in water multiple times without problem, although within the last few years it's started to let water inside, but after drying out it still works just fine (most of the time it even works with water still inside it).  It's been dropped, had heavy objects smash into it, and was even frozen once - the display stopped working while frozen, but it started working again after thawing and still had the correct time.I had to replace the battery once after about 3 years, and the velcro on the included strap wore out very quickly.  I replaced the strap with an identical one, which also wore out quickly.  I now have a buckling strap which has held up admirably.By now the watch face has gotten a some scratches and the button labels have mostly worn off - I'm looking to get a new watch mainly for the aesthetics, although the buttons also require a bit more force to register than they used to.  It's still highly functional.  I've been considering other watches, but may just buy the same model again.  This is, hands down, the most durable watch I have ever owned, and has great features to boot.I'm subtracting one star just for the wrist band issue.

Seriously, I love this watch.  I bought it almost 9 years ago when I started Basic Training in the Army.  This watch has been with me every step of the way.  It has been stomped on, kicked, slammed, lit on fire, even blown up.  I have had it with me chest deep in mud with no problems.  I haven't had it too deep in water, 12 meters, but it goes in the shower with me every night. The stop watch and counter help me with my Physical Fitness test, keeps me on track for my run times.  The dual time is awesome, I can easily check the time back home (keeps me from calling the wife and kids at 3am). I lost it about 6 years ago. I was heart broken.  In that time I have had about 8 different watches, not a one of them added up.  While preparing for a deployment to Iraq a few months ago I found it. It still held the right time.  I have never had to change the batteries, this tour has been the worse for the watch. Covered in blood and many different chemicals and it still keeps going.  Well, finally, the crystal is getting so scratched up its getting hard to see in some light.  Time for a new one.  You better believe I will be getting the same one again.  Its the only watch I trust. I will hold on to this one tho forever.

I'd give this watch no star, if this site would allow.  At one star, it is over-rated.I bought this model as an everyday watch because of its timer and chronometer features and because it was advertised as Water Resistant to 100 meters.  I've use it for about 8 months.  Electronics worked as advertised, though I found that it was not as easy to start, stop, and begin a new timer cycle as Casio watches I've owned.  The "stop-watch" feature also was a little cumbersome to use--perhaps because of the splits and other features I don't need.I've never had the chance to use it snorkeling, which is another reason I bought it.  This morning when I put it on, I noticed that some of the letters and numbers on the face were not displaying properly--missing parts of the short segments that darken to form a number/letter.  Later, I noticed the face had moisture condensed on the inside of the crystal.  I have routinely rinsed the watch in running water after coming in from work, dusty or worse.  I rinsed it yesterday.I thought the leak might be due to a loose screw securing the back plate, but that wasn't so--the tiny screws had been torqued so tight that I had to struggle to loosen them.When I got the back off, I noted that the gasket that seals the watch is very thin and does not appear to project above portions of the back upon with the back-plate rests. Either the gasket deteriorated since installation or the design is flawed.I never before bought a watch rated "water resistent" to 100 m, and I've never had a problem rinsing or snorkeling with regular water-resistent watches. I don't know if the watch will dry out and resume proper functioning, but I will have to replace it anyway because it leaks, even when not submerged.

I have taken this watch all over the world, and it is a great buy.  The alternate time really came in handy when I wanted to know what time it was back home and I was half way around the world.  Sure, I can just add 10 hours and subtract a day, but when you are at the end of the day and only running on 4 hours sleep it is kind of hard to figure out if now is a good time to call home.  I would also use it as GMT time while I was flying though mutiple time zones.  Very useful if you deal with that.The Indiglo is nice and bright, and the numbers are large and easy to read.  I used the timer many times, and being able to set my alarm to either time-1 or time-2 is quite handy.  The stop watch isn't fancy, but I found it easy to use.  I am also a fan of the cloth wristband.  No cracking rubber, no hair pulling, an exact size, and very comfortable.  You do need to wash it from time to time though.Some of the smaller features are rather handy too.  For instance, when your alram goes off it goes to the alarm display.  You can quickly turn off the alarm and hit the mode button once to get back to the time display.  When the timer goes off, I am brought to the timer display and I can either start again or go back to time.  No need to shuffle though all the displays either way.  Simple but very effective.  They are nice little touches that show that they were thinking when they made this watch.I can't vouch for diving, but I've never had moisture and after several drops and rough handeling, I still see all my display.  I've scratched the display to heck, but I can still read it clearly.The only fault I can think of is the cloth wristband which I mentioned above.  Although I love it, it will get dirty after a while.  But a quick spin in the wash with the rest of your clothes and you are back in business.  A small price to pay for many benifits.A very solid watch, and worth every penny.
summary: Great everyday watch, and a must for pilots

reviewText: I love this watch.  The time is easy to read, even for a 78 year old senior (me) without glasses.  It shows me the day Month and date and alarms on the hour and at set times.  The sturdy plastic band is easy to put on and take off and I never put it on upside down like seniors often do with expansion bands.  I have several more expensivewatches, but this one is my favorite.

I purchased this watch because I needed one with a chronograph, and this was the cheapest at the PX. The manual stated its life expectancy at two to three years. Five years later, and the battery is only now dying. This watch was on my wrist during rock climbing trips, parachute jumps, both deployments to Africa, both deployments to Afghanistan, and all the times in between. I don't think much more could be asked of a watch than what I have with this one.

I wasn't expecting a ton out of this watch given the price, but it has served me well.  The leather strap has held together better than I expected, and I've had no major issues with the watch.  The indiglo works well and is easy to read in the dark.The crown has a tendency to get pulled out (once a month or so, for me.)

Watch keeps correct time, I like the size of it, easy to read dial. The strap that keeps the excess band from sticking out came real loose and too big. Other than that, the watch is good for the price, the shipping was too expensive through 3rd party.

It keeps great time.  It's easy to see at night.  It's cool looking.  It's waterproof.  It's durable.  It's cheap.  It looks good with a suit or when you're out hiking.  If it had an alarm it would be perfect.

I got this watch because of the price and Indego feature.  I refuse to pay big bucks for a timepeice that gets a beating.  It has lasted 14 months which is longer than any other watch I've had.  The crystal held up to some rough knocks.  But the crown sticks out too far and finally got broken off.I will buy another Timex, but not this model.

Without a doubt, this is the best watch I've ever owned and have been very satisfied with it.  I've had it for 10+ years and it's still going strong, so I've decided to write a review to assure you that this little ticker is well worth the purchase.Let me start with the water resistance.  I actually found this watch in the OCEAN which is how I first acquired it (wild, huh?), and it was fully functional.  I've gone diving with it on, forgotten to take it off during showers, it has truly been weathered, and it holds up wonderfully.  I've never tested if it can actually go 100 meters down in water, but judging that I found it in the ocean I'm certainly inclined to believe it.The watch is very practical for whatever you do, and includes a nice, crisp display and a back light that lets it glow in the dark.  It's vibrant enough so you can see the display very well, and if you hold down the button the back light stays on for a few seconds after you let go of the button which is handy at times.  It also has an alarm to set and you can turn on and off the sound for each hour.  By accessing the Mode button it includes a timer, a stop watch and also what seems to be an alternate time interface for if you want to keep two different times on the same watch.  There is a Set button as well to set the time, and you can have it on army standard time as well.  These buttons are rather tight and a bit hard to push at first, but over time you get used to them and they get more give.The strap is very comfortable, and I like the give that the flexible cloth under the display gives the watch.  The battery performance is excellent, and I've only had to change the battery three times over an eleven-year lifespan.  Very impressive.The only things I can think of that work against this watch, is the Velcro gets worn after about six years or so and I had to apply new Velcro, but for most watches this is to be expected.  Also if you aren't careful the flexible cloth under the watch can get a bit over-flexed and worn if you tug on it a lot for an extended period of time; I've never had this problem, but a work colleague of mine who has the same model had this happen.  Now remember, I'm talking ten years of wear here; me and my colleague have had the same watch for many years, and are very satisfied with how it's held up nonetheless.  (I'm actually the one who referred HIM to buying it in the first place!)In short, this watch simply does what it's supposed to and more.  I wish more watches were made like this, and I've certainly been spoiled by this one.  I would give it a 10 if I could, but Amazon limits me to 5.  This is an incredibly hardy watch, practical and reliable, and it has trustfully served me for over a decade with no problems.  I am very satisfied with every aspect of it and highly, highly recommend you purchase it.  This is how watches should be; it has been a fantastic watch for me, and if you buy it I assure you you will be very glad you did.
summary: The best watch I have ever had

reviewText: My 5 year old daughter flipped out when she saw this gift Christmas morning.  Since then she's been sporting several tatoos, including the 'scar' on her forehead.  I have been turned into many things a cat, a quiet mom, a frog.  My daughter loves to play dress up and this is an excellent addition to her collection.
My grandson loved this product. I would recommend this product for all children who are interested in Harry Potter. He had loads of fun wearing it and playing pretend.

This thing rocks step into Harry Potters shoes!! It is the best it comes with a wand Harry`s glasses a robe and stickers I think you should buy one of the student hats to go with it. I`m telling you buy it you will not regret it buy it!!!

It's a great toy for the imaginatoin. My sister loves it a whole lot. The only problem is that it doesn't have a pocket in the robe. The wand is alittle weird, but it is a whole lot better than the picture shows, a whole lot better. The glasses I think look pretty dorky, I'm 11, but my sister still likes it. Don't listen to the other people about the tattoos, there is about 6 scar tattoos and a tattoo for each all the teams. (Gryfindor, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw, and Slytherin.) And some smaller ones of those same things. It overall is a great toy.

I bought this costume for my son for his second birthday party, which had a Harry Potter theme.  (See my "How To" guide for organising an unforgettable Harry Potter party in the "So you'd like to ..." section)The one I got came with a fancy clasp to hold the front of the cape together.  It was a little big, so I had to hem it and roll up the sleeves.  Even after hard wear and much abuse at the party it washed well, and looks like new.  He will probably still have this costume when Books 6 and 7 come out.The wand is realistic, but with young children you have to watch out for them hitting other children with it, as it's pretty solid.The glasses are also very authentic looking, and fits all faces (mine included).  Again you have to be careful with younger children as it tends to slide off little noses, and the glass might break.  I haven't had any problems with it mind you, but it could happen.  The lenses get dirty quickly also.The transfers are a very nice touch, and they go on easily with a little water.  Even squirmy kids can be decorated without too much fuss.  They last a couple of days if you don't scrub them too hard in the bath.  I removed my son's own, because it was so realistic that people kept coming up to me asking if he had fallen and hurt his forehead. (Muggles no doubt!)A great buy for your little Harry Potter
summary: Real cute on Little Harry Potters

reviewText: My Granddaughter loves Harry Potter books and movies. Harry, Ron and Harmione come out to play and she makes up new adventures for the four of them to share. I am really glad I bought the dress up set for her!
Very good.

I'm a 22 years old Harry Potter fan, and for this Halloween I bought this set, a messy black haired wig, and my friend Evelyn made me a Griffindor scarf to wear with my custome. Everyone loved the costume!!!!! I would love to be ten years younger so that I could play around with my friends, but instead I have to work!The only problem is that it only comes in kids sizes (duh!) and is too short for us older fans.

I THINK HARRY POTTER IS GREAT FOR ANY CHILD. IT IS SORT OF LIKE CINDERELLA, BUT FOR BOYS. I AM A GOOD CHRISTIAN AND DO NOT SEE ANYTHING WRONG WITH LETTING A CHILD USE HIS IMAGINATION. THIS JUST MAKES A MORE INTELLIGENT CHILD. I GOT THIS FOR MY 5 YEAR OLD'S BIRTHDAY AND HE JUST LOVED IT. HIS 2 YEAR OLD LITTLE BROTHER TAKES THE WAND AND RUNS AROUND TRYING TO MAKES THINGS LEVITATE(THIS IS CREATIVITY AT WORK). THEY HAVE SO MUCH FUN PRETENDING TO BE HARRY POTTER. I AM GOING TO HAVE TO BUY MY 2 YEAR OLD ONE ALSO. IF YOUR CHILD LOVES HARRY POTTER THEN YOUR CHILD WILL LOVE THIS.
summary: EXCELLENT PRETEND BOYS HARRY POTTER BIRTHDAY OR CHRISTMAS

reviewText: My son loves it.  The glasses and wand complete the set!
this toy is really really cool even though the wand is bigger then it's soppused to be thats alright becuz this toy is "da bomb" lol!
I think this toy is absolutely fantastic.  I use mine to hopscotch up and down the office in H3GYipeeeeeeeeeeeeee

Actually, the retailer ended up not mailing me the Expedition #T77761 which they advertise in the photo, but mailed me the newer Expedition #791709. At first I was pretty annoyed and was going to return the watch but... the newer model isn't bad either. It's not as cool as the T77761 (which I've been wearing & buying replacements for over the last 10+ years), but at least it's not discontinued and has all the same basic features.  I think Famous Brand Watches needs to get their act together in the advertising dept or the shipping dept, but Timex still makes great products for the price, and you don't feel too bad if you beat them up in whatever outdoor activity you choose.

It's Harry Potter, so my kids love it...At our house you are just as likely to find Harry Potter playing soccer as casting spells.One thing to consider though. The lightning bolt tatoos look alot like a huge wound when applied to the forehead...much concern from others...and they last for days and days.The bottom line, dress up is always fun, and who moreso than Harry Potter.
summary: It's cool! Lightning Bolt tatoos and all!

reviewText: My son had a Harry Potter party for his 6th birthday so we purchased this for him to wear at the party.  Very cute.  The glasses are especially nice and the wand is good.  The robe is nice but one side of the clip came unglued.  Easy to fix but could be a continuing problem.

This is a great set!  The glasses have clear glass in them, the wand looks like wood (but is plastic), and the robe has the Griffindor seal.  The one we ordered came with lightning bolt tatoos which really completes the Harry Potter look!  My son has worn this costume for the recent book release party (where he won 3rd place in a costume contest), Halloween, watching the movies, playing the computer game.  It is durable, lightweight, and LOADS of fun!  A great gift for all Potter fans...

Wow, is the packaging fancy on this costume.  But looks are very deceiving!  I gave this 5 stars for fun because, my son will be able to enjoy the wand and glasses for more than a day. This toy/costume has NO educational value, (I wish there were a "0" star rating.)  I gave this only 2 stars for durability because this robe/cape is cheaply made, thin and runs very small.  It says will fit 12/14, but will probably only fit a 10/12 at best. It says machine washable, but I WILL NOT wash it for fear of shrinkage.  The material WILL run very quickly, and I know the first time he brushes up against a branch or bush on Halloween, it will be full of snags....
This was inexpensive and great fun for any Harry Potter fan. It had the basics and is a terrific way to encourage their imagination.

This was a really fun purchase.  My son wore this to a Harry Potter book party in Hudson, Ohio.  Everyone kept asking us where we got it.  He has since worn it in the house several times.  We are planning on using it for Halloween as well.Purchases like this make the books come to life.

If you expect to hear the music that you used to hear from James Last, well don't, I guess the sound of the likes of "Biscaya" is what I wanted and is not, however still James Last and the songs are from ABBA, so it is OK'

This is the most fun toy this year for my little girl. The reason for this is that while we are waiting for the next Harry Potter book to be published I have been telling my eight year old original stories based on the Harry Potter books, involving her adventures at a magic school of our own creation, set in our area, with all-original characters. She and I both enjoy these stories, and she always insists on wearing her Gryffindor robe while hearing the stories I tell.Therefore, I think that this product is very educational. Not as much so as the books themselves, all of which she has already memorized.This is one thing that I think the marketers of this product have overlooked. This is a Harry Potter Costume Kit, complete with glasses. It would probably sell a lot better if they were to remove the glasses and the lightning tattoos, and market it as "Official Hogwart's Robes". They could even come out with a different design for each house, rather than just selling this item as a Harry Potter Costume Kit, for kids who would like to pretend that they are at a magic school. I'm sure that this would be infinitely more fun for most children.Even though they did miss the boat on this, the Harry Potter costume is a very fun product. I strongly recommend it.

James Last plays Abba.My daughter "borrowed" Mama Mia from me and never gave it back. When I saw -James Last plays Abba- on your e-mail I ordered it right away and I have almost wore it out playing it.I love it, if I turned up the Volume my Livingroom becomes a Concert Hall. Gitta B.
summary: I love the CD very much.

reviewText: i found this music very entertaining, i will continue to listen to all he has to offer.  the low brass is outstanding

I really enjoyed this cd. James Last has done it again!! The arrangements are great!! The trumpet lead in "The Winner Takes It All" is very beautiful! There is a strong saxophone and trumpet presence throughout the cd. The strings are really great too. James Last has done a wonderful job of weaving both the wind and string parts together in this production of ABBA's music. This is one of my favorite popular music orchestral cd's!!! Greg W.
summary: A really great performance of ABBA music by a superb orcherstra!!!!!!

reviewText: ABBA attracted worldwide attention after their 1974 win at the Eurovision Song Contest, with "Waterloo". Their music was bright, fresh, and the voices blended extremely well. James Last, already one of Europe's musical treasures, applied his magic to the songs of Sweden's biggest export since the Volvo. With arrangements that are bright, bouncy, and worthy of a listen, these songs take on a new life. Listen for yourself... and see if you can keep from dancing!
This is a fun album from start to finish.  James shows he's not afraid to "kick it into overdrive" and play popular music in its proper upbeat tempo.  James Last is the king of his craft.
Very good, but not as good as Richard Clayderman's ABBA.  I was never so disappointed as seeing the stage show Mama Mia, it almost turned me on ABBA.

High quality, great sound.  These instrumentals are lively & upbeat with sharp sound.  Many of the tracks have a slightly faster tempo than Abba's version.  Great album for dancing to fast music, but not necessarily for quietly reading a book or doing homework.
i have a lot of brothers and they like really anything but this watch this watch has so like wow lets stop and look but i dont think this is a cool watch
Dear Targeteers,This watch is exelent. it has everything and i can even wear it while i do my sports. I can also dive with it. I would love to get one for my family too

The best part about this watch is Skytel.com is giving a free one year of nationwide paging service.  All the goodies, 800 number, callerid, voicemail, email address to your pager.  You name it.  I would give it a try.

I have the older beepwear version of this watch (mine has the timex datalink and stores phone numbers, etc also), but the technology and features are the same otherwise. Aside from the pager feature, the "flex time" is great. I never have to set my watch, or worry that the watch is running slow, the time is automatically set. I did find that the pager had slightly less ability to receive pages in buildings than a "normal" pager, but I hate carrying a pager. This watch was the only answer for me. My beepwear service has lapsed, but the time setting function continues. I'm considering buying one of these newer ones but I'd miss having my phone numbers handy.

I got this a year and a half ago expecting disappointment.  I was pleasantly surprised when I realized that it was every bit as reliable as my old beeper.  I am an airline pilot and use this as my watch (time is always perfectly accurate) and my beeper.  My kids have used it a few times to email a message to me also.  Like most beepers, it works where cell phones occasionally don't (big buildings like Walmart, Lowe's, and Ice rinks).  ...it has worked great for me.  I am only on this website to buy another as mine went bad after scuba diving (4 dives to 60 feet).  It does not advertise waterproof, although I have been swimming, wakeboarding, etc... many times.

I had bought this for my son because he was Harry for Halloween.  He still wears the robe and plays with the wand.  He runs around the house saying magic spells from the movie as he swishes and flicks his wand.
summary: Lots of fun for the imagination

reviewText: IS IT MONTHLY FEE?IS THE TOTAL IS $99.99?MATT

I originally bought this watch during my wife's pregnancy.  This watch is awesome because I don't need another device on my body for my wife to reach me.  The free 1 yr subsription from Skytel is pretty good too! I gave it a 4 star instead of 5 because there are a couple of negatives: 1)The buttons are clunky @ best because timex try to add too many features w/the small amount of buttons on it - it will take some time to get use to it.  2) This watch takes a lot of power to maintain, especially if you live in the rural areas(your pager are more likely than not to go into "roam" mode...Hence, you will use a lot power.I have gone through 8-10 batteries in a year because of this...BTW, the batteries are the same kind as the hearing aid, are in expensive, and are extremely easy to obtain from any drug store.
summary: I like it, but it ... a lot of batteries

reviewText: This watch has it all. With Flextime, you will never have to set it.  The time is always accurate. Period.  A great way I use the paging is with E-bay auctions.  E-bay sends me a message when I'm outbid or when I win an auction. The 800 # for paging me allows me to set up my own message, and you can choose any e-mail address you want (@ skytel.com) for the text messaging.Most importantly to me, the pager and e-mail work in places where other pagers and cell phones are dead.  I can still be reached anytime of the day or night.

I initially bought this for myself, but my high schooler begged me to give it to him. The Yahoo alerts are cool, but that's just the beginning.Once you activate service with Skytel, it becomes a valuable communication tool. Like a pager, you are assigned a toll-free number. You can customize the greeting with your own voice. The caller can either leave a voicemail, where your watch beeps (or buzzes) and identifies the phone # and area (city, state) of the originating call. Or they can leave a number that appears on your watch.It also accepts SHORT (100 characters or less) email communications. The address is the (phone number)@skytel.comThis is a great way to communicate with your kids! Send them an email wishing them well on their Geometry test, or you can tell them you'll be late coming home!I recommended this to a friend whose son was going away to boot camp. They limit the phone calls to home, so my buddy send words of encouragement to his son. This was the only thing that kept the kid going, he said (plus the emails from his girlfriend)!I wound up buying another one for me and my other son. (These are the same watches worn by the kids on MTV's REAL WORLD in Chicago).
This is a plain waterproof digital watch suitable for a woman or youth. It is very simple to use and will not go into some strange mode if you accidentally bump a button.

I get watches like this because they tell the day of the week and the date so you have a little calendar on your wrist so to speak all the time tooBesides, I for some reason have always had bad luck with expensive watches, I have no idea why, I am just jinxed that way or something!

I just got this watch 2 weeks ago, and it is great! Such class! Goes with everything and heavy duty, yet very lady-like... If you are a fan of the silver - stainless steal products, and love a Quality item , get this watch! Great deal, nice packaging too!

I am an odd character in that I have always had a problem wearing anything on my hands. That includes rings and watches. I carry my watch in my pant's pocket almost all of the time. This watch with its recessed settings is the only one that I have found that does not get the settings changed while it is my pant's pocket. I have been buying variations on this watch for probably close to 30 years. They keep good time and the clock's calendar is often handy. The watch is advertised as water resistant. A few months ago I left my watch in my pant's pocket and it went through a complete washing machine cycle and it still works. The battery is a minor problem. They advertise a 7 year life and I would guess that is about right. However, you don't know how long the watch has set on a shelf before you bought it so your "new" watch's battery may last a much shorter period of time. You can buy replacement batteries at any number of places but they are a challenge to install. The water resistant case is hard to take apart and much harder to put back together correctly. Only about half the time can i replace the battery and the watch is in working order when I am done.
Such a great watch.  Classic and never goes out of style.  So glad I bought it.

I too intended to buy the watch pictured above with the gunmetal dial and round face.  A different Kenneth COle watch came with a rectangular face.  My wife liked it better so we kept it, but beware they will send you the wrong watch.

I purchased this watch about a year 1/2 ago at Marshall Field's on-line.  Since then I have received several compliments whenever I've worn it and I wear it almost every day!  One time on a flight I saw the same watch in one of those airline catalogue for much more $$ then I paid!  Definitely this watch is worth it's price!

This watch looks very hip - very Kenneth Cole.  It is also water-resistant.  I will note one thing that may not be obvious.  The tone of the watch is very stainless steel (think kitchen sink) rather than just brushed silver.

In today's current watch fashion with big faces and even larger bands, this watch is a nice change.  I have smaller wrists/forearms and larger faces and bands look ridiculous on me.I finally found a bracelet watch that has style and has the smaller face that I can wear every day as well as to nicer occasions.  I was afraid the clasp might be fragile, but so far it has held up nicely without catches or coming off.
My husband and everyone else LOVES this inflatable!!!! It is the center of conversation. I am asked where I got it and I tell them. It is so darn cute!!!

The product arrived in a timely manner.  One of the bulbs was smashed, but that was not a big deal.  I was disappointed to learn that Wal Mart was selling the same product for almost half the price and I notified the seller of the product.The palm tree was for our first Christmas in Florida and it was a novel, big hit.

This watch is real slick, not an over-powering "look at me" kinda watch, but has more of a sleek, subtle sophisticated quality to it. Im pleased with the watch, only gripe i have is its a bit big on my wrist, and the manual has nothing in it on how to resize. this kinda irritates me, but its nothing that can't be fixed by a jeweler, i'd just rather be able to do it on my own without thinking i'm gonna break it.
GRANDDAUGHTER LOVED IT!
Grand daughter loved it

I got this for the 2nd Birthday of the most precious girl that I watch.  I know that she is going to love it....I do.  Well made and just the right size.  The "stuff" inside is fun.  She loves to carry her things around in something and this fits all the bases.
My 2-yr-old loves it.  The wallet is a little hard for her to open but it isn't a huge deal.
summary: My 2-yr-old loves it. The wallet is a little ...

reviewText: It has been a year since we got this for our now 2.5 year old daughter-- and it still remains her favorite purse!

Purchased for Christmas present for our granddaughters.  It looked like it was well made when they opened the present and had spent the afternoon playing with it.  It was just the right size for them to carry around.

I wanted to get my only little girl her own purse, so she could be like mommy... I have 4 children, 3 year old b/g twins, and 8 month old b/b twins. she got this purse when she was 18 months and she has some new "favorites", but this was a hit anyways. She loves the lipstick, and the sunglasses case (we bought her disney ones) and the mirror. But there are better ones out there, we bought her some chapstick and a little better "plastic" lipstick to keep in there, we supervise with capstick. The keys and phone are the only things she didnt pay attention to, because we have better ones. SO if you dont have the things that come in this purse, its great, but we did... so I have bought her other purses, that she likes better

not sure how this item got such a high rating, but to each his own.  i found the product to be made of low quality, rubbery type plastic.  cheap stickers will come of easy if your child tends to put things in her mouth (what kid doesn't).  cell phone has no moving parts, lights, etc.  more of something you'd find in one of those cheap gift bags at a birthday party.  some of the objects concerned me with regards to being a choking hazard or easily torn off by a child's teeth.  i decided not to give this toy to my neice and i won't give it to charity with the concerns i still have.  better options out there for your daughter's first purse.
This little bag is great for small hands. My god daughter loved it. All the right accessories! Worth the price.

My kids LOVE this! It has a good variety of accessories, and I esp. like the little credit card holder. (My two year old keeps wallet size pictures in it.) The only things I'd change is that the cell phone doesn't have buttons you can push, and the keys are cheap/thin.Overall, though, it's a great toy!
My daughter has had this since 12 months (now 20m). She often carries it around, and also hangs it off the side of her toy stroller.
My 20 mth. old daughter received this as a gift from a friend for Christmas and she LOVES it! She takes it everywhere with her. The items are so cute, the purse is adorable. It's a huge hit with us!

My 19 mos. old daughter absolutely loves her purse, especially the lipstick.  I, however, have some suggestions to improve the product:  the phone's buttons should be able to be pushed down; the compact should open up; and both of those items could be slightly smaller.  My daughter, though, loves the toy, so I guess that's really all that matters.
summary: Great for her, but improvements necessary

reviewText: We gave our 3 year-old daughter this purse for Christmas last year. She was delighted with it, but even better, it is now May and it is still among her top 3 most-played with toys. Fantastic value, not too gaudy and perfect for this age, where little girls already want to be grown-up!

This was a gift for my grand-niece. Yesterday was her 3rd birthday and they Skyped with me. She loved it and later was told that she won't let go of it and that it even included a debit card, so she said she was buying everyone dinner. It was a huge hit with her and all of the adults.

This is a must have for your little sweetheart! My daughter carries this purse around with her everywhere that she goes. It's quit interesting finding what she has placed in her purse next ;)The accessories are cute, but she'd rather use stuff from Mommy's purse. ;) The purse is oh so cute too, and durable. My daughter is 21 months old, she received this on Christmas and has been a favorite since.
I would say my two year old daughter likes this toy, but for the money it's a good value. My little girl is very "girly," so she appreciates any kind of rather feminine toys.
My niece absolutely loves her little purse! Great entertainment for girls age 3 & up. Recommended!!
This was a gift for my 4 year old grand daughter.  She loved it to have her "own" phone and keys and purse.

Really cute. My daughter is 16 months and she likes taking things in and out of the bag.  The items are the right size for her. Yes, like others have said the phone is chintzy but the other items are sturdy and I think it is well worth the price. I also think it's a toy that will grow with my daughter.
I love this. It was cheap, and it is super cute and the kids just adore it. Anything to do with Dora is always a hit, and they felt like it was similar to her backpack...

My 1 year old started to want to play with my purse all the time.  I decided to get her her very own purse and this one had great reviews.  I was not sure if she would like it since it does not have zippers or pockets like mommy's purse, but she loves it.  She carries it around with her and plays with all the cool stuff inside.
My two year old granddaughter loved her new purse and its contents.  The purse is easy to open and the individual items are cute.

I got this for my niece as a present. I looked all over for a little girl purse. I loved this one because of the value and all of the additional accessories. The colors were perfect for the little princess. She loves her purse and her big girl stuff. It is fairly durable and has been easy to clean.

Great pager substitute and very discrete.Emails are best sent from the skytel site. That way, you only get valuable message content instead of the message header. However, I have used it for my outbid alerts at my auction site to great success as well.The automatic time updates are great for travel and the multiple alarms are useful as well. Battery consumption is on the high side, but a small price to pay for such a functional device.Best of all, you can receive messages without appearing rude. No one suspects a watch for data transmission! It's MUCH more discrete than a cell, blackberry or two way.4 stars because the watch bands aren't as durable as I'd like and there are VERY limited style options. I'd really appreciate a metal bracelet style wristband for better wear and a more dignified look. I've had to replace one because of strap damage and may soon replace another.

I ordered this for a girl who's almost three, and while she loves it, there are a couple of things others should know before ordering. First, the phone doesn't do anything, which is a pro if you want a quiet toy, but a con to the kid trying to press its buttons and have it make a noise. Also, the coin purse has a clasp that is difficult for little hands to open, but she figured it out eventually. Apart from those two things, the purse is super cute and seems to be quite durable, as are the accessories that come with it. The girl likes to walk around pretending to apply lipstick and puts other stuff in the purse, so it's getting some good use. I think she was a little too old for it though. I definitely wouldn't recommend it for anyone older than 3.
summary: Cute for a one- or two-year-old.

reviewText: Got this for my daughter 2nd birthday (about 3 months ago). Like many other little girls she has had a fascination with purses for a long time. She even had a real one she'd take out for a while. I had been waiting to find a better, more fun, (and safer) toy one. This one is fantastic!I love how it has all the essential contents of a purse. My daughter carries it on her arm when we go out. She pretends to put on the "lipstick" and even started "sliding" the "debit card" in between the keys of her toddler piano!I think any toy that encourages imaginative, pretend play is educational. And of course imitating Mommy is lots of fun and lets lttle ones feel grown up.
Great for  a toddler, perfect size for the little ones. Durable and no chocking worries at all. Enough in the purse to role play and hold interest great price too!
the items inside are just ok. i got a different phone for her to use. doesnt seem to care for it much

My little granddaughter loves this little purse and everything in it. I gave it to her for her birthday, a month ago , she is still playing with it, she is two!I would recommend it to anyone with a feminine little girl.

I gave this to my 1 year old niece for Christmas.  She stopped opening other presents to play with her purse.  She loves putting things in and out of containers and she loves purses.  This was an immediate hit!  I wish I had another niece to give one to!

We gave our 21 month old daughter this purse and she LOVES it.  She walks around with it all the time.  She enjoys putting cards in the little plastic container and is constantly "talking" on the phone.  My only criticism, as others have stated, is that the phone doesn't make any noises.  I'd like it to be more interactive.  Other than that, it's a fantastic little toy!
I got this gift as a Christmas gift for my 15mo old niece, and she loved it.  It was one of her favorite gifts!
My daughter loved this gift.  I did add a couple more plastic make-up pieces to the purse because she calls it her make-up purse. The star mirror is really cute.
summary: My 2.5 year old daughter loves this.

reviewText: I bought this for my niece for her second birthday and she loves it. It has all the things a little girl would need to carry a purse like her mom.

I ordered this for my 20 mth old for a Christmas present. She had just started wanting to put her sisters makeup on and loved to put stuff in bags. When she opened it.. she didn't care about anything else!  She loves it!  She even carries her pacifier in it.  It goes with us everywhere and I am so glad I bought it.
Very cute purse, a little bit smaller than I expected and the "cell phone" was a bit chunkier but otherwise all accessories are great and fit nicely inside the purse.
my diaghter love it and she plays with it all the time its great what for her think she bigger but that with real stuff. thanks

I purchased this because my 2 year old was constantly trying to get in my purse. She was happy to get this! She loved the accessories that came with this cute little purse. Great buy, and I would recommend this toy.
I purchased this for my daughter's first birthday. She likes it and it seems durable enough to last her a few years. Every little girl needs a purse; this is a very good choice for her first.

I bought this for my daughter as a Christmas present when she was 21 months old. She has loved it ever since. It is one of the few toys that she plays with consistantly. She really enjoys having a purse like Mommy.
She carries that thing around everywhere and loves to apply her lipstick. It's so cute. It's a perfect size for her to add a book to take along with her if she wants. Great product.
Perfect for a toddler. She can imitate Mommy and be a big girl. They have other Playthings that I intend to order.  Servicewas great and recieved on time.
summary: My two and a half year old grand daughter says it is awsome

reviewText: This purse is so cute it will not disappoint. The materials are well made and the accessories that come along are great as well.
My neice loves her purse!The purse its self was smaller than I thought but over all a great product for a little girl.
The purse was awesome with the exception of the phone.  That needs to be replaced but otherwise our granddaughter loves this purse and items in it.
summary: 14 month old granddaughter loved the purse

reviewText: I purchased the Kidoozie My First Purse for my friend's daughter on her 2nd birthday. My friend sent me a picture of her daughter, Savannah, sipping her juice box while holding her new purse on her other arm and hadn't put it down from the moment she got in the mail - sounds like a winner to me! All the little goodies that come with the purse are too cute, like the cell phone, wallet and credit card, for example. It's the perfect gift for a little girl (2-3 yrs), especially for the ones who want to do everything she sees her mommy do. Now they can play with their own little faux-bank card instead of yours - YIKES!!!! :)
Purchased the Purse for my Grand Daughter and she loves it.  She shows people her purse and carries it everywheres.  One of best things I ever purchased for her.
I thought this purse and contents were adorable.  Bought this for my granddaughter on her 1st birthday.  I don't see her often, so I don't know how she likes it.
This purse is very cute and my 15 month old g-daughter loves it.  It's her favorite purse of the two she has.
This little purse is a great toy. AND A GREATValue .I don't have any regrets on buying it .
The little girl I bought this for  loves it!  Great gift for a one year old.  Will more than likely buy again.
Adorable Purse for young child, well made & bright colors. The child is enjoying this product very much. We hope there are more products from this company.

I got this purse for my 2.5 year old. She loves it. She wears it on her arm and pushes her stroller around. She calls it her mommy purse. The only draw back is that she can't open the wallet by herself. But she should learn how to in a few months. Very cute purse and seems durable.
was a very cute gift for a little girl. she got a lot a play time out of it and all the parts are mommy approved.

I bought this for a plane ride for a surprise present for my one year-old daughter. I was really nervous on a four hour flight with her now that she was walking. Just kept her very entertained for about half of the flight. It's not the best quality but it was perfect for what we needed. Really happy about it.
summary: I bought this for a trip

reviewText: So many toys kids lose interest-we bought this for my daughter at 18 months and a year later it is still played with often.  She loves all the items that are things found in mom's purse-especially the phone,mirror and lipstick.
The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the quality of the materials. It was worth the great price though!
Bought this as a gift for 2nd Birthday party.  I have since purchased more.  The  kids love them.  Durable and fun.
summary: The kids love them. Durable and fun

reviewText: Her mom said she took to this immediately.  I thought perhaps she was too young for it.  Not!
summary: One year old grand niece loves this.

reviewText: She loves taking all of the accessories out, and then putting them all back in.....over, and over again. It's the perfect purse for a 1 year old, and I would recommend it to anyone.

MY DAUGHTER IS 21 MONTHS AND LOVES THIS PURSE.  IT IS PERFECT FOR HER TO OPEN/CLOSE.  THE ITEMS THAT IT COMES WITH ARE A GREAT BONUS.  I RESEARCHED MANY OTHER PURSES FOR HER AGE RANGE AND I AM HAPPY WITH MY CHOICE FOR HER!
I find this an easy way to shop for something to make a little girl happy! Seeing as how I'm shopping for 9 grandchildren....very convenient

I bought this for my 16 month old granddaughter. She really likes playing with it especially the pretend lipstick.  I like that everthing is big and safe.  My daughter also liked the purse and I am very glad that I bought it.
summary: My granddaughter loved My First Purse

reviewText: I was so afraid of ordering this online and taking the chance that it would not live up to my expectations.  I was not disappointed, and don't believe my 2 yr. old granddaughter will be disappointed either!

simple and basic . Nice little purse for a toddler. Purchased it for my 20 month old grand daughter who is obsessed with her moms make up kit . Not sure if this did the trick to entertain her, but it is cute .
This is a fun little purse for a toddler. It's a manageable size and comes with fun things inside. Just wish the steps were a bit longer.
I bought this for my daughters first birthday and she loves it!!!!
I order this on Amazon for my daughter's 2nd bday and she simply love it :) Its very cute and she love the accessories that came with it. Great quality for the price :)
My granddaughter is now ready for her Female trading due to all the cool assessories Cell phone,Charge card, keys. Ext

I gave this to my one year old granddaughter.  She loves it.  She sits contentedly for long periods of time (during church) putting the items in and taking them out of the purse.  Her favorite item is the lipstick, which she imitates putting on her lips!!
i love it its cute my daughter plays with it she feels like a little lady with it . .
Bought 2 purses for my niece's twin girls... Big hit!!They play with everything inside and put puse on their arms with credit card in hand... ready to go shopping!
summary: Great first purse... best value I've seen.

reviewText: my daughter loves this (shes 2) comes with phone, keys, pretend lipstick, and plastic card wallet. although i find other little items in the plastic card holder. it big enough she can actually but one of her smaller dolls in it and carry it around. great for girlie girls.
I bought this for my granddaughter. She loved it. It had all those things that mom's purse has but child proof.
I got this as a Christmas goft for a 3 year old.  She seems to really like it.  Much better than a real cell phone for kids to break.

My grandaughter was instantly excited about the purse. She eagerly took everything out and paid particular attention to the play cell phone. She is an easily distractible child and after about a half hour she seemed to be finished with it.

We bought this purse for our daughter on her first birthday. We decided on it because she always played with my purse and would take stuff out of it..especially my cell phone!! It was a GREAT investment!! She walks around with the purse on her arm, talking on her play "cell phone". She does like the other accessories that came with it-but, we mostly got it because of the phone. Its true that it doesnt make noise and you cant press the buttons on it but, its suits our one year old!! This purse is a must-have. JUST LOOK AT OUR PICS!
it make my baby girl (18 months) feel like a big girl with her lipstick , purse , and phone

my 2 year old daughter loves this product! she is not crazy about the purse which is pretty small but she really likes the things that come with it. I wish the phone would have been made to work with batteries, so it would make a noise or something but it is just a piece of plastic with fake buttons.

My 15 month old daughter received this for Christmas and she loves it.  I wish the phone buttons could be pushed or did something.  Other than that, it is a fun toy and she walks around the house carrying her handbag just like mommy.  Too cute!

My little girl loves to carry around all her "treasures", whether it be in a paper bag, a bucket, her snack bowl... So I put "play purse" on her Christmas list, and she got this one from an aunt.She ADORES it!!!  It is by far her favorite gift this year. After 2 months, she is still carrying it around. She "puts on" the lipstick (and puts it on me and her brothers too). She carries her other little toys around in the purse.  It's just great overall.  My 1-year old son is also fascinated by the purse and all it's contents.  I like it cuz it's durable and not one thing out of the bag has gotten broken. Amazingly, she's even kept all the pieces together.Big thumbs up from us girls!
summary: Best gift my 2 1/2 year old got for Christmas

reviewText: I sent this to my great grand-daughter who was turning one.  Her mother reports that she just loves it and plays with it every day.  I was worried that she wasn't old enough for a purse.  Mom says no, It is her favorite.
summary: Never too young for a purse

reviewText: I purchased this purse for my daughter who is almost 2.  She loves playing with all the parts and I gave her some additional cards to put in the purse.  Better than some of the other sets I found online.

My 20-month old granddaughter loves to go through Mommy's purse so I was sure she would love this one - but not so.  The phone doesn't do anything and doesn't look mom's smart phone, the mirror is tiny, the credit card wallet is hard too open. Mostly, the things just aren't 'real' enough to match what Mom has. It was tossed in a corner after the first day and hasn't been used since.
My grand daughter loves her little purse. She plays with it all the time. Very durable, would recommend for a little girls first purse.
It is a Christmas gift and it looks cute. Did not open it as of yet not until Christmas. THANK YOU
I gave this to my four year old niece for Christmas and she literally jumped up and down when she opened it. She especially loved the mirror. She did not let that purse leave her all week.
summary: My niece would not put this down

reviewText: Bought this as a gift for my granddaughter who turned 2.  My son reported (they live out-of-state) that this became her favorite gift.  She enjoyed the playthings inside, especially the cell phone, and did not leave the house without her purse.  Every girl needs a purse like her mommy.
summary: My son reported (they live out-of-state) that this became her favorite gift. She enjoyed the playthings inside

reviewText: At first my granddaughter was interested in this purse but after looking everything over she lost interest almost immediately because the phone didn't do anything (no buttons to push or sounds) and the lipstick was  large and not "real looking" enough for her.
overall pleased with this purchase, however the phone was a bit of a letdown.  it doesn't make any sounds and the buttons don't even push down.

My husband and I bought this purse for our daughter's first birthday hoping she would like it...now she won't leave the house without it!  All the accompanying toys are sturdy and adorable.  Olivia loves to talk on her little pink cell phone and pretend she's a big girl as she carries her purse through the house.  She even carries extra bottles for her baby doll in it.  This is a must have toy for all little princesses everywhere!

My 20 month old just adores this purse.  Everything was instinctive with her when it comes to this cute little purse.  She immediately knew how to carry it on her arm, apply the lipstick onto her lips (must have seen mommy do makeup once or twice) and loves to talk on the phone.  Just TOO cute.  She goes out with it like a little fashionista and loves playing with it.  Great toy!
summary: The Cutest Thing Ever For My Girlie Girl

reviewText: My 2 year old daughter loves this purse!  She even plays with the stuff inside.  A good toy for the price!  Great for her imagination, and funny to see how she must view me... searching for my phone in my purse.
We got this purse for our daughter's 2nd birthday.  She loves it!  She carries it around on her arm like a pocket book.  Very very cute.  This is a simple toy, no electronic anything.

This is a great purse for my 15 month old girl who loves playing with my wallet and lipstick while riding in the shopping cart.  All the pieces are the right size for her little hands and she loves walking around with the cellphone and keys and "putting on" the lipstick.  Some of the pieces were lost easily as most of her things get misplaced but overall I'm very happy with this!  Oh, and my daughter loves it,too!

I got this for my 18-month old great niece, because she is such a girly-girl.  She just loves taking everything out and putting it back, saying "hullo" on the phone, putting lipstick on everyone else, and "using" her debit card.

My daughter is now 2 and has had this for about 6 months.  She LOVES it.  All you have to do is say you are going shopping and she runs to get her purse.  She knows how to look in the mirror and put on her lipstick.  She talks on the cell phone.  The purse is also big enough that she can fit in other small toys for a shopping trip.  It makes her feel like a big girl and it is so so so cute to see her walking in the mall with her purse on her arm.  Highly recommend this purse for your little girl.

My daughter recieved this purse as a gift and we found it was missing some of the pieces. Since the pieces were sealed in a bag, it was a clearly problem from the manufacturer. When we went to exchange it, we found all of the purses on the shelf were missing at least the mirrors! Pretty bad quality control, if you ask me. We ended up stuck with an incomplete toy... pretty dissapointing.

Bought this as a gift for niece based on reviews.  It is a cute toy, but I feel that putting a play lipstick as a toy is questionable since this is for toddlers. Do we really want to be teaching our toddlers that they need to be wearing lipstick?  I know girls like to mimic their moms, but I think it would have been more appropriate to include a checkbook or notepad and pen, or even a little stuffed animal instead.  There will be plenty of time for makeup without pushing it on a toddler.
I bought this as a gift for my friends 3 yr old daughter.  I like this so much that I'm going to go back and buy it for my daughter too.
Got this for my daughter and she loves it. She takes it every where with us. It's easy for her to open and close it and its just to cute.
I adore this mini purse as she was styling and profiling with this one. Great service and delivery and a great buy. 5 star! www.chitownnista.com

Probably not suitable for my 12 month old, im sure she will eventually love it. Good quality, no chocking hazards. She loves to pretend put lipstick on her bunny. Good product, worth the few dollars spent on it.
Very cute and just as expected. Perfect for my friend's daughter as a Christmas gift. She played with it a lot.
summary: My girlfriend's three year old loved it!

reviewText: Got this for my 1 year old niece for her birthday. She LOVES it. She would always want to get into my purse in church... Now she has her own :)

I love this pocketbook.  My daughters had been given this pocketbook when they were young and loved playing with the bag and accessories for years. They loved pretending and bringing the pocketbook out and about.  I recently bought the pocketbook for a friends daughter.  It is a great toy for kids!
We got this as a Christmas present for my daughter and she loves it.  It has all the essentials 9Just like Mommy) she carries it around with her everywhere.  So glad we got it!
It wouldn't be my first pick again. But my three year old is okay with it, for about an hour, so you get what you get..
My daughter got this purse for her second birthday, she loves the lipstick and the keys. great toy great price
I bought this for my daughter's 2nd birthday. She carries it everywhere "talking" on her little phone lol. An absolute winner!!

What a wonderful little purse for my grand-daughter. She loved having her own purse just like mummy. The lipstick, keys and phone are being well used. The purse goes everywhere with her and is a perfect size for an 18 month year old. Highly recommend.
My two year old granddaughter loved this purse!  She had to carry it around everywhere she went for weeks...  She felt so grownup!!
this was a gift to my granddaughter for her first birthday.  she loves it and plays with it all the time.  has more fun things to play with than the fischer price one and costs less too.

"What is thaaaat?!?" That was the shriek exclaimed by my 2.5 y/o when she opened this up on Christmas! She is so super excited about this purse set... She loves the credit card, phone and "Chapstick (lipstick)" the most. The size of the enclosed items are. Perfect for a toddler. The price was really good, too. We are definitely very happy with this purchase. Oh, for those who may care, the mirror that came with her set was yellow vs the shown blue, just FYI.
I haven't opened it yet but it looks really cute.fast delivery also!cant wait to give it as a gift to my 2 year old shes going to love it!

This is a great 'first purse' for any little girl. Durable, with items every girl wants 'just like mommy'. Great price, too.Not really educational, but that's not why one would by this.  It's fun, it's a toy, and it will make your little one smile.
summary: Terrific starter for a little girl

reviewText: My one year old daughter loves this. I was surprised she plays with it so much. She plays with the individual items and the purse and everything as a whole. We didn't get her much for her bday, this was it, but she played and played with it.

I bought this for my friend because her 2 year old was taking her older sister's purse.  She loves it.  It's really cute how it has all the stuffings of a purse...a DEBIT card? AWESOME!It's nothing fancy, but for the price it's worth it.  The phone doesn't make noise, and the lipstick is fake and doesn't change.  But the kid loves it.  I recommend this.
A purse just like mom's with everything in it: lipstick,compact,etc. credit card and cellphone. Very entertaining for little ones.

I purchased this for my 2 1/2 year old daughter for Christmas.  She never really had much interest in my purse...but immediately loved carrying her little purse around.  I think all toddlers love any sort of container to put things in!  She walks up to our doors and pretends to use the keys and pretends to put the lipstick on herself as well as her little brother, daddy (such a good sport!), and mommy!  The phones buttons do not push in at all...which is somewhat disappointing to me...but she doesn't seem to mind...she still calls her cousins to say hello!  Would definitely recommend!
This so cut and holds all the things little girls love to play with.Some thing great to child to take in the car.
Most little girls love their mommy's purse so this is a great idea.  It looks just like the real thing and the items included are realistic enough.  Very cute and I would recommend it.
My daughter thinks she's using a real credit card with the little fake one that comes with this set.  She plays with all the stuff in this set quite often.  Nice cheap gift that she keeps using.

This is a great purse for little ones.  I bought it for my daughter's first birthday.  She is obsessed with purses and bags, so I thought she would like having her own.  She absolutely loves it.  She loves taking all of the things out of it, then putting them back in.  After she gets everything in it she puts it on her arm and says, "Bye bye!"  I chose this purse over other "first purses" because she likes putting them on her arm/shoulder.  This one looked more like a REAL purse and looked like she could put it on her arm.  She can, and she loves it!

I bought this for my 2 year old cousin. She has a habit of taking her mothers purse and walking all over with it so I figured it would be perfect. When I first saw it I fell in love with the soft material and girly colors and she absolutely loves it. She always remembers to put her things in her purse so she can be "just like mommy."

My sister gave my daughter this purse for her first birthday.  I didn't know what to think of it because it was smaller than others that I have seen and it didn't play music, but in hindsight, I think that is what makes this so great.  Since it is smaller and light weight my daughter can easily carry it around and play with it.  She loves putting everything in and taking it out.  She also  loves that she can take the credit card in and out of the wallet and that it makes noise when it is in the wallet.  This has become one of our favorite toys.  We take it to dinner, church, pretty much anywhere and it always keep our daughter entertained.  I can not say enough good stuff about it.  At 18 months she still loves it and when our neighbors come over their 4 year old loves it too.
It was okay. I bought for my 16 month old and I was a little disappointed that the phone didn't do anything, not press numbers, nothing. Pocketbook was cute. All a little cheap looking.

I don't know what it is about this little purse but my little girl loves to play with it.  She pretends to put on the lipstick and even has her own debit card.  She's had plenty of purses (she's 4 1/2 now) but seems to enjoy playing with this purse in particular.  I think it's a good choice for any small girl who wants to be like mom!
summary: Daughter had other purses but loves this one!

reviewText: I bought this for my friend's three year old daughter and she absolutely adored it. It's been about a month since then and my friend said her daughter still can't leave the house without it! For the money, this gift is perfect!
This is a X-mas present for my 22-month old granddaughter.  I'm sure she is going to enjoy it, as she likes to put things in a container and takes things out.
This is a wonderful toy for my future step-daughter.  She absolutely loves purses and this one is perfect for a little person, very well made and lots of little surprises inside.  PERFECT!

I have purchased this two different times for 18-month-old girls. Both moms mentioned they couldn't keep their daughters out of their purses, so I found this on Amazon. Both girls loved them and carry them everywhere they go. They now have their own purse and the grownups' lipsticks, keys, cellphone, etc. are safe!
Absolutely  adorable,  and  perfect  for  my  little  diva!
summary: Absolutely adorable, and perfect for my little diva

reviewText: The purse is just right size for a 2yr old to carry. The only complaint is that wallet is hard plastic and difficult to open for small hands. Otherwise it contains lots of fun items, just like Mom's

I bought this for my 20-month old daughter for Christmas, and she enjoys carrying the purse around and taking things in and out of it.  I suspect that it won't be too long before she prefers to have a phone she can push buttons on and some lip stuff she can actually apply, but it is a nice plaything for now!
summary: Nice plaything for the very young

reviewText: The kid played with this for a bit but was over it quick.  I always rate toys on their lasting ability.  Gave it three stars b/c its a cute idea that may work better for others.
This item came quickly and my 3 yr old granddaughter loved it.  It contains all the items she thought were to be in her purse.
My daughter loves this.  Everything is big for small little fingers.  We love IT!!!

Our 1 1/2 year old daughter loved this. Like many toys she puts them down then picks them up again one day anew. The biggest hit was the purse which was the right size for her little hands and easy enough to open with the velcro clasp. She was into the mirror for a little while, and the cellphone to some extent (she prefers real electronics!) but she still plays with the lipstick and little change purse to this day! Also, it has proven very durable (she is 2 1/2 now).
summary: Don't underestimate how fun this is!

reviewText: My one year old girl got this for christmas. She loves it. She acts just like a big girl. She even takes it with her when we go shopping.
no hard parts or chokables.  My daughter loves this cute purse. Especially the lipstick and keys.  They make her feel like a grown up!
BUYING CHRISTMAS FOR MY GRAND CHILDREN.AM PLEASED WITH THIS PURCHASE
summary: a great little girls first purse

reviewText: This was a Christmas present for my 2 year old daughter. She loves playing with my purses so I wanted to get her a "purse" of her own.
