The purse came with all the pieces listed and was inserted into a larger plastic piece that can be taken apart and used as 2 separate purses. It's adorable and my daughter loves playing with the keys and pretending to put on her lipstick. The price was great and I think this was a great buy especially compared to what is in the stores!

Purchased for my 2 yr old granddaughter.  She hasn't put it down since she opened it.  Perfect for playing "mommy"! Complete with lipstick, cell phone, debit card, keys, mirror and wallet!  What more could a little girl need!

My almost 2 year old niece liked this but wasn't overly excited with it.  She seemed to love the purse, but I think she already had a better phone where the buttons actually made noise.  Overall it was OK.
summary: Niece liked it but didn't love it

reviewText: Got this for my Great Niece who is into all the stuff this purse comes with. She carries it around with her cause she is a "big" girl now...cell phone and everything.
This was a Christmas present for a little girl and she loved it.  Had fun checking out all the stuff inside.
This is a little girls dream. It has everything a little girl could want just like mom's. She carried it all around the house.
Great bwst gift for my daughter.
My granddaughter loves her My First Purse. She's already starting to add other things to her purse. She loves the little debit card.
bought this for a one year old and she loved all the pieces. I would recommend it for a child under two.

i gave this to our 18 month old little grand daughter.  She loves it.  It goes everywhere with her.  It took her 30 seconds or less to discover the play lipstick and she knew immediately how to put it on!  She loves the phone and keys.  She loves this.
summary: Our little girlie girl loves this.

reviewText: This was perfect for my granddaughter's 1st birthday!  The purse is so soft, easy to carry, and she can play with the accessories as she gets older.  Even the adults were ooohing and aaahing!  Highly recommend.
My almost 2.5 year old loves this purse. We got it for her this Christmas and she carries it around everywhere. The transaction was smooth and we got it on time.
This is such a cute toy.  Everything is well made and enticing for a little diva!  I think it makes a great present!

Bought this for 12 month old boy.  He loves it.  I added play dollar notes to the purse - this made the purse open more easily - in fact it wouldn't shut so worked well.  the opening in the top is adequate for him to take out and put in items.the credit card was a big hit as it looked or at least felt like a real one....  the lipstick was nicely large so easy for him to manage to" put it on".  This was a lot more suitable for a toddler  than the fisher price version that i bought for his sister. He was very happy with phone and didn't seem to need the buttons to work as was suggested in one review.Overall this is really good and while I am sure there is something that could be improved on ( maybe the way the purse opens)  it is pretty good as it is and price ok too.  Another bonus it had no manufacturing faults
Bought this for my 2 year old granddaughter.  She loves it!  Perfect size for her and she loves to carry it around with her and act like mommy!

I BOUGHT THIS PURSE FOR MY DAUGHTER WHEN SHE WAS 14 MONTHS AND STARTED SHOWING INTEREST IN MIMICING ME WHEN WE WOULD GO OUT.THIS PURSE IS PERFECT BEACUSE WHEN WE GO OUT SHE WEARS IT ON HER SHOULDER SO IT IS JUST THE RIGHT SIZE,ALSO THE ACCESSORIES ARE GREAT TO KEEP HER BUSY.I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TOY FOR PRETEND PLAY FOR ALL THE LITTLE LADIES OUT THERE.

reviewerName: D. Miller "Live, Love, and Laugh, everyday!"
reviewText: very nice first purse for a little girl. My granddaughter will love it, I am saving it to give to her for Easter.
My granddaughter loves this purse!  It has all the "adult" items in it, lipstick, credit card holder, mirror, etc.  She looks so cute walking around with it on her arm.

My two year old daughter loves this purse.  She takes it everywhere.  We travel a lot and she takes this with her.  I put a few crayons in the credit card holder because she loves coloring and is always thrilled to find them.  The lip stick is so cute, because she will even put it on her stuffed animals.  She talks on the phone all the time.  It takes her awhile to get everything out play with it and then put it back in.  Overall, this is a great toy for on the go kids.  I have her "pack it" before we leave home.  Everything fits nicely and she carries it herself very proudly.
summary: Great for travel or dinner out

reviewText: My niece face-timed me personally, she's 3, to thank me for the most "awesome" gift she has ever received in her life! lol Good buy! Thanks again!
summary: So many items for a fair price!

reviewText: We bought this for our 18-month old daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it!  It is one of the few toys that still has her attention.  She loves to carry it around with her. It is soft sided, lightweight, and the perfect size for toddlers!  My 10-month old neice also loves to sit and play with it, by taking out and putting back all the girly "essentials".  Cutest little toy ever!!
summary: A must have for little girls!!!

reviewText: We bought this for our neice for Christmas, she's two years old and loves to act "grown up".She carries this purse everywhere with her and loves playing with the toys that come inside.GREAT GIFT & well worth the money!
summary: great gift for the girly-girl in your family!

reviewText: Cute purse- daughter likes it and the plastic seems to be thicker than others offered.  Phone is generic- buttons do not press down or so anything special, but we have other she can use in its place.  Overall, for price, serves its purpose.  With free shipping, I would recommend as I see it $2 higher in other stores.

This little purse is the cutest thing. Even after reading good reviews, we love it even more than we imagined. Our 20 month old plays with it all the time - loves taking the things in and out of the purse and does the same with the credit card by taking it in and out of the wallet. It keeps her happy and busy for quite a while. All of it is the perfect size for her to hold and use and there are no safety worries. She loves to carry it around and take it with her when we go out. We think the phone is perfect for the purse and is made to be used with their incredible imaginations. Forget the electronic ones that are heavier, noisier and need battery replacement. This one is nice and quiet, she makes her own sounds and uses it just like any other phone. It actually keeps her attention longer than the other ones she has since she is doing her own thing with it. I happily recommend this!
summary: LOVE IT ... all of it, even the phone!

reviewText: Too cute.  All the little girls must have one.  Mobile is a bit large for todays technology.  No small pieces, it's all good.  They should send them home from the hospital with one!
My niece loves this little purse with all the items that go in it. She walks around caring her little purse just like her mom's.

My 2 years old likes this toy very much. I bought it for her on her big sister birthday because we bought Barbie "Fun On The Go" Electronic Purse Kit. So the little one still can play with her own toy just like her big sister.  She likes it very much, even to wake her up in the morning, we teased her with telling that we could not find her purse. She immediately woke up and show us where the purse is.

My kids liked this and have fun playing around with it, the only thing I felt was the price could have been better. Saw it much cheaper at Walmart not too long ago and then believe it or not at the dollar store.However, the product itself is durable and nice, not kids hazards jumping right out or frail designs.
I sent this to my great niece for her third birthday.  It was a hit.  It is great to keep up with the next generation with gifts that are appropriate.  This one was perfect.

First off, we thought at first this was an absolutely great product. Our daughter loved it the moment we gave it to her. BUT, the phone's buttons don't push down, the debit card has a sticker on it so for a teething 2 year old that is simply not cool. Also the stitching has already popped on one of the handles of the purse, so the baby can now eat stuffing if she wants. She only has played with it a handful of times. This really wasn't well made, and I almost wish I could get a replacement. I think if you have a young kid under the page of 14 months this would be fine, but those who will actually play with it, walk around, or use it as they're supposed to it just won't stick with them.
summary: Eh, you get what you pay for...

reviewText: This was a present for my daughter's first birthday.  She still may be a little young for it, but loves to carry it around the house.
I bought this as a gift. The items inside looked cheap and so did the purse it came in. I was very disappointed. Did not give it away as a gift like I had planned.

Fun. The products are easy to hold and use. The mirror is of decent quality. The wallet is a little hard to open for a 2 year old though. That would be the only criticism. The phone doesn't make any noise. The lipstick is big enough that you probably won't have to worry about them swallowing it. I got two for my nieces and they both enjoy carrying it around and using the lipstick and talking on the phone....
summary: Great for a 2 year old girl

reviewText: I was planning on getting this for my daughter for Christmas, however she ended up getting it from my sister for her birthday. She absolutly loved it and had so much fun "getting ready to go shopping". I agree with the reviews about the cell phone being a little too cheap. I think the buttons should at least be able to be pressed and make some kind of noise. I plan on getting her another toy cell phone. But she loves it and I would recommend this to someone for their little princess.
my 2 year daughter loves her purse! she plays with all the little toys that came with it so its an added plus!

I got this for my 2 year old for Christmas, and my 4 year old unexpectedly got a different purse set for Christmas as well. The other purse set is based on a licensed character, but seems so much cheaper than this one. The items in this purse set are durable and fun, my 2 year old takes her phone everywhere! The only thing I might change is I wish the phone buttons made some kind of beep or squeak when you press on them, my 2 yo continues to be confused that the buttons don't do anything. But she loves it anyway.
"Wallet" is like a change purse and my daughter cannot open it.  Phone does not have pushable buttons.  Otherwise, okay.

I bought this for my half-sister for Christmas and she loves it. She was grabbing her parents' and grandparents' pocketbooks all the time until she got this. She had it on her arm right away and didn't take it off the rest of the day.

I bought this for my niece as a birthday gift. I thought it was pretty cute how it came with keys and a credit card! You know how kids are they always want to play with Mom or Dad's things so this kept her way from my cousins things. She really liked playing with them.

My granddaughter likes to play with purses, so she had fun with this one, but when she was taking things out for the first time, she was excited about the cell phone, but quickly put it aside when nothing on it moved or worked. We'll get a play cellphone with sound at another store to put it, which is what kids are looking for these days. It was ok for the price.
Nice girly xmas present for a little girl that wants to be just like mommy.  She really liked it and plays with it all the time.

I was a little disappointed in this purse. Gifted it to a little girl who just turned 3, and she LOVED the wallet, debit card, and lipstick. The purse itself was covered in a hard plastic that made it look still packaged, and the phone was pretty substandard. Because the buttons wouldn't press in, she kept trying to see if she could get candy out of it!
summary: Can't press the buttons on the phone

reviewText: I got this for my 21-month-old niece and she loved it! I actually had the same purse when I was little. This set is great because it is probably one of the only ones that doesn't sing, or dance or move, which she sometimes gets scared of. It is very realistic. The only thing is that the buttons on the phone doesn't move, which she really would like, but she still "talks" on it all day long! She loves it as much as I did back in the day.
summary: No lights, no sound, NO PROBLEM!!!

reviewText: My last granddaughter and she loved it.  She still plays with it and she is three years old.  She especially loves her charge card.

My niece is a precocious 3 year old who loves real cell phones, etc. She really loved this purse with all the little toys. They are a great size too, with her little hands. I got this for her for Christmas and she had a blast.

This is a good first purse for a baby/toddler. I bought it for my daughters 1st birthday bc she was just starting to get curious about things in my own diaper bag. She likes to take things in and out and she loved the lipstick until it went missing after we brought it to a friends house. Ive been trying to find a replacement lipstick, but havent found anything out there close to the same thing. It would be cool if the phone did something. Like I said, its a good first purse, but we will be upgrading soon.
On Christmas my little sis was like what's this she hated it I would not buy this buy it for like little girls who have emagination waste of 30$ :(

I bought this purse for my friends daughter when she was not even 2, and a year later she still plays with it!!! She takes it everywhere and she does not touch Mommy's lipstick anymore :)), because she's got her own. She carries it around with a Very Important look on her face,saying: "I am going to work!"I am planning to buy this one for my cousin's daughter and another friends daughter!!! I have a 2 year old son, so I wish they would make something like this for the boys, like a briefcase or something, because there is something about Mommy's purse that attracts them all :))

IT Is MUCH cuter and well made than one could tell from the picture!!! The purse itself is a wonderful good size, made of beautiful well-stitched felt. The "treasures" inside are darling. All in all, it`s a PERFECT gift for a new baby girl of "accessories to look forward to for toddler times": little jelly clear shoes, socks in many colors and styles, hair bows, a hat...I can`t WAIT to give the basket of these to her parents, then eventually see her wearing them. Anyone who wishes may copy my idea, and DON`T leave out the marvelous MY FIRST PURSE, well worth it`s price!!!

My daughter really enjoys playing with this toy. It's durable and safe. It is smooth and has no funny smells or anything. I gave it 5 stars for educational because why not? All young ladies need to learn to take care of themselves and their things--especially their purses. :) She is learning how to pack her purse and carry it with her and copy mommy. We love it!
My great granddaughter was surprised and pleased with her new purse.  She carried it with her all day and used her "cell phone" to order things.  Thanks so much for making a 3-year old so happy!ī
summary: My great granddaughter was surprised and pleased with her new purse

reviewText: My two year and six year girls love their purses and all the things that come inside. They even play "people" with my four year old son and put all the stuff they can find that will fit into the purse and go about with their imagination.
A very feminine two-year old got it for her birthday, was very pleased, but was disappointed that the phone didn't work. I think more effort should be taken to look like a "real" purse.

Our granddaughter knew exactly what each item was and proceeded to line her lips with her lipstick.  She was already to go on her way with her purse upon her arm.  Very cute items inside and perfect for playing.

I bought this for my daughter, Kaylee, for her first birthday. I couldn't resist I had to give it to her early. Even though she is alittle to young for it, I could tell she liked it. She pulls everything out and puts it back in...over and over again. And when I grab my purse, she gets hers. It's adorable. My only problem with it is the toys inside the purse look really cheap. And there is no way that my daugter could open the carrying case, it is to small. But all in all after having a 4 year old boy, buying alittle purse and watching my daughter play with it, I cant help but love it!
This is adorable.  The fabric of the purse is nice and soft and the little items inside are cute.  I like the size of it as well.  Not too large, not too small.  My granddaughter will love it.

Got this for my toddler granddaughter back in March.  She still enjoys playing with it.  She likes makeup so this was so cute for her.  Seems to be made sturdy enough.  Had to be careful with lipstick size (since she puts everything in her mouth). Of course it is not real...just hard plastic.  But the lipstick is kind of big.  Was packaged very well.

Gave this as a gift to a 16 month old little girl!  The phone and keys are a big hit and helped keep her busy on a plane flight.  When the family gets dressed to go out she grabs her little purse to be like mommy!  It's perfect for pretend and helps keep the real phone and keys in Mommy's purse!
summary: Every little girl needs her first very own purse!

reviewText: My two year old daughter got this purse as a present and loves it! Super cute!
The child I gave it to loved it, she carries it around all the time.  Cool toy for the Mommy mini me girly girl.
My Grand Daughter LOVES this purse! She has it with her everywhere she goes. It has enough items to keep her busy and she is so proud to pack it up when Mommy takes her places. She's 18 months!
Not as nice as expected very flimsy and cheap.  Not really a gift that you would want to give to your child

Colorful and cute, but a bit boring.  Cell phone that comes with it is huge and outdated style.  The buttons cannot be pushed and have no sound. Make-up compact case does not open.  Lip stick does not turn. So my daughter 1 1/2 years old has got bored with this toy quickly.  I must say it was a waste of my money even though it was very cheap.  I do not recommend this toy to other parents with daughters.
I bought this purse for my two-year-old niece and she absolutely fell in love!!  She wouldn't let it out of her sight and even sleeps with it now!

This was a gift for my youngest one and she really loved it...far better than grabbing my wife's purse and running around with it, dropping everything out.  If you have a young daughter who is into taking purses (little purse snatcher!) and creating havoc, this is a great gift for her!

This purse was a Christmas gift for our daughter when she was 1 1/2.  A year later the purse is still in great shape and she LOVES to take it everywhere with her, even offering to pay for gas at the gas station with the 'debit card.'  This has been a great 'pretending toy' for her, and she carries around all sort of goodies in the purse.  It is a perfect size for her and the toys included in the set introduce some initial fine motor tasks such as opening the wallet or manipulating objects such as the keys or phone.  Overall, I would highly recommend this product, the toy is durable and price reasonable.
I gave it to my granddaughter for Christmas.  She has a great time taking things in and out and talking on the "Cell phone."  Perfect for her age.

(This review is based on the feedback I received from my sister, mother of my 3 year old niece i purchased this for)MY niece loved this item!  She's at the age where she is getting interested in her moms personal belongings, beauty stuff, and purses.  So when she received her OWN purse with the fake goodies inside, she was very excited.  The quality is great -- and the amount of items that come with the gift is awesome, especially considering the price.  A great buy for little girls who want their own girly stuff.  I'd say this product could go for $20-30, so its a great buy.  Shipping was quick too..

I bought this for my 2 year old neice for Christmas. As soon as she opened it she put it on her arm and carried it around while she was opening all of her other presents. She loved the phone and everthing was a perfect size for her.

Our daughter is the youngest and has 2 older brothers.  Finally she is playing with a "girl toy".  She loves to put all the stuff in, makes calls, and use her "credit card".  She is only 2, but enjoys the purse very much and the boys aren't allowed to touch it.

We love this purse!  I'd give it TEN stars if I could!!!  My daughter has not stopped playing with it since it arrived!  It is even nicer than I hoped for and all of the accessories are of very good quality.  I was impressed.  It is the last thing she plays with before bed and the first thing she grabs when she gets up.  No matter what she is going, the purse comes along.  It is also made of a material that easily wipes clean.  An excellent buy, no regrets at all!!!  I would HIGHLY recommend this to anyone who wants to spoil their toddler a bit :)

I bought this for my daughter when she was 15 months old when she started showing an interest in Mommy's purse.  She is now 27 months old and still plays with it all the time.  She loves everything that came in it!  I searched and this was by far the best purse for a toddler that I could find and the price is great too!

My 2-1/2 year old granddaughter absolutely LOVED this little purse and all its accessories. The items are a nice size for her hands and all fit nicely into the Velcro-fastened purse. I was very pleased with the purchase and would recommend it for others.

This was my daughter's favorite gift for Christmas, and she has to carry it everywhere.  She really likes the play phone and debit card.  The hardest thing is keeping track of all the pieces, but that's part of what she enjoys most.  The plastic lipstick broke in two, but she still wants to carry it around.

In theory this is a great toy, but the manufacturers skimped on the quality.  It would have been nice if the lipstick went up or down or made clicking noises.  Also, the cellular phone does not make any sounds at all and the buttons do not depress.  If these features were improved, it would make for a better toy.
summary: Not as good as I thought it would be

reviewText: My 15 month old daughter loved when I gave her this . She always tried to carry my pocketbooks around, so when she got one of her own, she tried to put evrything in it. She especially loves the cell phone. It makes her feel just like mommy
Everything is made of good quality, and works great. I really like it and am happy with this buy. My daughter loves it too.
My 19 month old great niece loves her little purse, especially the cell phone. She hangs the purse on her doll stroller (like her mom does with her own purse) and takes it wherever she goes. :o)

My 3 year old daughter enjoyed this for about 10 minutes and then never touched it agaain.  DO not recomend it as it is nothing like a real depiction of a womans purse.  Sorry but I would spend it on a candy bar first.

I had this on my daughter's wishlist, and she got it from a friend right before her 3rd birthday.  The purse itself is good, and the stuff like the debit card/wallet and lipstick are cute for her, but the keys and phone, the stuff she'd normally love, are really aimed at the 1yr old crowd.  I figured it'd be a bit more, since it was for 2 and up, but there's nothing there that I'd have a problem giving a baby.  We have a fun phone that swap for her, and saw some electronic keys at target I'm going to replace those with.  So, overall, not bad, but I wouldn't get it for an older toddler/preschooler.
I purchased this for my little granddaughter for her third birthday.  She loves carrying it around and pretending to put on her make-up and talk on her cell phone.  I was a good choice.
This is pretty cute for the price.  A bit cheaper in quality than the small picture makes it look, but for the price, it serves it's purpose.  My 2 year old niece loves it!
I got this as a Christmas present for my niece and it was a big hit.  She loves to carry it around everywhere she goes.  She even wanted to take it to bed.

This is a fabulous toy. I bought it for my daughter when she was 15 months old and she plays with it all the time. Whenever I am looking for a toy to take to a restaurant, friends house etc, this is the one to entertain her. Everybody asks where i bought it from. You have to get one!
It was a gift for my 1 year old granddaughter and she absolutely loved it.  She carries it everywhere she goes.
summary: Great gift for my 1 yr old granddaughter

reviewText: We got this for my daughter's second birthday and she loved it so much that she showed it to EVERYONE at least 4 or 5 times!  She really enjoys it and likes to take her purse with her.  My only concern is that the lipstick some how came apart where it was glued.  We just glued it back together with super glue.  It may have been a choking hazard.  Overall it is a very fun and cute little purse!

I bought this for my granddaughter who is 15 months old. She liked the keys, mirror, lipstick the card holder is too hard yet for her to open. She rather have our cell phones cause the buttons you cannot push down. I ordered another type of phone that makes sounds, dialtone, speaks to you, etc. she likes it. The purse she carries all her items in now.
I bought this for my one year old niece.  She really loves it - especially the phone and lipstick.  Good quality toy.  Would buy again!
This is a good product. I bought this for Charity but then I decided to order few more. My friend's daughter loved it.

I purchased "My First Purse" for my 2 year old grandchild.  She was delighted with the purse.  She carried the purse everywhere.  Now she could be just like her big sister with a purse of her very own.I think this would be a great gift for any little girl.

My daughter wanted a toy cell phone, (911 dispatchers probably wouldn't agree its a good toy, but oh well) so I got to looking and I got this set for just a little more than just a phone would have cost.  She loves all of it and carries it around the house, she just turned 4.  Great product for the price, I would recommend it.

The purple purse ended up being much nicer than I expected! I wish the phone had buttons that could be pressed and the lipstick had a lid, but my daughter really enjoys taking all the stuff out and most of all carrying the purse around.

When my then 16 month old snagged my purse and scattered it's contents one too many times I bought her this purse, and she LOVES it!  Four months later she still looks for it every time we leave the house. I would take the phone out for under three, it just looked like it make produce small parts if broken, but the rest is great.  If you have a little one that wants to do everything mommy does, this toy is a sanity saver.  My daughter loves having her very own purse, lipsick and keys- and she's stopped bugging me for mine (okay- she's cut back!).  Bottom line: Good value, lots of fun.
I purchased 2 of these for my nieces and they love them! They were so happy to have a purse like their mommy.The accessories that came with the purse are too cute!
It is very cute and money well spent for the 11 or 12 dollar purchase, would recommend to a friend
this item was for my 2 yr old Great Grandaughter.she loves girly girly things. Jewelry and dressup is her favorite thing to do.So this little handbag fit in perfectly
I purchased this for a birthday present for a 1 year old and she loves it! Super cute purse for a child

My daughter is 13 months and carries this purse around everywhere.  I thought the cell phone was unimpressive but she seems to love it and pretends like she is talking on the phone with it all the time.
I bought this for my 2 year old niece and she has had so much fun plying with this purse and it's contents! Perfect gift for a little girl who loves to play dress up and pretend!

I bought this as a present for my 3 year-old niece. Seems that it made her older sister quite jealous, and any toy that kids fight over, is a good one... Unless you're the parent.Quality is good, not that cheap dollar store stuff you can find.  I would probably buy this again if there was another young girl in our family.

I ordered this and had it delivered for my great niece since her newborn brother was getting gifts. Her mom, my niece, told me that she enjoyed playing with it but prefers holding and kissing her brother.
My daughter loved it she walks around like me with it on.  All pieces were all there Also. Made me happy
I bought this as a gift for my daughter's first birthday.  She carries the purse around on her wrist, but she's not very interested in the accessories.  Of course she'd rather play with my phone.

Bought this for our neice for christmas and she hasnt put it down since. Pretty durable..but just wish the purse was a little bigger because she likes to stick a few of her other toys in there with it. But other than that..its great.
summary: Bought for my 2 year old neice

reviewText: This does not look like the picture the colors are darker and it looks cheap. I was ultimately not very happy with this gift but for a 2 year old I don't think she noticed.

My daughter received this at Christmas, she was 19 months then, and has not stopped playing with it. She has to have her purse with her everytime we leave the house. She loves playing with the keys and putting on her lipstick. She even puts her play phone in it.

Much cheaper material than I had expected. got it for a child friend, but after it arrived I had to check to make sure there were no toxic materials. I just didn't trust it, very cheap but cute if your little one is very young...

Got this for my almost 2 year old daughter for Christmas. She loves it and carries it everywhere. My only complaint is that the cell phone buttons don't push in or make any sounds, but that doesn't stop her from "calling" people :)

My daughter rec'd this purse for her 2nd Christmas when she was 15 months.  She is now 2 1/2 years and still LOVES it!  I babysit children during the day and they all play with it constantly.  My daughter will take it, her keys, and put her sunglasses on and say "Bye!  I'm going to Walmart, buy sissie more diapers!"  What imagination!

Our daughter is 24 months. I bought this and also sewed her a purse for her birthday, she only plays with this one. In the morning I grab my purse, phone and purse and she grabs hers. This also came in handy n the store the other day. She sat playing with the Compact while I was shopping. The phone is pretend but we are gad. Not all toys need batteries and sounds. She calls her friends on it. I bought her the veggie shopping bag for Christmas.
Very cute for a little girl.  Good for probably a one to three year old.  Accessories are big enough that they aren't easily lost.  The phone would be better if it made some noises.
Got this for my granddaughter. Cute and sturdy. I would have liked the phone and case to function, but it is good for safe play.

I would not have thought much of the item based on packaging but we received this as a gift and it is my 2 1/2-year old's favorite. She loves the thing. It is now one of our favorite gifts to give. I have not heard of any problems and all the parts are sturdy. It is very cute to see how every little girl 'knows' to sling it over her wrist (I don't carry my purse that way..) Although, we are as likely to find trains and matchbox cars inside as we are to find the lipstick. Definately a great little item!

Having a 2 1/2 year old granddaughter coming over for a week, I purchased a few items that I thought she would enjoy. The big hit was this purse. It came complete with a few items that she enjoyed taking out, especially the phone. She carried the purse with her for the whole week. The purse was soft and durable and the items inside were perfect for her age.
Bought for my 15 month old Granddaughter. She thinks it's great. I think her favorite piece is the fake lipstick. It's worth buying.
I purchased this as a christmas gift for my daughter when she was 16 months old. Now, she's 3 and is still playing with it. For the price it's worth buying. All parts have held up so far.
Perfect for a first purse for any little girl.  They love to mimick mommy, and this item has everything mommy would have in her purse.

Every little girl should have this so that she can learn to role model after the bigger girls, young ladies as well as the older ones and you don't have to spend a fortune on making them feel grown up.  A must have for ages 2 and up.
this purse many my grand daughter happy happy it's wonderful to see her call her twin brother on the phone and listen to their conversation....They mimic their parents....lol

I haven't actually gotten to see the product, but I got a call from my sister-in-law and she told me how much her daughter loves her first purse.  She said she carried it quite often and that it was a perfect gift for a 3 or 4 year old girl!
My neice loves it. She really likes the cell phone.  She is so cute with her little purse! She loves the little mirror in it.
I bought this last year for Christmas for my then one year old granddaughter.  She loved it.  She loved all the items that came with the purse too.  I would highly recommend this item.
Not a whole lot to say, my daughter really liked them but they are kinda cheaply made but overall still better than Walmart

This purse is very sturdy and works well for a girl age 2-3, if you don't mind the overtly girly aspect of it (e.g., lipstick and compact). My daughter drags it around outside and in, and it holds up well.

The pieces are big and good for little hands. They are unlikely to be a hazard in my opinion (please make this decision for yourself and your child.) She loves playing with the phone and walking around with the purse on her arm like mommy.
i bought this as a gift for a 2 year old and she absolutely loved it! she played with it all night! fast shipping!

I was disappointed inthis item, as was my granddaughter. The cellphone is cheap plastic as were the other items. The "lipstick" did not open and revolve out of its case to replicate a real lipstick. The cellphone was just apiece of plastic ithout buttons to press. The same goes for the other items. Save  your money and pass on this
My just-2-year-old grandniece loved this little purse set. She put "lipstick" on everybody, and paraded around the house with this little purse draped over her arm just like a little lady. Adorable!

Kidoozie My First Purse was a gift to our 18 month old granddaughter.  I was looking for something to send that was age appropriate but did not need batteries and did not have lights or sounds.  This was the perfect gift!  She loves it and plays with it for hours at a time.  Often enjoys just putting her purse things in and out of the cute purse. Amazon is great as when I ordered it, it was there in two days.  Perfect for the grandma who lives 1000 miles from her granddaughter!
My daughter loved this purse and everything that came with it was durable and lasted over a year. Great idea for a 1st purse for your daughter or grandaughter.

My 18 month old daughter just received this purse for Christmas and she loves it!  It is so cute!  She loves taking the things out and putting them back in.  The purse is a perfect size for her and she loves that she can have some "big girl" things.... a phone, lipstick, a mirror, etc.  She is used to watching mommy or her big sister do things with their purses, so she loves copying us!
I highly recommend this Kidoozie My First Purse for any 3 year old. I gave this as a gift to my 3 year old niece and she loved it. She works around with it all the time. Highly recommend.

I was disappointed in this little item.  My granddaughter bugged me for it and then when it arrived, I found the toys inside to be really cheap looking.  If I had it to do over, I would have purchased only a little purse and then put some little toys inside purchased apart from the purse.

My two-year-old loves this purse. It's very well made, which is fortunate, because she crams everything she can think of into it. It holds the play cell-phone, the lipstick, Lincoln Logs, army men and blocks. Maybe a cookie or two. When we go anyplace, she runs to get her purse, just like I do. Definitely recommend.

It was as advertised and I especially liked the soft surface. It was advertised for a 2 year old up and there was a small item in it. However, I gave it to my 1 year old granddaughter so she could grow into it but instructed her mother about the small item.
My granddaughter loves it & all the adorable goodies inside it.She carries it everywhere with her and happily plays with the accessories.
I bought this for my granddaughter and she loves to go in her mommy's purse.  I looked for a long time before I found the one I liked and it was worth it and she loves it.  Judit
I bought this when I saw it on Amazon. I also bought a book (Lillie's Purple Plastic Purse) to go along with it as a gift for my 2 year old niece. Lots of fun for a little girl.

My 20 month old daughter absolutely loves this purse.  She carries it everywhere and loves playing with the accessories that it comes with.  We actually got it as a gift, and lost it, so I bought it again to replace it because it is so cute and child friendly.
summary: A must have for any little girl.

reviewText: Good

The purse delivery was fast and it was for a Christmas gift and our 2 year old granddaughter loved it...she put it on her arm for the rest of the day and never would take it off except to check her stuff inside.  Her Mom told us she slept with it and the next morning found anything that would fit into it and put it there and carried it around all day...thank you so much!!! Would definitely recommend this for any little girl.

My daughter got this for her 2nd birthday and loves it.  She always carries my purse around so I decided she needed her own.  I have searched all over looking for a good toy purse and this one is fantastic.  She also loves to talk on the phone and I love that this one has a good toy phone included.  She puts her purse in the basket on the back of her tricycle, which is very adroable.
My little niece simply loved the bag! It's light to carry and she loves imitating her mom and me. I like how all the pieces are big so you don't have to worry too much about chocking hazards.

I was very pleased with My First Purse. My daughter received a purse similiar at her first birthday but the items inside were all cloth. She would put them in her mouth and they got dirty and worn. The items in My First Purse are mostly plastic. Great for chewing and no mess!

My daughter does play with this purse occasionally. She is only two so I expect her interest will increase as she gets a little older. She likes to compare the items in this purse with the items in mommy's purse, which she usually obtains unbeknownst to mommy.
this was a big hit with my great neice excellent she carries it with her all over.. recommened this alot

My daughter is 18 months old and it learning about "mommy's purse."  For Christmas she got My First Purse and LOVES it!  She plays with the cell phone, compact (mirror included!), and coin purse and thinks she's all grown up!  She even tries putting it on her shoulder like I do with my purse!  It's so amazing how quickly little girls learn these things and I certainly enjoy watching her play!!

I bought this for my granddaughter, because I saw how much another 2-year-old loved it.  It's great for fill and dump, as well as being a pretend purse, so she doesn't have to get into Grandma's purse.  Also a good carry-along toy.  It's definitely worth the money, for the fun it gives a little girl.
This was a BIG hit with my two year old niece.  Highly recommend it. Great for a birthday or Christmas.
summary: Soft products that mimic Mommy's purse

reviewText: Purchased this for my 18 month old granddaughter.  She was thrilled with this and carries it everywhere.  I loved all it contained so she could be like Mommy and Grandma! You cannot go wrong with this!

My 4 year old always is mimicing me when I go through my purse or talk on the phone. I bought this as a birthday present for a 2 yr old little girl and she loves it. Wish I found this for my little one when she was 2.
The little ones like imitating mommy and carrying this adorable purse with all its contents.  A hit with all my granddaughters: 18 months to 3 yrs.

The purse was cute but what my niece liked the most was the phone (even though it was just a cheap plastic one) and the wallet with the credit card.  She drove everyone crazy having them opening the wallet up for her.  I'm sure she's got the hang of it by now.
summary: My 2 year old niece loved this!

reviewText: This is very cute for a toddler. It comes with the purse, plastic phone, plastic credit card (which you can write her name on), plastic lipstick, a compact, a mirror and keys. I think the only thing i dont like is the compact, because when my daughter tries to open it, she is going to get extremely frustrated. I have a hard time openeing it myself. They could have made the latches a little easier. All in all.. good little pretend toy.

I choose this rating due to the reaction on my Grandaughter's face when she saw the little purse, especially the pretend lipstick, she walked around putting it on every one, including the dog. If my Grand Daughter is happy then so am I. I liked the purse due to the fact that it is a very sturdy product, a toy that will last for quite a long time.K.D.Wisconsin
Wish there was more to it. She loved it. Put a ton of stuff in it I like my make up ;) lol. Great toy

My 3 yr old just got this purse at Christmas time and she absolutely LOVES it. The purse is well made with a plush handle and vinyl cloth puch. The other pieces are plastic. She loves her keys and lipstick tube the most, with the credit card and coin purse coming in a close second.The phone is cheap, but she has a different one that she uses that makes sounds. The coin purse is hard for her to open, so I normally open it for her - which isn't too much hassle.A great first purse- especially for girly girls like my daughter. She takes it with her everywhere!

I just gave this purse to my niece for her 2nd birthday.  It was a hit!  Out of all her gifts, this was her absolute favorite.  According to her mom, she hasn't let it out of her sight since the party.  She loves putting on her lipstick and talking on her cell phone.  This is an awesome gift -- and, you cannot beat the price!
My daughter loves this toy and she carries her purse around with her everywhere. She enjoys placing all of the accessories into it.

I frequently give this toy as a gift to a one year child.  My girls loved carrying a purse around and putting different things in it.  The stuff from my 7 year old's purse is still around which tells you how durable it is.  I think it encourages roll playing and dress-up.
Our 18 month granddaughter loves this purse.  She carries it around all the time and loves the cell phone and lipstick.  It is perfect for smaller children as everything is durable and safe.

My daughter immitates my Wife and parents when they get ready.She loved using their handbags, and the items inside them.So I brought this for her.Every time my wife or mom gets ready, she opens this big, applies lipstick to her face and lips (My daugther is just 1 year).She loves carrying the bag around with her mom.I just wanted one imrovement, the Mobile looks attractive, but since it makes no Moise, my daughter does not use it.Might be the mobile needs to be replaced with a one that makes some Noise, and kids get attracted to the noise.I wanted to give this a 5 Star, but just the dummy mobile, I am degrading the product to 4 Stars.
summary: Your Daughter Immitates you? Then buy this!

reviewText: I purchased 6 of these as the purse is perfect for toddlers aged 18 months upwards and I have twins with lots of friends who don't like sharing! The fake lipstick is a hit and the credit card get used at their pretend shops. They love these and walk around with them all the time!

Very good cute little first purse with velcro opening, easy to use. Also emailed the company about timing on shipping and they got the shipment to arrive in time, very nice, 3 or 4 day shipment, made my month! Very helpful and the great neice who is 18 months old, just loves the purse...it is the first toy she went for the next morning in her pajamas. Well worth 12.00!!!!!
summary: Great, Lightweight Fun at Good price!

reviewText: I sent this to my granddaughter for Christmas and never heard back or got a thank you or even if my granddaugter received it. I am only guessing that it was all that it was suppose to be. Since I had it sent to myself and I wrapped and sent it to them myself I did get a look at it from outside the box. It looked pretty good quality to me and I would have bought it for my daughter when she was little if they had it then, I would still recommend it as a nice gift as it came in a very sturdy box and everything looked like fun to me.
My daughter was in love w/this for about 5 mins (she's 2)...then she threw everything all over the place & never looked at it again.  Maybe I'll put it away & regift it to her next year.

My daughter had one of these when she was a toddler. It was really sweet and she loved carrying it around and taking the stuff out. I ended up buying one for my step-grandaughter this Christmas. She was thrilled with it and just like my daughter used to do, she had a blast pulling everything out, going through it and putting it all back in. Everything is easy to hold, fun to look at, and just grown-up enough to make them feel like this really is their own purse.
summary: Really Cute Gift for Little Girls

reviewText: I looked at every toddler purse I could find before purchasing this one.  Some fabric purses seemed too much like stuffed toys, while others with more detail were made of cheap plastic.  This is just right for my two-year-old, and the price was excellent!

We bought this for my daughter when we were on vacation so that she would have something to play with on the trip. She loved it!! She was almost two at the time. Three years later and we still have all of the pieces and they are in great condition. This is the cutest little purse!

I gave this 4 stars because after reading all the reviews for similar my first purse toys and doing my own 'hands on' research I thought this would be the best present for our granddaughter's first birthday this coming September.  She will be the one giving the purse it's final "star" rating.

My other niece is highly into  the color purple and is at the age of having a purse with her. The items that were in the purse was just great. She did have to ask what the debit card was (which was cute) but besides that she was very happy with it.

My three year old daughter always makes a rush for mom's purse the moment I get in the door, so I decided to get her this one based on the reviews.The purse itself is very cute, with a fuzzy pink handle. She loves the plastic lipstick, putting it on both her and mommy quite regularly.  The mirror and keys are serviceable as well.The few disappointments come when you get to the wallet and the phone...At three, she is old enough to know that cell phones DO things and she tries to push the buttons on it. It's basically just one plastic piece so  it is frustrating for her as nothing is movable on the phone. I'm not saying it needs to be electronic and beep, but it would have been nice to be able to push in the buttons.As far as the wallet, again, it's just a plastic wallet that closes with a clasp at the top. My daughter found the pronged clasp very hard to open and I ended up having to open it for her every time.Otherwise, it's a fun little beginner purse.
Never received item.  It was not in stock and took way to long to get so had to cancel.  Very disappointed.

...and her soon-to-be 5-year-old older sister seemed like she wouldn't have minded if Santa would have brought her this purse too. Nothing like seeing a little girl's face light up. I'm glad I got this soft and cute purse her for Christmas...(the reviews here helped)! It would be nice, if for even a couple of dollars more, the cell phone had a bell or push button with a tone, ring or something. Nonetheless, it's still a sweet gift and not too bad for the price.
I got this for my 17month granddaughter. She enjoys the toy. She really likes the phone and lip stick. I think she will enjoy even more as time goes on.
I bought this for my 3 yr old. It is very cute and has neat fillers, but it is a bit boring. she played with it for 30 minutes and has not touched it since.
My dauter is 19 months and loved this purse.  We have a hard time keeping the pieces in it, but she loves to take it everywhere.  The lipstick is her favorite.
This it the best purse for a toddler. My granddaughter thoroughly enjoys all the items that come with it.  It is very soft with the perfect size handles for little hands.
My two year old grand daughter absolutely loves it! She loved all the different items which she uses to imitate mom.
My daughter likes this toy, I was disappointed that the little pink phone didn't have push buttons. Other than that the toys is cute.
My 2 year old daughter just loves her purse. Great material and great toy. Very easy to clean and maintain.

My 15 month old granddaughter loved this pocketbook.  She would open it and close it repeatedly, taking the contents out and replacing them.  She would walk around the house with her purse on her arm. Precious!!!

I got this for my 2 yr old on her birthday and she absolutely loves it. she has to carry it with her everywhere. She loves that she can be just like mommy with her own lipstick, keys, and phone. I even added sunglasses. She just has a ball and it looks so adorable.
summary: Great gift for the lil girl in your life

reviewText: The product it self is probably worth the price i pd. I hope the 2 year old i give it to is as excited as i am
Love it! She loves it and has all the little goodies in her bag just like a big lady. Putting on the pretend lipstick is her favorite part.

My daughter loves her purse. Kids in general love phones and keys. My is no exception. I love that the phone does not make noise. She does not play with the lipstick much because she would rather play with mommy's real makeup. She likes to give me my purse and we pretend we are going to the store.
Such the little women when she carries her purse. It's everything you need, in her very first purse! Love, love.

My 15 mo old loves this toy. She carries around parts of it everywhere and she likes to put things into the purse. She gets so frustrated when she can't open the plastic wallet, but her frustration can be really cute. She wants so badly to be able to do everything. She even enjoys the phone, even though it doesn't light up like other play (or even real!) phones.

LET'S FACE IT - WHAT DO ALL FEMALES DECIDE IS A MUST-HAVE, NO MATTER WHAT AGE, YES! A PURSE. THIS PURSE IS REALLY ADORABLE BECAUSE IT COMES WITH KEYS,CELL PHONE, CHARGE CARD AND LIPSTICK.  MY LITLE NIECE AGE 2 FELT LIKE MOMMY AND WOULD NOT GO ANYWHERE WITHOUT IT, USING KER KEYS AT THE DOOR AND HER CHARGE CARD AT THE STORE - SHE LOOKED SO HAPPY AND SO CUTE. FOR THE PRICE, YOU CANNOT GO WRONG - IT IS INEXPENSIVE AND IT GIVES A LITTLE GIRL SO MUCH PRIDE AND JOY.  HOW CAN YOU MISS?

My 2-1/2 yr. old niece absolutely loved this purse!  She said it was just like her big sister's bag.  Her favorites were the lipstick & phone.  My only grip was that the "wallet" was a little hard for her to open at first.  But this was definitely a great purchase - She won't go anywhere without it :)

My daughter got this purse for Christmas last year when she was 18 months old. She is still playing with it all of the time! She loves to take her purse everywhere, just like mommy does! :) She is so proud of her purse that she is constantly showing it to people. Her favorite things out of the purse are the lipstick, keys, and card case. She loves to put her own items in the purse as well. This is a very cute set!
My 3 year old loves to play with purses. This one looks cute and the toys inside seem well made and realistic. She likes to pull her phone out and talk while she walks around with the purse.
summary: A cute purse for my 3 year old

reviewText: I bought this for my niece who was turning 3.  She opened it and had it draped over her arm the entire day.  She especially loved the cell phone, debit card and card holder.  My sister-in-law wanted to know where I bought it so she could buy some for future birthday presents.
I got this for my 2 year old granddaughter as she is always wanting to play with mommies purse, phone, keys, etc.  She has her own now and simply loves it!
IT IS THE BEST FIRST PURSE FOR MY 1 YEAR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER.  SHE LOVES EVERYTHING ABOUT IT.  THE PLAY PHONE, THE LIPSTICK ND MIRROR,  SHE CARRIES IT WHERE EVER SHE GOES. IT IS JUST PERFECT!
I. love. this. purse.  Santa brought it for one of the toddler twins and it's absolutely adorable!!  It was worth every penny.
Just okay, pretty cheaply made, but it was cheap to buy so it was not expected to be great. My granddaughter likes it.
I bought this for my niece's 2nd birthday, she loves to walk around with the purse on her shoulder, talking on her phone.  She loves to imitate anything the grown-ups do and this is perfect for that!
This is a nice gift. It is everything I thought it would be. I bought it as a gift and can't wait to give it to my niece, I think she will like it.
I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend. I was informed that her daughter absolutely loves it, wants to be just like mommy and carry her purse around all the time too! So cute

I purchased this purse for my 18 month old granddaughter for Christmas.  She immediately began unpacking all of the items in it, then repacking them and began a walk around the house, purse on her arm(just like a lady).  The phone is a little lame, because buttons don't depress, but we replaced that with an old cell phone and she happy as can be. She was especially in love with the KEYS and her parents thought the DEBIT card (as opposed to credit) was a nice addition.  What is it about we girls and our purses?
I bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece and she loved it! It's similar to a set my sister and I had when we were little, which made my niece's excitement over it even better.

I was in a hurry and needed an easy little gift for a one year old's birthday. It does say on the tag that it is for 2+ but the pieces inside weren't too terribly small. It came in the mail quick with prime so generally I'm happy and so was the kid. Win win!
summary: Needed a quick gift for a year old.

reviewText: It's cute and simple. You might want to replace most of the items inside with better toys. But it's a lot lighter for my niece then carrying around my giant purse.
My twin cousins loved this! They are not yet two but said "ohhhh" and sighed like they were so elated :)
I thought the phone would make sounds! I thought the wallet pouch would open and close! But my daughter did love the keys! That's about it!

I wouldn't say this is a good purse for a first purse unless your child is old enough to play pretend with other toys.My baby is turning 1 and she does not play much with it's contents. This toy would be better at age 2 or 2.5 years old.My 2.5 year old son likes to say "bye" and pretend to be going out the door with it which is fun to watch.I like it for the pretend play factor because the cell phone doesn't have lights and their is a fake plastic credit card if your kids want to pretend they are going to the store. The keys are a bit flimsy and so is the hard plastic purple case. The mirror is cute, but small. If you are looking for more durable items or items that are functional (the lipstick doesn't move up and down either) then you might want to find a first purse somewhere else. I have yet to find one that will work for us.

My daughter received this purse as a gift for Christmas when she was 18 months old.  She absolutely LOVES her purse!  And, it is so cute to watch her carry it around and act like mommy.Because she loves this purse so much, I rated it a 5 stars.  The main thing she likes is taking everything out.. and back in.  She also pretends to put on the lipstick.. and talk on the cell phone.  And the keys.. love the keys - she tries to open the door with the keys!  And, she loves to put the debit card in the compact case.  She doesnt play with the mirror though..With that being said.. a couple of things to note:-  Most of the items are very durable.. especially the debit card (its not flimsy at all), but the compact case is kind cheap.  Cheap plastic.. and the keys arent as durable as I would like them to be.-  The phone doesnt ring!  I really wish the phone would ring.. or have buttons that make noise.. but doesnt make any sounds at all.  So, I was very disappointed with this fact.Overall, excellent toy.  Highly recommend this toy for any little girl!

Bought it for my 1 year old niece. She loved it and added some of her other little treasures to it. The toys inside are a good size and she loved the keys. The purse has velcro on the top to keep it closed and she needed help to open the purse.
My 3 year old Granddaughter loves this purse.  She carries it everywhere with her.  It made a wonderful birthday gift. A little girl's dream come true.
wasn't what I expected.
arrived in timely manner. grandaughter loves it.  i don't really have any dislikes. its a perfect thing for her to play with and imitate mommy and nanny.

This was bought for my niece for Christmas when she was about 17 months old.  She loved it! She has an older sister who is 4 and kept trying to take the purse away from her.  She was very jealous!  So I would say that this is a toy for a wide range of age groups.  There is a cell phone, lipstick, credit card, keys and of course a mirror.  All of the items are solid and well made, I don't think we have to worry about them breaking.  Plus they are big enough to find if they get misplaced.  Great fun for a little girl.

I normally don't write reviews for gifts I've purchased for others, but I couldn't resist on this one.  My friend (who has a two-year-old daughter) said that she plays with this NONSTOP and loves that her purse is like Mommy's.  Everything is high quality and durable and fit inside the larger purse for easy storage.  I will purchase this again for friends with little girls.
summary: Purchased for a friend, but her daughter LOVES it!

reviewText: This is the cutest little purse I've ever seen.There is nothing like seeing your little one all dressed up and walking though the store with her "big girl" purse, just like mom.It is very well made, too. :o)

I bought this for an almost 2 year old for Christmas and she loves it. I bought another previously for a 2 year old and she wouldn't put it down. Still brings it everywhere she goes. Great gift for a little one who loves to store small things and tote around :)
My 5-year-old great niece thought this was a great gift.  She is a really "girle" girl, so it was perfect.
summary: Big hit with a little girl

reviewText: I bought this purse for my 1 1/2 year old daughter. She had been going thru my purse on a daily basis and I was looking for something that resembeled an adult purse and I found this one! With all the great adult-like pieces that came with, lipstick, compact, credit card etc. she feels like she is playing with an adult item and not a toy! It's saved me a lot of heartache losing items in my purse she would pull out! Now I am able to always find my things as she has her very own purse now! Great item!

Just got this for my little girl's 2nd birthday and she loves it!  The lipstick, phone and keys are her favorite accessories. She's added some of her own as well and likes taking the purse with her on car rides.  The whole thing is really cute.

My almost 2yr old loves playing with my purse, taking my credit cards out of my wallet and especially loves playing with my cell phone so I thought this purse would be the best idea. She opened it christmas morning and she just didnt seem to care about it? The plastic "stuff" inside is pretty lame. Not realistic at all and like another reviewer called it just plain "plastic junk" I think they could have been a little more creative. All the work went into the purse itself. Its too bad though because it was a great idea!
the accessories or big enough for her to hold and safe and the bag is so cute she loves filling it up when we go bye byes.
This is an adorable first purse and my daughter loves to carry it around.  She uses the cell phone and imitates all that she is seeing in the world around her.  Great gift for a toddler.

Our 19 month old enjoys playing with this purse. She enjoys the purse itself, the cell phone, and the lipstick the most. The mirror, keys, wallet, and credit card aren't played with much. The only complaint I have is that she is unable to open the wallet on her own. Trying to open the wallet frustrates her to no end--it's hard for a young toddler to have the dexterity to open such a thing.
My three year old seems to like it enough. I found the reviews a little inflated in comparison to my own experience. I suppose I would purchase again with different expectations.

I was sceptical to order this product for my 3-year old God-daughter particularly because the reviews said the mobile phone could not dial etc, however, I ordered it because she loves bags and mirrors.  It turns out that she loves the lipstick and cell phone more than anything else.  Which means she simply loves the entire gift. She enjoys pretending to be like her mom.  This was a very good buy.  Order shipped to St. Kitts, West Indies.
Fun purse for little girls. They love to be in style just like the rest of us. :)My daughter loves carrying this purse around.

My daughter takes this purse with her everywhere!  She loves being like Mommy, and swings the purse over her arm as we get into the stroller.  The objects that are included in the purse are well made, and they are exactly the kinds of things my daughter wants to carry.  My daughter got this gift a year ago and she still plays with it all the time, though I admit sometimes she totes different objects around, (her little people, Daddy's real keys, etc.)If your child likes to play pretend, this is perfect!
summary: My daughter wont's leave without it

reviewText: I purchased this purse for my niece for Christmas. She had tons of gifts under the tree -- she choose to play with purse only. She loves to pretend. It has great little accessories. Great inexpensive gift.
The purse is great. It has provided hours of fun for my 16 month old. She loves to talk on the phone and put on lipstick. I would recommend this to everyone with a little girl.
But its not bad, just expected something better honestly. Its cute but i dont think this alone is good enough for a gift which is why i got it.
summary: I wouldve payed less at the store for this

reviewText: This wee bag is a stunner and offers so much for very little cost.  The accessories that come with the bag are just brilliant and the bag itself is well made, and constructed of good quality materials.  All of the accessories are exactly what you would expect to find in Mum's bag.Every time my wee girl takes this bag with her (often) to shopping centres people stare and smile and often I hear "what a cute bag" from them.  My daughter is a Dora the Explorer Fan and the decorative flower on the front of the bag is identical to the flower on Dora's outfit - it's the perfect accessory for a wee girl (particularly a Dora fan) and I totally recommend it to anyone.  The size is perfect for wee hands, but plenty of room inside to fit all of the accessories, plus a few others!  Don't delay... buy this product!
summary: Oh My Goodness - this is a MUST HAVE!!

reviewText: My Granddaughter just love this!  She plays with it every time she comes over.  It has everything she needs in it!

The purse is very cute and fun for a toddler girl.  My daughter got it at 20 months and has played with it for a year.  Likes to put things in and out of the purse and pretends to use the phone.  Only thing that would give this 5 stars is if the coin purse actually opened and you could put coins in it.  She is constantly bringing it to me asking me to open it up.

I purchased this for our friends little ones 1st birthday (even though the recommended age starts at 2) and its perfect!!! She is just getting into purses and this has all the accessories she could want included and at a great price!! Very happy with this product
My daughter got this for her first birthday. It was the perfect gift. She loves it and carries it around everywhere.

I bought this for my daughter's first birthday, and she's played with it every day since. Her favorite part is the star mirror, and her second favorite is the phone. It doesn't make sound or anything like that, but this is not an issue as my daughter will use anything as a "phone". In fact, today she carried around an envelope pressed to her ear saying "Hi! Hi papa!". One handle of the purse has come apart slightly at the seam, but it is a great toy overall, and I highly recommend it.
This purse was just perfect for our 15 month old granddaughter.  She loved it and can handle it very easily.
BOUGHT THIS FOR MY GRAND DAUGHTER.  SHE JUST TURNED ONE.  SHE LOVES TOTING IT AROUND ON HER ARM AND DIGGGING OUT ALL THE FUN THINGS IN THERE.
My granddaughter loved this gift.  She plays dress up and loves to imitate her mother so this had everything that she carried with er.  Took it out with her whereever she went.

This was so much fun for my niece, a two year old.  She liked the items so she could be "just like mommy". She loved the purse for other items as well, like carrying her other precious things.  Nice little toy gets a lot of use.

This is a great little purse, and my daughter still plays with it a year later. The design is very cute, but the phone could be better (like if numbers could actually be pressed and perhaps sounds made). When you put all the accessories in the bag, it is pretty full and barely closing. But my daughter has since found a better phone to put in her purse, along with the rest.

We have had this play purse for three years now. Our second daughter is now using it. The purse is very well made and we have not had any problems with the accessories. Both of my daughters love this purse!
A great Xmas gift for my daughter. She loves the credit card holder and phone most of all. The purse is a little small for her shoulder but she still plays with the items
My 1 1/2-year-old received this for Christmas. She likes to carry the purse around and talk on the phone. She doen't really play with the other things in it, but it is still really cute.

I'm really surprised that this is still around. I bought it for my daughter when she was about 2- she's now 11 and her 3 year old sister has inherited this purcse. It has lasted so well. Its very simple and well made.I lvoe toys that make it through all the kids! :)
summary: Very simple and well-made, great toy

reviewText: It's for my daughter she's 4 and deaf, but she loves to pretend to talk on the cell phone even though she can't hear. silly girl. so I decided to buy this. I am sure she will love it. I opened it up to test out the product and see if it was sturdy and good for her. it is! definitely pleased!

This was a brightly colored toy and my baby was interested in it and loves to pull things out of it but the lipstick is too small for my comfort.  Probably they wouldn't choke on it but I removed it because it was questionable.

My 14 month old received this for Christmas.  Prior to this purse, she was hauling her brothers' lunchbags around the house, so we knew she needed something more girly.  She's only had it for two days, but really enjoys pulling everything out of it, and then putting them back in.  I've showed her how to put on the lipstick and she laughs and wants to put it in her mouth instead.  I think she'll eventually get the hang of it though.  My husband thought it was a crack up that a little girl's purse came with the lipstick and debit card.  But, hey, it's realistic and that's what little kids are drawn to.
My granddaughter will enjoy this very much for her birthday.  Nice little present and I love the soft handles on the purse, a very nice touch.
I gave this to a 16 month old and she opened it and didn't put it down for a week. This made her very very happy!

I got this for my 15 month old as she loves bracelets and such so I thought she would love this since she also loves taking things out and puttin them back in.  It entertains her for a few moments but she gets bored with it fast cuz the phone is just hard and you can't push the buttons, she can't get the little compact case open(even hard for me to do sometimes)  maybe as she gets older she will enjoy it more. Not too bad for the price I guess tho.
summary: ok product, perfect for little girls!

reviewText: I chose this rating because when I saw the purse I thought wow how adorable is this?! I would recommend this purchase!
I didn't think my toddler would be too interested in this, surprisingly she was intrigued for hours! Buttons on the phone don't make noise, but she seemed to be fine with that.
Since this is a Christmas present, i cannot attest to wht my grandaughter will think.  But my opinion, it is perfect!  The shipping time was amazing also.

I bought this for my daughter when she was about 14 months, and she really liked it, and plays with it still at age 3.5.  This purse could be enhanced by adding a few features, like snaps, a zipper, and something that buttons, but it definitely serves the purpose!  I LOVE that this is a a"quiet" toy - especially that the phone doesn't ring or beep or talk or anything.  We have a couple toy phones, and this one still gets used - she's "over" the other ones, so this makes it a great toy in my book!
summary: It really is a great first purse!

reviewText: I got this as a birthday gift for my 3 yr old and she just loves it. Takes it with her everywhere.She loved the fact that it came with its own set of contents.Nice concept and quite kid friendly.
This was the perfect toy for my daughter. It has just the right amount if items in it to keep her busy.

I purchased this purse set for my daughter when she was 18 months old.  I am overall happy with the purse and the contents, for the price she has gotten plenty of use out of it.  The purse itself is durable and has stood up to lots of abuse and many outings and shows no signs of wear or rips, tears etc. It can fit all the included pieces with extra room for her own things as well.  The purse has a small velcro tab at the opening to help contain the items and my daughter has never had a problem opening and closing the tab.  The phone all though it doesnt make noise and you cant push the buttons was a big hit with my daughter.  She has many phones that have all the features noise, buttons, camera etc and she typically prefers this one.  We have had the purse set for over a year and she has played most with the phone, then the mirror and keys.  I believe this purse will continue to be useful to carry her things for quite some time.  I have spent a ton of money on toys and such (just like all of you) and considering this is less than $15 you cant beat it.

My daughter just got this for Christmas from Gma and Gpa, and she absolutely loves it! She especially loves the lipstick, and likes to pretend to apply it, just like Mommy. All the pieces are sturdy and good quality. Very cute purse and accessories! I see her enjoying this for a long, long time. Thanks Grandma and Gramps!

I got this for my 2 yr old and she loved it!  I only wished the cell phone could actually make some functional sound - its just a piece of plastic.  Overall everything else was great - she loved the lipstick and everyday pretended to go to work.
summary: Not bad for a 2 yr old

reviewText: My 15 month old started to carry different bags and buckets around the house and putting things in them so I decided to find her a little toy purse.  I opened the box and she had a fit over it.  We are on day 2 and she is still carrying it around the house. It is a toy and it is only $10 so if she likes it for a week, it was worth it.  I do think that it will get used alot and at least I know where to look for my remote control for the TV.

This purse and items seemed to be really cheap online, but I wanted my daughter to have her own purse and felt that even if it was junk to me, she would love it. She loves the purse and everything in it. She plays with the phone just as much as her Vtech phone. The debit card and wallet are sooo cute. I love the material of the bag, it has a leathery feel to it. The toys are also a better quality than I thought. I would buy this again as a gift for other little girls. She also walks around applying and reapplying her plastic lipstick. I don't know where she gets that from. :) The big plus for me is that she now constantly turns over her own bag and replaces the items instead of mine.
my daughter just turned 1 and loves it!  she will sit for hours putting things in and taking them back out.  she loves it and its cute too!

My daughter (who just turned two) enjoys playing with this.  She puts the items into and out of the purse constantly.  She isn't thrilled with the phone, since she has others that make noise (although I don't mind a toy that will stimulate her imagination over time).  Also, she can't open the snap closure on the wallet by herself.  It will help her fine motor skills to practice, though.  It is absulutely priceless - yes, the pun is intended - to here her say "muh-neee" as she carries around her first debit card ;)

I bought this for my 15 month old daughter after seeing her play with a toy purse of a friend of hers.  She loves it!  She loves pulling everything out, pretend talking on the phone, putting on the lipstick and walking around with the keys.  I only wish I would have bought it sooner. We've only had it about a month or so, but it seems to be pretty durable and easy to clean.

I bought this for my daughter at Christmas.  At the time, she was 21 months.  When I first received this purse, I was disappointed.  The items inside seemed to be cheap plastic with no moveable parts (i.e. no buttons, twists, etc.)  I thought my daughter would like it because she was always playing with my purse.  She does play with some of the items inside, like the wallet (which opens and closes) and she puts on the lipstick (this item she loves).  I think she would have more interest in it if some of the items were more realistic.  We replaced the phone with one that has push buttons on it, so she uses it more.  She never plays with the keys because they do not "jingle" like mom's keys to.  All in all, I think this was a cute toy, but for my daughter, the items inside were not realistic enough.

I got this purse for my 22 month old daughter who is constantly in my purse, in my wallet, using my cell phone......a little woman in the making. We got this for her for Christmas and sadly, she has not played with it since then. The phone is basic, no sound, lights, etc. The wallet doesn't open and the purse opening itself was small, which made it difficult for her to take things out or put them back in.
My 15 month old baby loves this purse! She carries it around and 'talks' on the phone all the time! Would highly recommend this product!

My daughter got this purse for Christmas when she was 1 yr old and she loved it. It's very durable and all stays together in the little purse. Now my daughter is 27 mths old and still likes it, but sometimes prefers more realistic things - like mommy/daddy's phone! I think this is a great investment and recommend it for little girls. When she was 1, I was more careful with the lipstick (not that she would swallow it b/c it's nice and fat, but that she would gag on it), but now that she's older (2+), I don't worry about it at all. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is b/c I don't know how old she'll be before she'll stop playing with it. Definitely a good buy.

This is a great purse, very durable. My daughter got a purse like this when she was a year old, she is now 8 years old and the purse has held up great!!! I give this as a birthday gifts to any little girl that is turning a year to 2 years old.
My 25 month old LOVES this!  She just received it for Christmas today.  It is very well made and lots of fun for 2 year olds!

I got this for my three year olds birthday.  She loves it.  Carries it everywhere.  Infact her almost 5 year old sister has ased for one as well.  They both thin it is just great.  My only complaint is that the coin purse doesn't open.  Otherwise it is great!

This was the toy I searched all over for when my 2 year old wanted her own makeup. (Play makeup is greasy and can damage things just as much as real makeup.) This little playset is perfect because the lipstick is plastic, the items are chunky and the purse is sturdy for holding it all. She loved the kit and didn't care that it was all fake-she really liked the "wallet" with her own "credit card"! I would call this a must-have for toddlers who like to pretend to be grown up.
summary: Perfect for little girls too young for play makeup

reviewText: We bought these for our almost two year old twins about six months ago and they are still a hit.  All the essentials they see Mommy using are included - phone, lipstick, mirror, keys, debit card.  These were the first pretend lipsticks I found that were not a choking hazzard.  This is the perfect first purse for any little girl.
My daughter loves this purse. Well made and safe for a toddlers.  She has to take it everywhere.  A great price also.

.....this was purchased for my daughter for her first birthday.  It's very cute, and I can see her playing with it a bit more as she gets older.  Right now she's more into the "take the stuff out of the purse and put it back in" stage, but still......a neat little toy for the lil miss in your life!

I bought this for niece for Christmas, who at almost 15 months was starting to model her mommy and imitate adult roles. She loved the soft purse, and enjoyed the little accoutrements it came with, in particular the mirror, phonre and lipstick. She could of course add whatever else she likes to the small bag. A snack sack? Sunglasses? A small toy? All viable options. It is the perfect size and lightweight soft purse for infants and toddlers. I am pleased she enjoys it. I, personally speaking, wish it had a cuter style or design on the outside as I find the large flower obnoxious but only because I am aesthetically inclined. Your kiddo will love this little purse to imitate mommy on the go, and empower her to feel like a "big girl."
summary: Sweet starter purse for your upwardly mobile toddler.
