reviewText: We got this for our granddaughter and she loves it.  Our little grandson thought it was pretty clever too.  The toys are a nice size for little tots.
I got this for my co-worker's little 2 year old since her mom was expecting a new baby and would be having a baby shower. Both my co-worker & her little girl loved it.
My granddaughter loves her purse and all the contents inside.  She carries it everywhere she goes.  Great gift for a little girl.
My 2 year old loves this purse even more than I expected she would.  It is easy for her to carry and the items that come with it are durable.
My two year old LOVES this purse!  She can not leave the house without it.  This is a great gift for any little girl.  It is worth the money.
The purse itself was fine, but the accessories could have been more realistic.  The phone was especially disappointing .Do not recommend for price.

This is a really cute idea. Its the perfect size and fits everything nicely. My 18month old carries it around everywhere. They phone does not make sounds or anything (I read some reviews where that was their big complaint), but my daughter still plays with it all the same. I think the lipstick is her favorite though. If you have a little one your thinking about getting this for, I would say do it!!
My grand daughter simply loves this purse. She can literally play with it for several hours over the course of a day. I highly recommend this product!

I sent my best friend a birthday present and decided to send her daughter a present too. I got her little girl her first purse with all the goodies that comes with the Kidoozie. I researched a lot of reviews before deciding which would be perfect for her little girl and I found this purse had the best and positive reviews for my choice in choosing this purse. My best friend said, her one in a half little tot is loving her first purse and carrying it with her like mommy. She plays with the compact mirror the most and loves looking into it. She loves the cell phone too and makes cute little baby sounds like the phone is dialing for her and say's, "Hello, Hello!" My best friend little tot has recently becoming a talker too. My best friend has told me that it is so cute to watch her play with all the purse items. Another plus is to this purse she has informed me that the purse items are also perfect in size for a little beginning tot and big enough for no worries of anything getting accidentally swallowed. My best friend little girl is rocking the purse out and having fun with it. She also handed the pretend debit card to the grocery clerk to pay for the grocery shopping. My best friend informed me her little tot just loves her first purse!
summary: All Smiles, 1 1/2 year old is loving this purse especially the compact mirror and cell phone.

reviewText: I bought this for my 2yr daughter for her birthday who wants to be just like her big sister.  The purse was adorable and it came with lots of realistic items to go in it.  Definitely a good buy...
I appreciate the quick delivery and the service, thanks a bunch...the toy however was a bit lame, all though it was worth the price. my daughter (as much as i think it is lame) loves it! lol. thanks!

I bought this for my daughter when she was 16 months old and she just loved it! She takes the purse every where with her it's the perfect size and the pieces inside of it are big so you don't have to worry about them choking on it. I looked every where for a purse like this one, it has a lot of the same items my purse has so she likes to take her lipstick out when I do and pretend she's talking on the phone when I'm on mine. I added sunglass to it so she likes to carry those around in it too. Great gift for a little girl!
My daughter absolutely loves this purse- she takes it everywhere we go. And it keeps her occupied so she isnt digging for my cell phone, lipstick and keys- just perfect!
summary: My daughter loves her first purse!

reviewText: It was the perfect gift for my grand-daughters third birthday. She loves everything that came with the purse and she has room to put extra toys in...which she does.

Like the title says, years later and my girls still love it.  It was a gift for my first daughter, who is now three.  And when her 1 yr old little sister doesn't have a hold of it, my three year old still loves to tote it.  All of the toys are durable.  I don't wear lipstick, so I never knew how much my daughter would LOVE the little lipstick!Don't hesitate.  It's adorable!  I've considered getting another just to alleviate the bickering...
summary: Years later, my girls still love it

reviewText: I purchased this purse set for my toddler when I noticed that she liked to play with my purse and the contents of it.  She immediately took a liking to it.  That was about a year ago.  She still plays with it as if I just purchased it for her yesterday.

Bought this as a gift for my 2-year-old. I loved all that was included with this purse to make it complete and as realistic as needed for a child. She's always wanting our Chapstick, so the pretend lipstick was perfect. Although, I wish it had a cap since that seems to be her favorite part. The only other thing I would change would be the phone; it would be nice if it made some sounds when pressing the buttons. Overall, it was just what I was looking for.
summary: All the components I was looking for

reviewText: If you have a little one that hasn't quite reached age 4, it's a great gift. My three year old grandaughter was entertained for quite a while.

We got this for our 18month old for Christmas, she LOVES it!  I am not sure what small parts they are referring to for choking hazard but so far my daughter has loved it and played with it non-stop!  She LOVES the lipstick ;)
summary: Great gift!  No small parts that I noticed

reviewText: It's very durable, perfect for your "little princess".  Now my 2 year old princess is using it, and loves it, now she has her bag /phone and make-up too!  So cute!
summary: Nice-Makes little angels feel like big Girls!

reviewText: This little purse is so perfect.  It is just the right size and has all the cute little things girls love.
I bought the purse for my 3 year old niece and she loves it. It got to me really quickly too.
all the pieces are safe for a little girl. its cute and my little girl loved looking like a big girl.
Este bolsito es adorable, a mi hija de dos años le encanto, juega con el casi todos los dias y parece ser un juguete con varios años por delante.  Altamente recomiendo este producto.

Perfect for little hands and arms.  My two yr old daughter has a collection of purses already and this seems to be one of her favorites.  The items that come with the purse is is alittle cheesy, but the purse is the important item in this case.  Enjoy!
The buttons on the phone don't do anything, the little case for the debit card is hard for tiny fingers to open. I had hoped it would be more fun.

This is a cute first purse.  It comes with the items you see in the picture: pretend lipstick, debit card, makeup case, keys, mirror and cell phone.There have been a few negative comments about the contents, that these parts of the purse set aren't exactly *all that*.  But honestly, I'm not sure what people expect.  This is a toy for playing pretend and dress up.  A toy that could very well end up in small mouths covered with slobber.  Do you really want electronics and expect more for 12 bucks?Four Stars.  Cute.  Seems Sturdy.  Doesn't require batteries (thank Heaven).  This is a toy a child might carry around for weeks, forget, and come back to.  My daughter, now 5, is carrying it around again with her new brush and makeup.

Once she opened this present, my granddaughter would not take the purse off her arm.  I showed her how to use the fake lipstick.  So then every few seconds she took it out of the purse and pretended to put on her lipstick.  The debit card was a nice touch.  I think this was my granddaughter's favorite toy among soooo many gifts.

Our granddaughter visited us recently and received a gift of My First Purse. She was so pleased with this item, I decided to order a few extras to have on hand as gifts.My two year old loved walking around with her purse and playing with all the "goodies" inside.  It makes a wonderful gift! Now I am prepared for future visitors.
I ordered this for my little great niece who is 2.  Her Mom says she loves it and carries it around a lot.  Shipping was very prompt also. I have always been pleased ordering through Amazon.
This is so cute I brought 2 of them for my Granddaughter's for Christmas and i just can't wait for them to open it up
I bought this for my two year old granddaughter's birthday, and she will not put it down. She takes it to bed with her. Her mother says it is her favorite gift.
Wasn't pleased with this item at all.  A waste of money. Kids like toys the make noise to awaken their senses.  This toy is a bunch of stick on plastic.
Bought this for my granddaughter - she is 16 months.  I loved watching her discover what was inside. Items are made with hard plastic and will last - purse is soft.  Its real cute.

This is a very cute gift item for a little girl.  It is everything the item descriptions say, but as a money-conscious shopper I realize that for a child of my granddaughter's age, this item, combined with shipping, was a bit too expensive.  It would have been cheaper to by similart individual items at dollar-stores and put it together.
My niece loved it and can't put it down. it's the first toy she goes for when coming to my parents house.

My 3 year old niece loved it.  I noticed that the telephone had no functioning buttons but she was so busy playing with everything that I couldn't really inspect the other items.  Time will tell if her fascination is long lasting or if her older brothers  decide to play demolition derby with it.

I had this for my 2-year-old granddaughter ready to go one day for a long shopping trip. It was a great distraction, and I used the stuff inside to explain how credit cards work.She really loved pretending to be shopping along with us, and it was the best $ toy/learning tool/distraction to keep grandma from ripping her hair out I've ever invested in. She happily brings it along every trip to the store now. Score one for grandma!

My twin girls got this when they turned two and they both love it and still have it at almost 3 1/2.  My only complaint is the little plastic card holder.  For some reason, neither of the girls can open it.  But overall, they love the purse and it's lasted this long with very destructive twins!
My granddaughter loves this purse.  Now she feels just like mommy when they go shopping.  She can keep all her important items in one place.

My daughter is one she got this for her first birthday. Well I ended up giving it to her sooner. She loves caring the purse ever where. She loves to take everything out and put it back in. But I recommend to take the lip stick away , it's to small she liked to put it in her mouth soon as I saw her do this , made me worry was to small for her. Everything else is fine though an she loves her new purse!
Looks good in the picture but when I received it I was very disappointed on how cheap it was. Looks like something I would pick up at the $1 store.
My daughter loves it. It is her purse. She is 5 and likes it a lot.  this is a great gift.
I bought this for a little girl who loved it very much. She loves the fact that her purse has everything Mommies has.
My two year old loves it. She pretends she is putting on lipstick and loves taking everything out and putting it back, she takes it everywhere.
summary: Great toy for a toddler or baby

reviewText: Very cute little purse. Gave it to my 13 month old granddaughter and it was a hit. Definitely worth it!
I was looking for some pretend makeup and searched all over. This was the perfect choice. It's well made and the perfect size for her little hands. She loves her purse.
summary: My two year old loved it!!

reviewText: MY GRANDAUGHTER LOVED THIS, WAS A CHRISTMAS GIFT, WAS JUST AS DESCRIBED, WELL MADE AND PACKAGED WELL. HAD ALOT OF PIECES BUT NONE WERE TO SMALL FOR A TWO YEAR OLD TO HAVE.

I purchased two of these purses for my granddaughters, ages 2 and 4.  They both loved them and they are their favorite toy at Grammy's house.  We had to mark which items belonged to each girl because they would misplace something and then fight over it.  I added some other small items and money and they pretend to go shopping and out to lunch.
This purse is adorable.  It was a big hit with a 20 month old.  The best thing about it is that the things inside are very modern (cell phone, debit card).  It is one of the best gifts ever.

This is a GREAT toy for a one year old! I searched and searched for a safe toy purse for my daughter that had all the essentials included and found this one. I love it and she loves it too! I like how the contents are chunky so she can easily pick them up and durable enough to take all the dropping and chewing she does. It is also extremely cute! Fantastic toy especially for the price! I can tell it will be a favorite toy of hers for a long time!
Christmas gift for our little one, she plays with it quite frequently.  Her favorite part other than the bag itself is the phone.
Bought for my niece who's 3 for Christmas. She loves it. Everything is kid friendly and is fun for any toddler.

This purse is so cute and light enough to carry around by my granddaughter who is a year and a half old. She loves that she can carry things inside and it comes with little items.  Perfect for their first purse!
Grand daughter loved it. Hasn't put it down since getting it for Christmas. She packs every thing she can inside and off she goes. She's 20 months old going on 15 a real diva.

I purchased this for my granddaughter. She turned 3 years old, and loves all the accessories. She loves to pull her keys and cell phone out this purse and I love to see that it makes her happy. I would highly recommend this product for girls of that age.
summary: I purchased this for my granddaughter

reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 15 month old so that she could have a purse like her big sister, who's 3.  I like this product because the pieces are big, perfect for little hands and little fingers.  My daughter loves it and carries it with her around the house.

One year has passed since my daughter received her "First Purse".  She was a little young, only "one" when I ordered it, but she loved it from the start. She is still playing with it and items are holding up to the constant use.  She loves the Keys, the Credit Card and Card case. Not sure what that means, but it will probably cost me money when she gets older. Although my daughter's purse collection has grown significantly, this still remains one of her favorites. I would recommend this item to anyone that has a little girl that likes to carry stuff around in purses. She has been so much fun to watch and play with and watching her little mind at work while playing with her "First Purse" has been priceless.
summary: My daughter still plays with this!!

reviewText: I ordered this for my niece and she loves it. I was disappointed to receive the package in second-hand condition. The tags were ripped off and there was no original packaging. I managed to make the look relatively attractive. Had I not been giving this to my young niece, the packaging would have been a complete embarassment.

really enjoyed this, I like that the purse is soft, my newest daughter has just gotten a purse that is hard and it just doesn't seem as entertaining. Oh, and nothing is dangerous as far as swallowing.

I purchased this item for my neice and she absolutely loved it!  She carries the purse around with her and talks on the phone like her mommy.  The colors and design are appealing to a young girl, my neice is 2 years old and this was perfect for her.
summary: Perfect gift for a stylish little girl

reviewText: Thanks for the quick ship.  My grandchild loves it and had a great time playing with it!!! Great Christmas present!!

I bought this purse for my granddaughter's 2nd birthday. Initially she enjoyed the purse and everything in it; within a week she had lost interest in all but the cell phone. For another week she enjoyed imitating her Mommy by walking around with the cell phone propped between her ear and shoulder, but it too was soon forgotten. During a resent visit I noticed the purse at the bottom of her toy box. It was doomed. Understandable some toys are not intended to hold a child's attention over a long period of time because their sole purpose is to provide entertainment for the child until the novelty fades. I prefer buying toys that my grandchildren will enjoy for longer than a few weeks.
summary: Novel toy for short period of time

reviewText: I first bought one of these purses for my 2 year old granddaughter, and she loves it!  When my 4 year old granddaughter saw it, she wanted it as well.  They rarely go anywhere without them.It is very well made, and the contents are comparable to what Mommy carries in her purse.  These were good purchases for my little ones.
my first purse was a big hit with my twin girls. they talk to each other on the phones. very cute item and safe for small hands.
This is a cute set but was too old for our granddaughter at age 1. She didn't really understand how to use it but she loved the phone.

My oldest daughter, who is now 5 years old, got one of these purses a couple of years ago from my mother.  Out of all of the toys that my daughters have, this is the one that they would fight over the most, so for my youngest daughter's 3rd birthday I got her her very own "First Purse".  They both love playing with all of the included accessories, and often throw in a few additional items of their own.  The purses and accessories are all very durable, in fact, I had to put my daughters' initials on everything because I really can't tell the difference between the new items, and the items that we've had for a couple of years already.  Out of all of the little purses that I've looked at online and everywhere else, I definitely feel like this is the cutest and best deal out there.
summary: A Great Purse for Any Little Girl

reviewText: I gave this purse to my niece for her second birthday, and she never put it down.  The keys and the cell phone were her favorite.  She put it on her arm, and was ready to go!  I would recommend this to anyone who has a gift to give a little girl.They feel just like Mommy!
summary: My First Purse is a great gift!

reviewText: I bought this as a gift for a one year old girl.  When it came in, my daughter (18 months old) saw it and decided to make it her own.  She really enjoys opening the purse and going through the contents.  She especially loves the phone and jabbers on it as well as hands it to grown ups to make them talk on it.  I'm surprised how interested she is in it considering there are no bells or whistles but she enjoys it.
summary: Couldn't give it away as a gift

reviewText: I gave this as a gift for the daughter of a friend. I was not able to check the age requirement but it turns out, the gift was still a hit, especially the cellphone. This is a good buy.
bought this for our daughters 2nd birthday and she loves it. its great for any little girls "first purse" :)
My 15 month daughter loves this purse.  She walks around with it, so Cute.  The purse is really pretty,  Love it
My daughter is 1 and loves to play with this purse. She takes the items out and outs them back in. She also tries to talk on the phone and thinks the debit card is fun to carry around.
This was a hit as a birthday gift for a 4year old.  She loves putting things in and taking them out and mimicking her Mommy!
This was the hit of the christmas gifts.  I would recommend it to anyone with a little girl who likes to play dress up
Gift for my 18 months old granddaughter and she loves the purse and all of the things that it contains.
Nice my neice loves it.... Makes a nice birthday present.... It was a very reasonable price... Very good quality and durable...

This purse has everything my little girl needs. She loves having her "debit card" and her phone in there. It's the perfect size for her little hands and looks so cute on her arm. Despite the price, the pieces are durable and have held up well.
summary: Perfect purse for my 2.5 year old.

reviewText: Kidoozie My First Purseall items arrive ok as expected. product and timing ok. ok . . . . . .
My daughter copy's everything I do and is obsessed with my purse! Now she has her own!! She has even added a few other things to it!

My granddaughter loves to go in my purse and pull everything out, so I bought this for her and enjoy watching her play with things inside. She pretends to put on her lipstick and carries the bag around on her shoulder.lol
Great toy which has been throughly enjoyed by a 2 yr. old girl. LOves it and uses the items when getting herself ready. Sometimes even on the females around her. lol
Sent to a friends little girl. She played with it for a bit an then was bored with it. It isn't entertaining enough for toddlers, but too babyish for older girls. Very cute though.
My three year old niece was disappointed with the phone which is just a piece of molded plastic. The bag itself is nice
This is a cute toy. The debt card says member since 1998 which I thought was a little odd, and the wallet doesn't open, but besides that it's nice!

Purchased this for my 16 month old because she liked similar toys at daycare.  She loves this purse, she plays with every item in the purse and gets hours of enjoyment from this toy.  I would recommend to others without any reservations.  Great toy!

The accessories are the coolest part about this toy. The purse itself is a little small, not so easy to dump and my daughter can't fit it over her shoulder (neither can she accidentally strangle herself with the strap though, so it's a trade-off). We ended up taking all the stuff out of this purse and putting it in one she got as birthday present from her grandma, which worked out fine.

My granddaughter loves it...I was actually looking for plastic realistic make-up for her pretend...the included lipstick is about 2 1/2 inches tall and she packs it everywhere. The rest of the purse contence are also loved, and the purse is large enough to hold everything from crayons to doll clothes or small cars and trucks.

My 18-mo daughter loves going through my purse every night, just taking things out and putting them back in. I thought it would be fun to get her own purse that she could tote around, instead of my huge work bag. She hasn't put this down since she received it. She loves the keys and the "lip stuff", and pretends to chat on the phone. But really, I think, she just likes being like mommy and having a bag of her own. The pieces are clearly inexpensive, but it doesn't look like it will break anytime soon. For a toddler to just tote around the house for fun, it was a great buy.  If you are looking for an "exact replica" type toy, this isn't it - but it's perfect for my daughter who gets joy out of filling her little bag, then emptying it back out.

I purchased this purse for my niece.  She is 18 months old and loves it.  It is very grown up and the keys, lipstick, mirror, debit card and cell phone are big enough to handle and not too big for a small child.  A good choice.
Was disappointed that the phone does not play or talk.  My granddaughter keeps saying "no play", and that makes me unhappy for her.  Purse is fine, but not the phone.

My daughter had this as well as several of her cousins.  it's a great purse, well made, easy to use for a little girl and includes all the necessities.  My daughter got it when she was 2 and played with it for several years.  I just purchased it for my niece who is turning 2 - it's a great gift.

My daughter received this last Christmas from Grandma and she just loves it. She loves putting on the lipstick and looking at herself in the mirror. It makes her feel just like mommy carrying her own purse.
I got this for my 2 year old niece and now she won't leave home without it. She also applies the "lipstick" frequently.
summary: My Niece won't leave home without it

reviewText: I just bought this for my two year old and she loves it!  The phone is quite hilariously big and looks like it was modeled after the first cell phone ever made, but it makes us all laugh and my daughter doesn't know the difference.  She loves carrying around her purse and throws her fisher price animals inside and parts of her tea set.  Too cute.
summary: My two year old loves this!

reviewText: My grandaughter loves this purse.  She has already lost some of the items but she loves the lipstick and the credit card.  Great little gift.
Adorable, soft and perfect for a 1st birthday. Collects lint and dog hair like a magnet but I wouldn't hesitate on this purse with accessories. Great inexpensive gift.
My 1.5 year old loves this purse. My only negative is the cell phone does not work, and she expects it to work! My daughter loves the lipstick and wallet. She is always pretending to use them.

the granddaughters love this so much I had to purchase a second one so they won't fight over it.  I originally got it for the younger 20 month granddaughter, but her older sister, almost 5, claimed it for herself so  I had to order the second one.
summary: great quality, so cute and just how it was discribed

reviewText: This is a very adorable first purse for a toddler to mimic her mama and keep her out of her mother's purse!

I bought this purse set for my daughter for her second birthday.  She is now four years old and still plays with it often.  It has moved beautifully through the 'chewing on the lipstick' phase right along to the 'dress-up' stage.  Over the years we have lost a couple of the pieces, but the ones we still have look just as new as they did when we first opened the package.  This is a well-made, delightful toy that has outlasted, I believe, all of her other toys with the exception of her night-time lovey.  This is a great gift for any little girl, proving that the best toys are not necessarily the expensive ones.
summary: One of the best toys I've purchased...

reviewText: SHE ESPECIALLY LOVED THE LIPSTICK & PASSED IT AROUND THE TABLE.  IT WA SO CUTE WATCHING HER JOY FINDING ALL THAT WAS IN THE PURSE.  GOOD BUY GRANDMA
summary: MY GREAT GRANDAUGHTER THOUGHT IT WAS CHRISTMAS.

reviewText: This is one of her t favorite items this year.  We will broably buy more from this company next year and what not

I got this for my 11 month daughter's Easter basket.  She loves it!  I think it is very well made and adorable.  It held her interest on a 6 hour plane ride and is one of the few toys that gets played with on a daily basis.  This is going to be my new standard gift to give to little girls turning one.
This is a great toddler purse. Our 15 month old has had it for 3 months now and still loves it. All kinds of items go in and out of the purse. Great little purse for a 1 year old. Highly recommended.
It was exactly what I was looking for and my granddaughter loves it. Perfect any little girl who wants be like mommy.

I bought this for my daughter (21 months at the time) for Christmas so she would stop trying to carry my purse around all the time, and it was a GREAT buy! It has lots of great goodies for kids to play with, and my daughter loves to carry it around.  I only have 2 complaints: (1) the phone buttons cannot be pressed. I am fine without them having batteries or making noise, but it is irritating that they can't even be pressed. My daughter got frustrated pretty quick with that. (2) The little wallet is hard for kid fingers to open, so it is pretty much worthless. My daughter stopped playing with it almost immediately.Aside from those two things, I think this purse is great - the pieces are durable and fun and it is just the right size for my toddler.

This is a great purse for even the littlest purse enthusiast.  My two-year old daugher loves to examine the contents of purses and tote them around.  All of the items are safe and interesting, sturdy and well constructed.  I think she will enjoy it for several years and I highly recommend it.
i bought this as a birthday present for a two year old, and she loves it soooo much. worth it!
This is a Christmas gift for my 2 year old granddaughter.  I'm hoping she'll like it.  It's very colorful and should be appealing for a child of this age.
We sent this as a Christmas present to our 2 year old great granddaughter and were told that she loved it. The keys and lipstick are her favorite items. Cute idea for a toddler.

I was disappointed in this purse.  It looks like it would be really cute, but the items in the purse are really chintzy.  Our 20 month old grand daughter wanted us to open the lipstick and the change purse.  None of the items open or close.  Everything is just hard plastic.  The phone is solid plastic - no buttons to push or anything.
I bought this for a gift for the neighbor and it was perfect - she was turning 2 and was just starting to get into her mom's purse.
My niece is a year old and she seemed to like it so that's all that matters!  Wish it had more accessories though!
This is a very nice gift for a toddler girl

My two-year old LOVES imitating me - she pretends to put on makeup, loves looking at her reflection, will take most anything and pretend it's a purse or cell phone.  I thought this would be a perfect Christmas gift for her, and the price was pretty nice.The purse itself is cute - shiny, soft handles that are easy for little hands to grip, a velcro tab at top to keep the purse closed, but easy to manipulate by a toddler.  However the contents are a bit lame.- The lipstick is the most loved item in the set - my daughter often carries it around and pulls it out of her purse to "apply" and tries to put it on me, and even the dog!- The mirror is crap.  It's too small to see a reflection, and is one of those cheapy mirrors that is more like reflective plastic.  A total waste.- The phone is a good size, but it's all molded together - no bells and whistles.  However my daughter doesn't care too much and still plays with it a lot and pretends to make phone calls- The keys are very thin and cheapy, but they still are enjoyed by my daughter and make a jingling sound when she shakes them.  They look enough like keys that she will pretend with them- The debit card is utterly pointless, and I find inappropriate.  At least it's not a credit card, but I don't think any little child should get accustomed to paying for things with plastic.  On top of it, my daughter doesn't "get" what it is.  The sticker comes off pretty easily and to her, I think it looks more like toy food than purse contents and it is the ONLY thing in this set she has tried to chew on- The purple clasp container (not sure what it is supposed to be - a compact?) is a hit.  My daughter likes to snap it open and closed.  It's too small however to hold anything other than the stupid debit card.  If it were a bit bigger I could see her enjoying it more and tucking cheerios, a small block etc. into it.  I don't know how long it will last before it snaps in half.So really, the only things we find worthwhile is the purse, the phone, and the lipstick.  Don't really know if it's worth the money, but it does get a lot of play and use from my 24-month old.  She likes to gather her purse and fill it with random toys before we leave the house so she can be "just like Mommy."
summary: Not the best, but my daughter loves it

reviewText: Most days we don't leave home without one of her purses, and this one is right up there.  My daughter is 2 and 4 months and has been playing with it since her second birhtday.

This delightful toy has provided my 2 1/2 year old daughter with so much enjoyment.  The purse itself is soft plush, and can hold just about anything your daughter could desire to carry.  We used the toy cell phone to teach her proper phone etiquette.  She now speaks quite clearly on the phone to all our family who call her.  She has carried this purse around since her first birthday a year and a half ago.  It can handle the washing machine without fading.  The accessories are so well built that none of them have broken even after this long of playing.  It is a great investment and keeps her from playing in adult purses.
I got this for my two year old granddaughter...she loved it...it is safe and the different objects in the purse are very appealing.

I just received this today and I'm going to give it to my one year old niece for Christmas.  Based on all the good reviews, I was excited to get it!  When I opened the package, the immediate reaction was this is so cute!  I know she is going to love it!  Not only is it very girly, but the great thing is she can grow with it instead of those other kinds of purses that makes noises and is for babies.  This one will probably be fun for several years.  Very cute and perfect for her age.  I would definitely recommend!
my 13 month old granddaughter thinks this is a grand toy...especially the keys and phone...everyone else thinks the debit card is too funny!
My first purse is very sturdy and nice for any little girl developing into a big girl. I love it.

Our 2 1/2 year old niece just loves this purse. I love that it came with a debit card, that was just adorable. It has the main items a woman carries in her purse so when she asks mom for her car keys mom can say, where's yours? It's a good thing to get a little girl, especially those that always bug mom for her stuff, now she will have her own stuff. Just add a crayon and a little notebook and she's good to go.
Our almost 2-year old daughter got this for Christmas, and she still plays with it several months later.  Highly recommend.The only thing missing is some dress-up shoes to go along with it :-)
summary: Still one of our daughter's favorite toys

reviewText: I sent this purse to my niece for Christmas and she won't put it down.  She takes it with her wherever she goes and actually uses each toy that came with it.  I knew she liked purses but this one was just her size.  Excellent gift!!
I love this purse. It came with everything that we carry in a real purse. My babygirl won't put the purse down. She'll pick it up and tell us bye like she's going out. It's perfect.
Nice

I bought this for a Christmas gift for my 1 1/2 year old daughter. From the second she opened it, she did not put it down! The accessories are safe for her, colorful, and just her size. The purse is soft and light and the accessories are smooth. This would be a great gift for any girl! I am going to purchase this as gifts for upcoming birthday parties.
Great company, product, and price!  I would shop here again and really appreciate all the tender loving care this process had!

I originally bought this for my 5 year old however my 15 month old took it over. I realized how perfect this is for her. it has not small pieces so she can not choke on it. She loves having a littler purse she can carry and she likes the phone to pretend to talk on it/ bite it. This may be too yound for a 5 year old or older but perfect for a toddler. I would recommend this product
great product

My 14 month old runs around the house with an old Liz Claiborne purse that she found in the bottom of my closet.  She loves it but the handles are too long for her and I wanted to get her something more bright and fun, so I ordered this for Christmas.When I got it in the mail I was excited...until I opened it.  It's JUNK! Seriously, I could do better at the dollar store!!  The flower is already partially coming undone, the plastic phone edges on the top are razor sharp, the mirror is flaking and this is JUST OUT OF THE BOX!  I'm shipping this piece of crap back. I am less than impressed with this item.

This toy purse is super cute, and everything seems well constructed and durable. My daughter loves it. Her favorite thing is the lipstick. I just wish that there wasn't so many stickers on it, as my daughter loves to pick them off of her toys.

I ordered this purse for my daughters second birthday, I was very disappointed in the quality. The cell phone is VERY cheap plastic, and the buttons don't even push in. The "wallet" that comes with it is just a little fake plastic wallet that doesn't open. The keys are flimsy. The one this she does really like is the lipstick and the mirror. Just not what I was expecting!
summary: Disappointed in the my first purse

reviewText: I gave this item a gift to my niece and she loved it. She played with it for hours. Items are of great quality and very durable.
Bought this for a baby in the family, she loves real purses so I had to buy her the baby version! she loved it.
When I bought this product I must of loved it so much I accidently ordered again.  Oh well I just gave it to toys for tots.  My little girl loves it.
Bought these for my 3 and a half year old granddaughter. Its ok but for the price the dollar store could beat it, The phone does nothing.

Ordered 2 of them. They are adorable Christmas presents for 2 of my granddaughters both of whom are not yet 2. Were opened and a hit. The phone was liked best and that is great because it makes no sounds or music. She actually jabbers into it!
This is a perfect purse for a young child.  Everything is sturdy and safe.  The purse opens easily, which is a problem with other play purses I have seen.  My daughter loves carrying this places.

I bought this for my two year old who is constantly wanting to carry my purse around the house and apply my chapstick. It's the perfect size and weight for a toddler and everything fits nicely into the bag. The unbreakable mirror is perfect and it easily wipes clean when it gets smudged (which it undoubtedly will). My favorite part is the little plastic lipstick because unlike my chapstick, I don't have to worry about a mess all over her face, or my house!
summary: Everything a little lady on the go could need!

reviewText: This was just the right gift. Provides hours of fun for any little girl who enjoys pretending like she's a 'big' girl!
summary: Just What A Little Girl Wants!

reviewText: Great gift for girls.  Looks realistic and provides hours of play time.  Bought this for my niece and she hasn't put it down.
This was the perfect gift. My two year old niece loved it! It was a Christmas gift, it's perfect bc she loves pocketbooks. Now she has her own. She loved the cell phone. She walks around with it.
This little set is great!  Very bright and colorful with cute accessories.  I think any little girl would love this for pretend play.

I got this for me !yr old she loves taking stuff out and packing it back she goes all over the house with it nd seems to love it very much. However the phone that comes with the purse is hard and has numbers that do nothing you cant even press it they should improve the phone and make the numbers pressable at least.
summary: Nice but dont like the phone

reviewText: Our twin 18 month old daughters got these for Christmas.  They love them.  A great buy for the money.  Excellent quality and lots of cute things inside to play with.  My daughters love to take them on outings so they can be just like Mommy!  One of their favorite toys
my fashionista baby girl loves it..shes into dressing up..so a gift like this is great for her..her own make believe purse with goodies

Another gift for our daughter...she loves this!!!Great to have something that doesn't require a battery or make noise!!!Every little girl needs this first purse and the accessories that come with it...just too cute to pass up!!!
Cute, funny, colorful, my daughter of 1 year and a half play with this toy a lot, thank you very much
She feels like a big girl like her auntie (me :)) she loves the lipstick, loves the phone, loves the bag. She loves being a girl.

This is an okay child's purse.  My 2 yr old daughter will sometimes tote it around, but she still prefers my purse.  Do I regret getting it?  No.  It's cute enough for what you pay for it, but I wouldn't highly recommend it either.
summary: okay pretend purse, but my daughter still likes mine better

reviewText: Granddaughter loves playing with all the the items inside of the purse, especially the mirror.  She takes it everywhere she goes.
This purse is for my delightful niece. I know she will love it. The items included in the purse are just what a little girl would want.

I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she still loves to grab it when we are "on the go"! It has all of the necessities and it cracks me up to watch her put on "lipstick". I tell her it's chap stick. She loves her phone and pretends to call her Mom Mom all the time! Of course the keys and debit card were a hit since she sees her mommy using these when we are out. The only item she finds particularly frustrating is the wallet as it's hard for her to open.
summary: A must have for a little diva!

reviewText: I bought this as a birthday present for my 2 year old granddaughter. She loved it! It's bright, colorful, and she loved walking around it. The only problem was her 4 year sister kept taking it away from her!

Santa brought this purse to my 20 month old daughter and she loves it!  She chats on the phone, puts on the play lipstick, and hardly wants to leave the house without her purse!  The pieces are large, easy to handle, and durable, and they also don't make any noise (this is a BIG plus at my house).  It is a perfect gift for any "girly girl".
Niece loves this and will not put it down... it is the first thing she asks for when they go anywhere.

My 18 month old loves this bag, she happily puts on her lipstick, looks in the mirror, opens and closes her purse to get her debit card. Only down side is the phone would be better if it made a few noises. But all in all a good roll play toy

My daughter got this for her 3rd birthday and immediately fell in love. The bag itself is very well made and can handle the play of a three year old. The accessories are also well made and the perfect size for little hands. I highly recommend this for any little girl who wants to be just like mommy.
summary: An absolute home run with my 3 year old!

reviewText: excellent product what I expected I recommend, arrived on time, no problem existed not, well without any complication widely recommended.excellent product what I expected I recommend, arrived on time, no problem existed not, well without any complication widely recommended.excellent product what I expected I recommend, arrived on time, no problem existed not, well without any complication widely recommended.excellent product what I expected I recommend, arrived on time, no problem existed not, well without any complication widely recommended
I got this for my friends kid and she absolutely loved it. She was all about this purse and even cried when she accidentally left her "debit" card in the car. Highly recommended.

My mom got this for my daughter's 2nd birthday - my mom is a purse fanactic and is trying to turn my kids into one too!:)  My daughter loves it, she loves the play lipstick and mirror. I wish the phone made noise, but even though it doesn't she walks around with it to her ear, holding it with her shoulder - guess she mimicks me too much!  It doesn't come with any play money, so she took the money out of her cash register to put in the play compact which she calls her wallet - now she has money. It's a great toy, and very well worth the $12.95, nothing is flimsy and seems like everything is extremely durable.

This is my second purchase, the first was a christmas gift for my 2 yr old niece who lives in the UK.  She absolutely adores it, and of the virtual "Toys R Us" environment she lives in, this is one of her favorite toys.  It's so popular that this second purchase is a birthday gift for one of her playmates.
it was a nice purse for a little girl to carry around i purchased this with a v-tech laptop too . the celphone and key is big enough so im sure we dont have to worry that a child would swallow it.

The bag was a gift for my friends little girl and she seemed to really like it.  She put a bunch of baby clothes in it and played with it for a long time.  The upside and maybe even down side to this game is that it gives a small child a credit card.  On one hand it teaches them about credit but it can also lead to children believing that money/credit is easy to have/use.  However because the girft was for a 1-2 year old this really shouldn't matter.  As for the durability she plays hard and it has lasted her so i believe it is a good buy for so much product.  Mirror isn't good but it serves it's purpose.  Phone is great becasue she stays alway from mine now since she has her own :)

I purchased this for my granddaughter who is 2 years old and she absolutely loved the purse.  However, the items on the inside were not realistic enough for her.  I was disappointed that the cell phone didn't at least ring or beep and none of the keys were movable.  She loves the lipstick but kept asking why it didn't have a cover.  The wallet and mirror are her favorites. This gift is probably best for children between 1 year and 18 months old.

I think there should be a list of features and it should have a picture but I baught it anyway because I trust amazon .com and it worked great I dont know how I could live without one over all I would recomend this to everybody with that need.
5 star rating is from my daughter.  She loves it.  The phone doesn't make any noise, but for me that's a good thing!

This is an AMAZING watch!  I have had it since April of this year, and it works flawlessly.  I mostly use the pager and the Yahoo Mobile internet messaging services - I get local weather, entertainment report and sports reports at night, top news stories.  Batteries last about two months each.  It turns out that the battery used by the watch is actually a hearing aid battery.  Again, this is a wonderful watch!

A useful wrist pager and an OK watch. Had one for about 2 years - beat the heck out of it. Drowned it several times inadvertantly. I would still own one if the paging service wasn't so over-priced. The first year of Skytel was free - an offer that was the clincher that got me to try it in the first place. Multiple alarms, multiple time zones, and a lousy watch band.
Great value!  Perfect for use at work..discreet alarm.  Various useful attributes.  Drawback: appearance not girly at all... but worth it. Want new one desperately!

Get-a-grip really  improves  tractionon ice and snow.  Get-a-gripis easy to get on and off.I wear mine over size large  NEOSovershoes, a good combination.Driving in them is OK, too.It's a pretty good product.

I just got the first chance to use these, and they worked great.  Downtown Tulsa is bad about not clearing the sidewalks, and I was able to walk 4 blocks on ice and packed snow without slipping once.  I even tried to "skate" on purpose on an icy section of sidewalk, and my feet would not budge from where the spikes dug into the ice.  My coworkers all wanted to know where I got them.

Oh Amazon! I am _so_ disheartened to see that you no longer carry this watch, as disheartened I am to see that Timex and Motorola no longer manufacture it.  This watch was no Edsel, and I'm sorry to see it end up in a technology tarpit.A co-worker of mine just recently (last five years) lost his hearing and he now has a Cochlear implant. They haven't made a cell phone to work with the Cochlear implant yet and this watch has been a godsend in helping us communicate with each other! We work on-call and it's imperative that I be able to rapidly get in touch with him. This watch was perfect for that! And because it was a watch, it was small, portable and just about perfect for the task and he always knew when someone was contacting him.Not only was it a pager under SkyTel service, it could receive e-mail from cell phones, dispatcher computers and via the SkyTel website and news alerts from the wire services over Yahoo.With the purchase of a new watch, you received a year of SkyTel service. This included service nationwide, voice mail for those who wished it, caller id and a toll free number to send unlimited pages or to leave/retrieve voice mail. Renewal of the agreement was but $99 a year! Where can you get a deal better than that???So here, after two years of brutal use, both our watches are sick and dying. We need new ones Amazon!  Find us some! The rubber watch bands are deteriorating, the buttons are getting loose and the electrical contacts are getting worn. If we can't put the pager on our wrist, we can't use it and don't want it.
summary: One of the neatest discontinued items out there

reviewText: My son found this on Amazon and had to have it for Christmas.  As much as I didn't want to spend the obvious inflated price due to it being discontiued, I did anyway.  Overall it is a fun costume.  However, the headband on the pretend headset broke immediately.  It is made for really small heads!!  Although my son is 8, he couldn't fit it.  As soon as he put it on his head, it snapped!!  Otherwise the remaining parts are good.
summary: Fun, imaginative, but still breakable plastic!

reviewText: I bought these for my 78 year old father who lives alone and walks his dog several times a day. I was worried that he would slip and fall. I wanted a product that would give him traction and me a little piece of mind. Acccording to Dad, they work great and are easy to put on any pair of shoes. They seem very sturdy and are holding up well to our Ohio winter. Carbide steel tips seem very "pointy"....I would not wear these on any indoor flooring. I did not want to test the waters on my own floor but would use caution.
My daughter received this as an Xmas gift.  She just loved it.  of course it can be a little dangerous when she's waving it around but it's great fun.

I got a pair in 1996. They grip ice well, and provide a secure, natural feeling. On dry pavement (asphalt or concrete), there is a slight feeling similar to having pebbles in the bottom of my shoe, but this does not interfere with running. I recommend these for runners who run in the winter and who may encounter ice.I recommend runners look for models that have a pair of spikes under the heel. The models without heel spikes are for walkers.These have little or no effect in snow; they are for ice. In some cases, there is ice under snow. When this happens, if the snow is thick enough to prevent the studs from penetrating the ice, they will slip. In addition, it is possible for mud to stick to the bottoms, preventing the studs from reaching ice.If you see similar products for much less, be sure to check out the type of studs. Years ago, I saw a similar product for $3 in a home improvement store. Out of curiosity, I tried them. The studs were cheaper, with a malleable alloy. They quickly mashed down, becoming a lot less effective on ice. This product has tungsten carbide spikes, which keep their shape, and last longer. When they do wear down, they are replaceable.
summary: Secure, natural feeling when running on ice

reviewText: How cute is this.  This was bought for my daughter who is 2.  She loves it.  She waves it around and grants us all our wish...Its really cute and my 6 year old loves to dress up and play with it too.
summary: And now you can be a magical princess too

reviewText: I was skeptical but she really loves it!  She uses it every time she plays "princess", which is several times a day!  She's not at all gentle with it so I'm pleased with it's durability.

Our 3 year old finds this toy to be fun for about 10 minutes at a time.  Then, she'll discard it without remembering to turn it off.  If you leave it on, the batteries will run out.  We replace the batteries in this toy on average about once a week.  Also, this wand is rather heavy. When our daughter waves it around, it's not totally under her control.  Once in a while, she smacks herself in the head with it.  The other down side to this toy is that it's terribly loud. Other than that, it's a fun toy for a girl who loves princesses.  Our little girl plays with this toy more than a lot of her things.
summary: Go for it, but it's loud, heavy and the batteries run out.

reviewText: This is a cute toy and makes fun noises for little princesses.  My 3 year old has lots of other princess toys that she plays with a lot more, but every once in a while her or her brother will get it out and "abracadabra" everything.  It seems to be durable and I don't think that the volume is too loud.  I really like that it has an on/off button also.

We replaced a junky karaoke machine with this other Disney Princesses toy and were very pleased.  My daughter loves it and it has survived many accidental crashes to the tile floor already.  The audio quality is surprisingly good as well.

OK, I found this wand Feb 3rd 2006.  I was searching for it over 3 weeks. No one has it in stock and they came out with a new one, not as nice.  If you live in the San Francsico Bay Area, Walgreens is selling this wand.  Only place I could find it.They will not make any more.  This is not a toy for anyone under the age of 3 as it is quite heavy at the star part and could hurt someone if they hit them with it.

My sister bought this toy for my daughter on her birthday, and she has been playing with it ever since.  It does get annoying after a while because there is not a volume control, but you tend to get use to it.  I also found that the batteries do not to tend to last that long.  She has been very rough on it though and it is very durable.  I am happy that my sister bought it for her and it has made a great gift.  The voices are clear and the sayings are really cute!!

The batteries were dead when the toy arrived, so we had to buy new ones first (they are the expensive watch batteries). It didn't make a silly sound every time you bang the hammer - you have to hit it just right. Then it started making sounds randomly when it was moved at all, I suppose due to faulty wiring. Right before this toy went into the trash, the battery casing broke (CHOKING HAZARD!!).
summary: Breaks easily (something a hammer shouldn't do)

reviewText: This is a fun toy that teaches the kids some fine motor skills!!! My daughter loves the sounds it makes!

For me it was a waste of money to buy this hammer. You have to hit something really hard to get a sound out of the toy. When my baby grabs it, he tries to bite it. It's difficult to bite the hammer, so in a few seconds he throws it away. My baby is 9 months old. Perhaps a one year old who is not teething and not interested in biting any more would enjoy banging the furniture with this toy...
summary: My baby does not like it

reviewText: This childs toy hammer has provided a great amount of entertainment for my 2 year old grandson. He plays with it for a long time laughing at the noises it makes.
Finding a VHS today is a bit difficult, but it is worth it when the vcr tv still works. bought this for my granddaughter and it works great.

My 3 year old son is a diehard Dora fan.  Recently he really started to pick up on the few Spanish words they have on the English DVDs and the television show.  He was very excited to watch this video.  I think it holds his attention even more than the others - and his Spanish is skyrocketing.  I wish the character's voices weren't so high pitched (seems to always happen in Spanish speaking programs - all of the children have high voices) and that they spoke a little slower.  But if your child watches Dora over and over, why not add a little Spanish?
summary: Great for your Dora fan to learn more Spanish!

reviewText: What a great latina-girl role model for my little one.  And great exposure to spanish, problem-solving skills.  ...

I bought this for my 10 month old boy. Perhaps he was too old for it, or too active. He liked it when I hit it and made the sounds, but he really wasn't that interested in it himself. It is a well made toy and the sound when you hammer are cute (not annoying). My son kept trying to do other things on the hammer (turn or push the yellow and red buttons on it) and since they didn't do anything he eventually gave up and moved on to other things. It would be better if those buttons/knobs did turn or push or go around in a circle or something. It might entertain longer. For what it is, I think it is a little overpriced. I would have paid $5-$7 for it, but really not $12.
summary: Nice toy, but doesn't entertain long

reviewText: I must agree with some of the other reviews herein; the advertising is heavy-handed in the beginning and this sort of thing is what would encourage one to just tape the shows off of the TV instead of buying this book. It really discourages me to buy any other titles from Nickleodeon. Shame on Nickleodeon!

I would highly recommend this Dora video.  My 15 month old daughter watches it over and over.  And, I swear that her first word was "backpack"!  She laughs at and babbles to the tape, claps, and thoroughly enjoys every minute that she's watching.

Graduated to Video that is... Dora is very popular at our house.  After a long stint with Bob the Builder we were happy to find something new for your 2 year old to watch after nap time while I get dinner ready!I like the format of the Dora show and video.. the repetition is excellent for this age group and I find that now my son will sing along, and actually really interact with Dora, Boots and Backpack!  It's very cute to listen to from the other room...

My son is a huge fan of Dora, and the material is great.  Unfortunately the quantity of advertising at the beginning of this video is outrageous.  I know that Ads at the start of a video are the standard, but over 10 minutes before the video starts on a child's video is outrageous.  To wade through this much advertising to see the content they should give the video away for free.  Yes, you can use the fast forward button every time your child watches, or you can record episodes easily direct from your own T.V.  As this tape only contains two twenty minute episodes you won't have to work to hard to make your own comparable tape.
Bought this for My niece an she loves Dora, WIll buy products again from this selleri n the future if need be

I love dora and so too does my 2 year old.  we are from Australia and i have ordered heaps of books and videos from amazon[.com] for us both to watch and read.  They are all fantastic products, with great learning skills.  Thanks amazon[.com].

This watch was to replace a similar Skagen watch that was left behind on a vacation.  (I hope whoever found it is enjoying it!)  We both love the Skagens because of their style and very light, thin design.  Highly recommended.

We didn't realize how much our daughter liked Dora until our local cable company dropped "Nick Jr." programming, when she was 8 mo. old.  At age 15mo. she saw Dora's picture at a bookstore, and thereafter would ask us,  "D-D-D-Dora".  Anything an 8 mo. baby remembers that long must be good.So we got the Prince video, and the only problem is our tolerance for r-r-r-repeat showings.We really like the clear language used, the repitition, the sort of "normal" fantasies (as opposed to sensory overload action/sound), and the Spanish inclusion.  If they'd do the same stories with Chinese inclusions (or French, etc., etc.,) that would be great.Our great objection is the 7 minutes of senseless advertisements at the beginning of the tape.  When will Americans wake up and object forcefully to the invasive carcinoma that is excessive commercialization of society?
Good looking watch but the catch kept opening and I bought an expandable band tov replace the original. Which was smartly designed but didn't function well

I purchased this watch in December 2012 for myself as a Christmas present.  I needed a silver watch to match other silver jewelry and this one was very pretty.  I'd heard that the Skagen brand was very dependable, but I have found this to not be the case.  The watch was only used one time , this year in fact.  I had a new battery installed and it ran for about 2 hours.  I found that if I continued to shake it, it would run but as soon as I stopped it stopped after about 30 minutes.  The jewelry repair rep had me bring it back to see if the connections were meeting and they were.  The screw to wound the watch is so tiny I could barely grasp it.  Imagine trying to keep it set...smh!  The clasp is difficult to latch but that wouldn't be a problem if there weren't so many other problems.  The watch is a waste of money and I will never buy another one.

Skagen Mesh women's watch, very attractive. Needed a watch where the size could be adjusted on the spot. The watch face is easy to read, simple, has a second hand. So far, it has kept perfect time. Setting the time and date - not a problem. First 'mesh' bracelet watch purchased and it has been a pleasant experience.
Like this watch alot, but am disappointed by how many scratches I see around the face already. Nice everyday watch.
I like the watch.  Very stylish and well made for the price.  I bought an ESQ watch also from Amazon. Have been very happy w purchases from Amazon!

Beautiful watch.  Gave to my wife as a Christmas present, and she loves it.  Band adjusts easily (she has slim wrists, and I was concerned whether it would adjust to that small a wrist size)and overall it shows nicely on her wrist.  Kind of watch she wears to work then wears out to dinner.  Has a second hand, which is important to her for work.  Time seems extremely accurate;  packaging was very nice (neat little box) and directions provided were very good.Overall, very satisfied!

I borrowed this watch with a gold face from a friend while my Rolex is being repaired.  She needed it back before my watch was ready, so I bought this one to have as a back up.  It is very classy, and super comfortable.  I have gotten several compliments.  Just be careful to be sure the clasp is done right!!  It is easy to not get the first part just right, and then the second part will click in place, but not be secure.
After going through several watches that I didn't like, I finally got something I liked. It sits nicely, not too big, not too small. Easy watch band design.
This is a good value.  The clasp takes some figuring out, but once you get used to it you will like it.  It feels secure when closed properly.

Ordered this watch for myself when my old cheap watch finally died. It looks similar to my old watch, but nicer. I like the woven stainless steel band, it's comfortable to wear. The watch face is classic, not too fancy for everyday wear, but the crystals give it just a little touch of elegance. The price was reasonable as well.So far really happy with my purchase!

I'm quite familiar wih the Skagen Watches. This model is very simple, modern, perfect for everyday use. I'm very pleased with it although I was surprised it didn't come with the original battery. Any advice on what to do?

This is a beautiful watch.  I really like it.  The only downside for me is that my wrist is too small.  I have the wristband on the smallest setting, and it is still a little bit big.  Had to go out and buy another watch that fit better.  Other than that.  The seller was great and shipped it right away.

Bought this for my wife to replace another "dying" watch.  She loves it.  Style goes well in casual, work, and dressy settings.  (Many women's watches lack a second hand ... but she needs one for work.)  Watch is easy to adjust for wrist size, and has performed perfectly for the ~1 month she has had it.
summary: Great watch at a reasonable price

reviewText: the skagen watch is  very attractive.  only problem i have with it is that every so often the watch falls off.  it is supposed to snap into place and  sometimes it appears to be in place, but isn't and falls off. i fear that at some time i will just lose it.

I saw this watch at a department store and loved it, but held off on purchasing it, WOW am I happy I did that. Found it on Amazon for HALF PRICE!! It's a beatiful watch, and I am always complimented on it. I love this style of Skagen, since I have a small wrist I can adjust it to fit me perfectly.

I dont know if it was just a flaw with my particular watch, but after just over a month of owning the watch i started noticing it was slow and progressively got worse over the next month - now if i set it 5 minutes ahead of the right time, in four days it will be hours behind. It also says its waterproof up to 30m, but Ive only washed my hands with it on and barely got it wet, so I dont know why it is not working. Just looking at it now, im realizing it has been at the same time for the past day...  very dissapointed.
No item has been received and Amazon are still strying to track the order. When and If i receive it id be happy to provide a review, but to date I give the service 0 stars.
summary: I cant rate what I havent received yet as it was lost

reviewText: This is my second Skagen watch.  I bought the first at Nordstrom at least 10 years ago.  They both look contemporary and fit well for women with large wrists.

I had one just like this for a couple of years. Took it off when going through the metal detector at airport and left it in a bin!!! I didn't realize until much too late. So as soon as I got home I ordered one just like it. I really like this watch. It's light, it's pretty, it's easy to read and has a second hand. I rarely need the second hand, but like having one. I also like that I can adjust it to fit very easily.... no need to go to a jewelry store to get that done.
summary: Excellent watch! I lost one and bought another just like it.

reviewText: Great looking watch. My wife has received many complements on it since I purchased for her.

I love this watch!  I find it easy to adjust, easy to read, comfortable to wear, sleek and stylish,(I love the crystal hour indicators).  It is one of the few Skagen watches with a minute hand, and the price is incredibly good for all this quality. The most important reason that I love this watch is the fact that it is made of stainless steel and has no nickel.  I am very allergic to many metals and leather but with my Skagen I have no worry about developing a reaction.  I'm very happy with this purchase.
I have it only for two weeks, all I can say now that it's very elegant, I love it so far.

This is a handsome watch.  However it came loose in the package and I had to work to make it look appropriate to present as a gift.  The catch on the strap does not stay fastened, something which leads to easy loss of the watch.  I don't have time to send it back and get something else for Christmas, but after Christmas I will send it back and get something else for my wife.  I am sorry I didn't pay attention to others who had commented about the strap.  I figured that they would have seen those comments and fixed the problem, but sadly, they hadn't.
summary: Wouldn't order this again, should have paid attention to other reviewers!

reviewText: My Skagen watch of 10 years finally bit the dust.  It was so comfortable and I had gotten so many compliments on it, that I decided to order another.  I picked a similar style, have been wearing it for 6 weeks and am as happy as ever - it's wonderful!  This company shipped it promptly and I was extremely satisfied with the packaging.
This watch shipped quickly and came packaged very nicely in a Skagen box.The battery was charged and looked absolutely new.

Have always loved Movado designs and when I lost my watch a few weeks ago was very tempted to indulge. However, the more I looked online, the chunkier the Movado bands seemed to be. My boyfriend had a very elegant Skagen a few years ago and I began to look at Skagen. Finally settled on this one and am delighted. The design is elegant and clean. I too have a small wrist but was able to move the clasp fairly easily.

I needed to replace a Skagen watch that I destroyed by smashing the crystal.  I love the way that the band is attached to the watch face itself.  Very different.  The watch is more beautiful than expected.  Thanks Amazon!

Skagen will get you so many compliments and again Amazon Prime camethrough and got My wife's watch to the house in 2 days!!! This is the 5 or6th Skagen watch my family has owned between my wife , kids and myself.You cant beat the design and the price. However I have found the price sometimesreflects that the watch my have went unsold for a few years and then discounted,,,Almost all of the skagens bought from amazon need the battery replaced within ayear...Hint,,, It is alot easier to take it to a jeweler to have the battery replaced as i haveruined a 80$ watch just trying to replace the battery,,,Skagen,,, Awesome,,
summary: Cant beat Skagen, but keep new batteries

reviewText: Bought this for my wife as a replacement for the exact same watch she has had for several years.  The original watch still works fine but the metal fibers in the band started to fray and was catching on her clothing.  Was looking for a replacement band which I could not locate.  Since this watch was so inexpensive  I decided to just order a new one.  Arrived very quickly (1 day) with Amazon Prime.  Watch works fine.

I love Skagen watches and have one that is still going strong after almost 20 years.  I wanted a new watch and this one was perfect for my requirements.  The latch is great and I have never had any Skagen watch fall off if I closed it correctly.  I discussed the battery usage issue with my jeweler and he says batteries are not made to last as long as they used to.My only complaint with this watch is the stem is smooth and that makes it difficult to change the time.  I have to use a quilting needle grabber to hold stem when I turn it.I will buy another Skagen, but I will look very closely at the picture to see what the stem looks like.

I bought this because it had all the items on my wish list (second hand, not too big, silver, adjustable band).  It looks great on, keeps decent time, and I love that it fits my 5 1/2" wrist with no excess band hanging out.  (The unused band tucks under and stays put.)  Other reviews mentioned a problem with falling off.  That only happened once.  I think that was because I hadn't fastened it securely.  Now I make sure to listen for 2 distinct clicks when I put it on, and I don't have any problems.I liked this so much that I bought it for a birthday gift.  And at the price, I think it's a very good value.
This is a very nice watch, it feels nice on the wrist. Can be worn sporty or dressy.  Easy to read.
This watch is great!  The price was wonderful and the product has exceeded my expectations.  I would for sure order again from Amazon.com.
I saw this watch today at TJMaxx for 39.95. Just saying...be careful to shop around. Usually Amazon has the best price, but not always.

Nice quality watch. Very comfortable, durable, sits very close to the body, washes very well.The only downfall is that lots of older aged ladies like it and my wife is in her 30's and that gets on her nerves :)Overall it's perfect for her line of work in the medical world.UPDATE _____So my the battery seemed to die after having the watch for about 5 months (!!!!) which was pretty aggravating to begin with on such a seemingly high quality item.Took it to a jeweler and Skagen dealer who replaced it for a small fee. Now, the watch doesn't keep proper time. Not even close.Skagen has a warranty policy but they require you to ship them the watch along with your credit card. They get to decide what to do with both and you get to wait with baited breath to see what happens.Why would I do such a thing for a $100 item? Crazy sauce!Buying a new watch and tossing this piece of junk.Wouldn't recommend the brand or this model.
summary: Great watch. (edit: dead after less than 6 months)

reviewText: This watch is great, looks great and feels great. The hands clicking sound is almost none! Overall nice watch, very happy with it.

It's not the most expensive watch but it doesn't have to be. It's a looker of a watch. Classy,clean and sharp looking. Mesh band on the wrist (any- I have a Skagen also) is most comfortable and easy to use and sure locking. Terrific buy & price.

This watch works just like you'd expect it to, and the clasp DOES WORK, but it requires an IQ above 50.  The watch won't fall off your wrist if you close it correctly.  Look at it after you get it and don't assume you know how to close it.  I believe my wife and I found it had to snap audibly before you could count it closed. You might expect it was closed when it actually was not if you didn't hear the snap.
One of many watches that I have but this one is easy to wear. Looks good at any time of the day. Catch is good.

The watch is extremely reliable. I've had it three years and it's never lost time and is running on the original battery. I wear it every day so it takes a lot of abuse. It's simple design is elegant enough for me to wear to work or out for a casual evening, but casual enough for me to wear on weekends. The mesh band is the most comfortable band you will ever wear, you don't even feel it against your skin. I have a two-tone Movado and I far prefer my $89 Skagen to my $900 Movado.  My Skagen is also easy to read the time. I just love it more than I can say. I own numerous watches, many from Switzerland. But the Skagen is the KING of my lifetime watch collection. Simplicity as its very BEST.

This watch is even nicer then I expected. I have received so many compliments. The face is large enough to easily read and the band is adjustable which is so much better then a trip to a jeweler.  Great watch!
It is very difficult to change the time especially for a woman with nails.  Loved my other Skagen watch, but had I known this would be so difficult, I would not have purchased this one.
This watch is beautiful, elegant and very cool. Plus the price was great. I like it so much I did a search and found one in Men's size for my husband's Xmas gift.

it is not what I expected from a Skagen.  The casing is very thick and looks like a cheap imitation. Not to mention the watch arrived with a broken stem so I can't set the time.  It was a real disappointment, and I intend of course to return it for a FULL REFUND.The reason I wanted to purchase another Skagen watch when my band broke on my other watch, is that I liked the look.  My previous Skagen watch works fine, except for the broken band.  Unfortunately, I was told by several jewelers whom I asked about fixing the watch that it would cost me about the price of a new one to fix the old b/c Skagen sold the company and the new owners have TERRIBLE customer service.In short, this watch is not what I had hoped for.  There is nothing unique or interesting about it.  The key feature, for me, that commends the Skagen brand is its thin, sleek casing.  Clearly that is no longer the case, at least not with this particular model.  Not sure if they no longer manufacture that line anymore.  But absent the sleek look, I will select another brand and one that I know I can service without hassle.  I was willing to take the risk with Skagen, but now after seeing the watch I don't want to go this route and will select another brand that appeals to me, and one whose manufacturer stands 100% behind their brand and their product.  Very disappointed

Just ordered my second one of these. My first only lasted about 3.5 years - a little disappointing, compared to my older Skagen model's 6 years - but I'm pretty rough on watches, so maybe it's me. Anyway, I love the look, it's super comfortable, and you can't find anything nearly as nice for the price, so I'm trying again.I *will* second what others have said about "water resistance" - Skagens are fine for everyday use, but don't immerse them.
I like the look of it but when i tried to fit it to my wrist it was awful to try to secure the clasp I had to take it to a jeweler to adjust it to my wrist
It's simple and beautiful looks very, very elegant. The crystals shine and sparkle. The mesh band is also nice and confortable, I love the size. I LOVE IT!

Lost a Skagen I'd had for years and couldn't live without one.  Infinitely adjustable, sooo sleek and very comfortable.  This is a bit larger than I expected, but love the sparkles for numbers.  Great watch for casual or dress up!

My watch arrived yesterday and is beautiful and easy to read.  I like that I can adjust the clasp so it's not too tight on my arm.  Just be sure you read the instructions about how to adjust the clasp and look at it carefully before you start.  I didn't do that and the clasp fell off when I tried to take off the watch.  This is not a defect in the watch clasp but my fault for not looking closely at what I was doing.  I used a lighted magnifier to take a close look when I put it back on the mesh strap and now understand how it works.  No problems since.
summary: Nice watch, read the instructions on the clasp

reviewText: While this watch is very nice looking and I love the design, it doesn't work so well. The small hand in mine doesn't keep up and always looks an hour behind.  I had it repaired once after only owning it for 9 months.  EVEN UNDER WARRANTY, Skagen charged me $13 to repair it plus shipping cost.  After less than a year, it's broken again and I went to the website and they want $34 to repair a watch.  Plus I have to pay to ship it to them.  The watch costs less than $100 so at this point, I'll just toss the thing.  Too bad they concentrate mnore on design than function.
summary: Pretty, but doesn't work well. Skagen didn't repair well either.

reviewText: This is a very pretty watch but it does not keep time.  Initially it did for about half a year, than it stopped, I had the battery replaced, then it only worked sparodically, keeping time for a few hours to a few days at a time accurately before it slows down or stops entirely requiring the time to be re-set & it'll re-run again; so I replaced the battery a 2nd time thinking it may be a faulty battery & the same thing happens. It's a piece of junk now. What a waste of money.

I purchased this watch due to the great reviews. I am very impressed. It looks very nice. I wanted a watch that would look good professionally and casually, and this watch does the trick. Somehow, I have scratched the face a slight bit, but it is really not too obvious. For the price, you can't beat it!
Very nice watch at a great price. Contemporary and elegant. Clasp is a little confusing at first, but is very secure and easy to use once figured out. Love it.

Have had the watch for about a week and have worn it everyday.  This is my 3rd Skagen watch and I love the look of it.  I haven't noticed that the rim surrounding the crystal gets easily scratched as another reviewer noted.  I have big hands and wrists, but the watch doesn't look too small on my arm.  To think I've bought my previous ones at Nordies for 2x as much, at least.  I hope this one is as good in the long run as my earlier ones were.

This watch is so convenient to size for small wrists.  I looks great for dress, work and sport.  This is the first Skagen watch I've purchased and I will definitely consider Skagen when I make future watch purchases.
Came as described and was half the price from what Dillard'sSold it as.  Even had the original 100.00 price tag on it.  Good find....I think so
summary: Best price and just like the stores
